story:
Welcome to the Bianca Miller London Crowdfund Page!



I am Bianca Miller the creator and founder of a new and dynamic brand called Bianca Miller London. I was the finalist of the BBC’s most recent business competition,  The Apprentice. The Apprentice enjoyed a significant following, with the 12 week series being viewed more than 100 Million times across media channels. I battled tough competition to make it to the final where I first pitched my idea of a range of skin tone hosiery to Lord Alan Sugar. 

Watch the final here - BBC Apprentice 2014:


Bianca Miller London offers a diverse range of nude hosiery designed to complement women of all complexions.

My passion for nude hosiery stems from my own personal experience aged 18 and being a December baby it was cold, so I wanted a pair of nude tights to match my ensemble. I trawled the high street, searched the internet and saw a variety of options none of which resembled my skin. So what did I do? Well trying to be young and fashionable – I braved the cold!!

A few years later, whilst working in the City of London, the challenge of nude hosiery became poignant again. The job required me to attend corporate events in professional dress and despite having a larger budget it still proved impossible to purchase nude hosiery to compliment my skin tone. It was at this stage I was inspired to start the 'The Be Group', offering personal branding and image consultancy services. Whilst styling my clients and delivering workshops on image I saw women of all skin tones and varying budgets were also struggling!

The market

The potential of this market is substantial with brands like Christian Louboutin extending their range of nude pumps, both as acknowledgement of the widening market and to take advantage of the commercial benefits to be won by satisfying a larger audience. 

                                         The Christian Louboutin 'Nude Collection'


To put the market into perspective: 

·  236 million pairs of hosiery were purchased UK wide in 2013.

·  There was a 92% increase in sales in nude tights since the Royal Wedding in 2011.

·  51% of the UK population are female, a total of 32 million women and we benefit        from an amazing 270 nationalities and therefore a variety of skin tones.

·  There are 3.4 billion women worldwide.

·  Colour specialist Pantone confirmed there are 110 skin tones internationally

·  1.7 million average monthly search volume for ‘tights’ keywords via Google


Business Proposition

Bianca Miller London will offer 8 nude tones carefully selected to satisfy a variety of complexions from English Rose to Sub-Saharan African. Our initial offering will be tights and lace hold ups with our collection extending to other defining products on a seasonal basis.

We intend to build on the interest from viewers, departments stores, independent boutiques and online retailers and to ensure we have a UK wide distribution network. I am really happy to see these retailers embrace the opportunity to change the retail environment.

Currently there are still very limited options for women who do not fit into the three or so standard nude tones.   We are the only brand offering a full assortment of skin-toned hosiery for all women. Bianca Miller London does not have any direct competition and is perfectly placed to change the retail landscape for hosiery.

To ensure our proposition is compelling, we are offering eight nude tones in superior quality at a retail price of just £8.99, set at a level to maximise sales. The colours have been carefully developed based on extensive research to adequately cover an array of skin tones. Products will be available from Autumn-Winter 2015 onwards.


Summary

My aim is to launch Bianca Miller London for Autumn/Winter 2015 and require the sufficient finance to realise my vision. To this end I am offering a range of products and services with a wide price spectrum with the proceeds being used to fund the company.

Please contribute to my campaign now by pre-ordering your product – this will really help us to better understand which of our 8 shades are the most popular for our future retail partnerships. And help us to prove that a more diverse range of skin tone hosiery is what us buyers want !

I would love for you to start this journey with me – making my dream of redefining the nude horizon, a reality.

Please feel free to share this video and link with your loved ones!

Bianca M.


Order Today

Here’s how you can support our campaign:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your order! If you choose our wonderful tights please leave a note with what colour and size you would like!

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; to contribute necessary postage costs, you can change the figure above.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. 

4) Your Bianca Miller London Nudes will be ready for delivery for Autumn/Winter this year! You will get an email as soon as we have started posting your goodies! 

5) Our other Perks are ready for order straight away! (subject to availability)


The Colours:

Sizes:
Small / Medium
Medium/ Large
Large/X-Large
Price:
We will be retailing our tights at £8.99 but I want to offer you a discount for getting onboard at this early stage. So you will be able to purchase one pair for £7 or two for £13! 


Other Ways You Can Help


Purchasing Perks!
We have also worked on a fun range of perks that you can purchase if you want to support the business opportunity but aren't particularly interested in tights!

Shouting about us to friends and loved ones! 
(you don't have to literally shout but we won't stop you if you do!)


Contact us:


WE LOVE HEARING FROM YOU..

Backers: indiegogo@biancamillerlondon.com

Business Enquiries: bdm@biancamillerlondon.com

Press Enquiries: enquiries@biancamillerlondon.com

Thanks for taking the time to look at Bianca Miller London! 

 We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

#BiancaMillerLondon #RedefineNude

Bianca & the BML Team ! 


Why not follow us on Social Media?

Bianca Miller London Twitter: https://twitter.com/biancamillerldn

Bianca's Twitter: https://twitter.com/bianca_b_miller

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BiancaMillerLondon

Linked In : https://www.linkedin.com/company/bianca-miller-...

Bianca Miller London Instagram: https://instagram.com/biancamillerldn/

Bianca's Instagram: https://instagram.com/bianca_miller1

story:
I always had the dream to create a company that will reach peoples hearts through my creativity and passion for spreading love to this world.

The Idea behind Capturelove is to have an outlet to deliver my illustrations and Artwork on a wearable 'canvas', such as in this case a fashionable cap and tell a story through each cap. 

Each cap has a different theme and style, seeking to innovate the use of fabrics, colors and push the boundaries with the artwork printed and embroidered, in addition to the occasional LED Light for a statement piece on a night out.

This campaign is put in place to be able to realize the vision I have for Capturelove to not only be a fashion brand, but in much greater terms, be a brand that supports the' lifting' of this current worlds' 'vibration' and  global happiness, by educating through creating projects and donating to other causes. With each cap sold, 10% will be donated to Action4London, a local charity whose passionate vision is to invest time to transform the lives of London’s most disadvantaged communities with love and care and educating on the 'secrets of life'.

What you will give us and what you will get in returnas 

I am currently working on the branding and website of this company, creating a new Logo and organising  photoshoot collaborating with dancing teens and adults to show the fun in this brand and the activity related to the caps, dancing and being in unity with your peers. Therefore I am looking for funding for the right setting and props for the Photoshoot, including hiring a London Red Bus, where the kids will dance on and around, representing a slight rebellion towards our current structure of education. We want to give children more freedom to become who they want to become and further their passions and creativity.
-The Red Bus will cost 400 GBP for the day. 
-To transport the children we have to hire a minibus for a 15 seater for the weekend (the don't hire for only one day over weekends), which costs 178 GBP.
-To cover the costs for the photographer, the costs would be 250 GBP.
- Once the website is done and all branding is in place, we need to pay a distributor and PR agency to put the caps into Shops, which is a total of an initial 2000 GBP for the first 3 months.
This brings us to a total of 2,828 GBP of Funding that we need at this moment in time to get this kickstarted.

PERKS
Our perks are following:
1.For 25 GBP you get 1 cap
2.For 50 GBP you get 2 caps
3.For 75 GBP you get 3 caps
 4.For 100 GBP you get 5 caps of your choice
5.For 200 GBP you get 8 caps, plus a voucher for a free cap for a friend.
6.For 500 GBP you get 8 caps, plus the opportunity to get a personalized design just for you by Maria-Katharina Richters the CEO and Designer, including the product sent to you and a Thank you Dedication on the website.
7. For 1000 GBP you get two caps of each design with a personalized thank you note and Dedication on our website, plus the opportunity for a personalized Limited edition design and dedication of that range to you, produced and sold in our next collection.
If we don't reach the funding Goal, the money will still be very useful for the process of making this dream become reality and you will have been part of this mission to bring more light to this planet.

You can have a look at the Facebook page /CAPTURELOVELIMITED for more details and project we have done in the past. This brand has been built with love and dedication on the side of another Company Tinkilove, which creates sustainable and recycled and up cycled clothing and purchasing only organic fabrics, working on a made to measure bases.

This project is important to get the ball rolling, so that we can pitch the product to stores such as Selfridges, Libertys, Browns and all over the world.
Capturelove has registered TRADEMARKS in the USA, Australia, Europe and China, so we are very serious about this.

We couldn't thank you enough if you could make this company have the opportunity to raise enough money and make a dream come true.

Every little helps, if you could like my page CAPTURELOVELIMITED  and follow me on Instagram under CAPTURELOVECAPS it would help massively, my website which is under construction is www.capturelove.london and www.capture-love.net and if you could chat to this company to your friends and family it would already be really helpful.

Many thanks!
Love&Light,
Maria-Katharina Richters

story:
Hey folks!
My name is Tamsyn and I created VelvetVolcano in November 2009 and solely run it to this day :). 



What I create
I make spooky, sweet and sparkly jewellery, accessories and apparel for gals and ghouls who love to stand out and are a little bit 'allergic' to the 'norm'. 


Why am I asking for your support?
Though I think every creator deserves support in their journey, there is a specific reason why I have set up this campaign. 
I have struggled with varying degrees of illness all my life, some I have battled and conquered and some still firmly have their hold on me and often make running my business (or functioning at all) very difficult (and on some days, impossible). 
When I started VV it was without any funding and with very little money as I was (and am) physically unable to get a 'standard' job, I kept building VV with the money I was making but without any additional funding, it was very difficult to expand the brand any further. 
Since then, while trying to find a balance between keeping myself well and building my business, every penny had been going straight back into my business (for supplies) and to making sure I'm well enough to continue it (and mostly to the latter, which as a workaholic, I find very frustrating :) ).
Working from home gives me pretty flexible hours and allows me to work hard when I'm feeling good and to have some much needed rest when my body is fighting me, something I would not be able to get in a 'normal' job. VelvetVolcano also gives me great joy and a feeling of control which I often feel desperately out of when my illnesses are flaring. 
But as described in the video above, running a business with little to no funding behind it makes it very difficult to progress… and there are still so many sparkly things in VelvetVolcano’s future.

Your support would not only mean the world to me but it would help ensure I have a stable income and help me to continue doing what I love. 
I have many plans to build VelvetVolcano, but without any additional funding, they will not be possible, so hopefully this campaign can be beneficial to both of us :). 

How your support will help VelvetVolcano and what your donations will go towards:

  • A heavy duty sewing machine. This will be used to create home wares, clothing and even more accessories. I have been sketching and planning these ranges for what seems like an eternity. If you love our products currently and wish to fill your world with even more VelvetVolcano goodies, you'll love this! :D


  • A DSLR camera. Not only would this make the photographing and editing process a lot easier for me (which is quite integral with a chronic illness), it means you will have a much clearer and true to life image of what our products look like, especially as I plan to shoot detailed product videos too! :)


  • The ability to bulk buy supplies including -
    Fabrics needed to create our clothing and home wares range
    Badges, Enamel Pins, Embroidered Patches and super-high quality sticker sheets themed around our current designs and illustrations plus many more currently unreleased designs that are just itching to be created :)


    Sterling Silver chains and findings (being able to bulk buy these is crucial for their affordability, for both me and you :). I want you gals and ghouls to have the best and for our current prices to remain the same or as close to it as possible :) )

    Custom coloured sunglasses with VelvetVolcano branding, ready to be given their sparkle treatment by yours truly. All of the colours of the rainbow for our Heart Shaped and Cat Eye Sunglasses, no limits! :D


    and of course the integral Rhinestones! 


These are the main goals and what our goal figure for this campaign has in mind, if by some magic we went over this goal (which would be absolutely mindblowing), I am not short of ideas and they would help me progress further with things like...
Making the VelvetVolcano website a more interactive experience, giving customers the chance to design their own pieces for me to make and also providing a gaming experience for a new way of earning 'Sparkle-Points' loyalty points that will provide customers with special discounts (as well as fun!) :). 
I also hope that with extra funding under my belt I will be able to strike a more comfortable balance with my health and my business and will then be able to take VelvetVolcano on the road and to craft fairs and conventions where customers and supporters will be able to see my super sparkly (and not so sparkly ;) ) goodies in the flesh :) (and I'll hopefully get to meet some of you lovelies too!). 


Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate that times are hard for everyone and not everyone will be able to contribute, but there are still ways you can help :) -

  • Please help share this campaign and get the word out, the more people that know, the more funds I may be able to raise - this is hugely important, so if you can't donate but would like to help, this is your super power my friends! :D
    You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools and sharing the link with your friends - please share it far and wide :).

    Thank you so much for reading and contributing / sharing if you can! :)

story:
PEDrives is a new company with 35 years of EV and e-bike experience. We are excited to offer our first of many new electric drive products with ME n' E.

ME n' E is the lightest, lowest cost and easiest to install system for a cycling electric power enhancement available.
  • Weighs only 2lbs  (.9kg)
  • 2-minute installation (no tools required)
  • Cost starts at under $200 (250 watt system)
Other unique and proprietary features include:
  • Sensorless power matching algorithm, shift notification, and 1 wire connection.
We are offering 3 models and a completed, lightweight bike (see perks).

 

Our small team of engineers and designers  -includes the co-founder of ZAP bikes, the previous project head of the Corbin Sparrow, the designer of the world’s first folding electric scooter, and many other e-bike and electric power industry contributions -- both as designers, environmentalists, publishers and CEO's. We come with a wealth of business, ebike, and environmental "street cred".


ME n' E, unlike some other products, is not intended to make your bike into an e-bike -- but to create a fusion of your pedaling effort with clean electric power. The added electric power flattens the feel of hills, enhances your ride, and reduces your sweat -- all while putting a big smile on your face.

ME n' E uses friction contact with the tire, like several other low-weight drives. The motor drive roller presses into the tire to transmit power and is activated by your initial pedal cadence. When the motor senses that you have begun pedaling, the system begins simulating the power you are providing and the power increases, as you increase your effort. If you cease to maintain the same pace or effort, the system reduces power to match what your are providing.

You cannot trick the system to provide power if you do not provide your own. The experience is the most natural and exhilarating you may ever have on a bike. Human effort and electric power just simply go well together.

This is not a simple cadence throttle, as ME n' E's software knows when your effort is greater -- even if your legs are not moving quickly.

The system will also let you know when it is time to shift gears, as it pauses when you have reached the maximum rpm for the gear ratio. The momentary pause signals that it’s time to shift.

ME n' E does its magic by adding power whenever you add power, but without using sensors and wires. It knows when you need help by using a proprietary algorithm. It takes no tools or skills to install or remove in 2 minutes or less.

We wanted to make the system feel like normal cycling, allowing normal exercise, while having only a 2-lb (.9kg). weight penalty (batteries included), making time on your bike feel even better than you might expect.



The sequential images in the video below show the mounting steps, and the rest is simply up to your legs.

There are 2 mounting types: 

  1. Rear-seat stay support bar: for bike with rear through hole for old style brakes or rear reflectors
  2. Seat-tube mount: both take one through bolt and  a thumb nut to install. This mount works well with most   hybrid bike models.

 After a quick install, just  connect the power plug, listen to the beep sequence and start pedaling.



We still have software and tooling of a few components to complete. Both should take about 3 weeks. Once this step is completed, we will begin building units to ship. $35,000 is our goal to get both tooling, and software completed and to fulfill the initial orders.

We have invested significant amounts of our own funds into this product and now need your help with its completion and the building of the first levels of inventory.

 Your help will allow us to bring this low cost product to the world and allow next generation products to make electric enhanced transportation a significant option for powering human mobility, while keeping us fit.



 


Your help will allow us to begin shipping our first units of ME n' E around May 18th -- still in time for Summer enjoyment. Join us in adding more fun while keeping active in cycling!
  

We expect to treat our supporters as we would like to be treated, by providing semi-weekly updates and sharing the sources of any schedule changes. The world of commerce does not allow an exact scheduling science and we have based our timing on normal outcomes, outsourced work and materials.

Our commitment and Staying in touch: 

Our promise to our supporters is that we will always operate with open transparency, keep you updated with our progress and overall, treat our supporters as we would like to be treated. As you might imagine, the uncertainties with suppliers, shipping and logistics can sometime impact our ability to produce our drive systems exactly how and when we would like. Your patience will be extremely appreciated and once again, we promise to provide bi-weekly updates to let everyone know how we are progressing.

 We also need your feedback , as the products are received and put to use.



With your help, we also expect to begin our next product development -- an electric enhancement for off-road cyclists. It is projected to be a 4-5lb (2kg) . system (including batteries) driving the rear wheel by chain-drive and providing up to 90nm of torque for more rapid hill climbing, but still simply following the riders effort. The most unique feature will be the addition of high output regenerative braking for safer hill descents and longer trail time.

Special consideration will be given to our early supporters, when this next gen design is ready for funding.




How far and how fast can I go with ME n' E?
The run time and distance must vary with the weight and strength of the rider. It also varies with terrain. Each country has its maximum speed limits, we will offer systems that meet national and local laws. Europe generally is 16 mph - (25 kph) and in the US 20 mph (32 kph)top speed, where applicable. The distance can vary from 10-15 mi per charge(16-24 km).

If the goal is not met, will funds be returned?
Yes, if the goal is far short of what is needed, we will return all funds.

What kinds of bikes will work with ME n' E?
Most bikes will work with our several mounting options- we will work with you to try to find solutions for custom designs or unusual frame styles. Most tire types will work but road tires with a smooth center or"slicks", work best. It even works in the rain and wet.

When might I get my ordered unit?
Each unit will be shipped in the order it was received. It should be no longer than 40 days from the close of the campaign if you order is 1st received.

How long will the battery last and how long between charges?
The battery has an expected life of 500-800 cycles. This also dependent on the rate of discharge, low discharge( you doing a lot of the work) it could exceed 1000hrs. It takes 5 hrs with the standard charger, about 2+ on the high rate charger.

Is this like the Add-E and some other friction drive systems?
Yes, and no. This is sturdy aluminum based motor mounting system that relies more on the software than the motor power. We are all friction-drive based but that is where the similarities end. Our system is intended to help you enjoy biking and not replace your effort. The others ( Add - E, etc) , try to make your bike into an ebike that requires you to pedal to make it start but it then overrides your effort. We ask, "Whats the point of riding a bike if something else is doing the work?"

Is shipping included ? No, we give you the choice and rather than estimate the worst case charges and add them to the price, we will offer multiple shipping options and payment arrangements.


We do not feel there are risks beyond those of normal life accidents with our ability to deliver these systems. When we reach our minimum goal, our only challenge is to complete work we’ve started, and we already have confidence in the design.
 Having started and succeeded with numerous technology based businesses and our many years of experience with bikes, electric vehicles and motors, we are humbly confident in our abilities to bring ME n' E to production, for you.


You can also help by sharing our story and ME n' E with friends and family -- or just order your own.

If we reach our goal with your help, we will honor any pricing on orders for 6 months beyond the ending of our campaign -- so no one will be left wanting or wondering.

ME n' E is the lightest, lowest cost and easiest to install system for a cycling electric power  enhancement available.
Weighs only 2lbs  (.9kg)

2-minute installation (no tools required)
Cost starts at under $200 (250 watt system)

Other unique and proprietary features include:


Sensorless power matching algorithm, shift notification, and 1 wire connection.

We are offering 3 models and a completed, lightweight bike (see perks).

story:
More than just a Rucksack!!

Anyone know where the beach towel is, what about the rucksack and bag to put valuables in, also something comfortable to rest my head on.... familiar and something we wanted to find a solution too. 
The concept actually came from my grandma who came up with the idea to sow my beach towel into my rucksack to stop me from losing it. The first time I visited the pool I had numerous people asking me where I bought that great bag and towel set from and that's where the walkbag started.

 


How to use?

As an inquisitive kind of guy who always looks for solutions to problems I started work on a design and a couple of years down the line after testing every fabric and idea imaginable the walkbag is now a fully functioning product that we want to deliver to mass market. 



Personalise your design

In volumes the bag and towel can be totally personalised making it not only a brilliant product for consumers but also a great promotional tool for business. It comes in adult and junior version and we have a version with a super soft baby towel for new babies.





In summary

The walkbag is a rucksack and beach towel in one. It is designed to give plenty of room when its a rucksack so you can still store all your needs for a visit to either the pool or beach. There's an in built waterproof zipped pocket to store your valuable, an inflatable head rest that slides into a well designed sleeve. 

The Walkbag comes in various colours and we are looking to make more designs. we have various towel options and the investment will help us to work on designs and fabrics and expanding to deliver a global product.

story:
'There is no such thing as bad weather, just inappropriate clothing'

The team comprises of Elaine Sykes, creator and her daughter's best friend Nadine McGurk who will lead on business development for the company.  

  

Together they want to bring the WellyWetSuit to the masses and through the support of this campaign they will be able to make a dream come true! Your pledges will make such a massive difference and it will help launch the business and help us bring the product to market this summer.

So we have a mother (Elaine) and a seasoned festival go-er (Nadine)

Elaine has had to deal with the mounds of ruined, mud soaked clothes and her children expecting them to be washed cleaned and ironed and repaired back to their former glory after a weekend of chaos camping out at a Music Festival…. Yeah I know some chance….
Nadine has been to over 15 camping festivals and has some serious horror stories not fit for this page.  Weeks planning to be the epitome of boho chic only to get there and covering all her good work by wrapping herself in anything that she deemed waterproof… one year she wrapped her blown down tent round her to keep her last dry piece of clothing protected.  The joys of UK & Irish summer weather eh?? 

This journey has  been 4 years in the making.  We are currently 'chiclets' in Belfast's first ever Entrepreneurial Spark programme which is helping us accelerate our business to the next level through mentorship and accessing local networks.  Initially with the help and continued support of our local college Belfast Met we were able to create the prototype of our unique ‘Waterproof Onesie’ to provide greater protection from rain at outdoor events and we called our baby the….....   Welly Wet Suit

The product offers;

  •  Head to toe waterproof protection
  •  Transparency so that your fashion silhouette is not compromised
  • Reflector Tabs
  • Peaked hood to keep the rain off your face
  • Ventilation so you don’t get all sweaty wearing it (we have thought of everything!) 
  • Adjustable waist, wrists and ankles
  • Reusable for your next outing ...... pack this instead of your umbrella! 
  • Obscure pockets to keep your valuables safe and hidden (and of course your hands free for throwing them shapes! YAAAAAAAAAA
Have a look at our lovely prototype:

What We Need & What You Get

This is where you come in!!! As well as being our first customers we need your pledges to raise £50,000 which will help us get into full production and test sell this summer with the finished product but all pledges will make a difference to the team, hence our decision to use flexible funding. 

Your pledges will support;

  • Product development
  • Initiate phase one of suit production
  • Raise the company’s profile at local festivals

So if you're reading this going £25k is a bit high isn't it ladies?!!! Look if we don't meet our target we will put all support to good use to perfect the finished product and use what we have to build the foundations of the company... So don't panic we promise all pledges will be honoured :) 

So you want in???.....Perk me up!!!!

What this campaign can offer you in exchange for your pledges are one off CRush art designed tshirts, WellyWetSuit's, Branded suits, Childern suits and an invite to the launch  and toast us onto the next stage of our journey! 

The Impact

Think Titanic, Delorean, Mobile Heart Defibrillator, Tayto, Game of Thrones, Viagra, Air Conditioning, Vita Liberata ....... WellyWetSuit is going to be another one of those inventions/brands to come out of Northern Ireland that EVERYONE knows or uses! You can sit back and brag to your friends.... I was one of the first investors to get the WellyWetSuit out there... great ice breaker aswell!! 

We plan to initially target the music festival and events market.  But there is great scope for the suit to be used at all outdoor events, activities and spectator sporting events.   Hopefully following the success of this campaign we will use profits from the sales of the suits to launch a children and pet range of the WellyWetSuit... something the whole family can wear! 

The scope is endless.....


Risks & Challenges

This is a pretty low risk campaign we have high hopes for its success and we hope you love our product as much as we do.  We have chosen flexible funding as all contributions are welcome.  We at WellyWetSuit promise that all pledges and perks will be honoured and what we receive we will put to good use for the company and it will be one step closer to getting our product to market.

               

Help us get our message out there 

Help us make some noise with our campaign!  Please share our pages on all social media channels, chat about it with friends and don't forget to #WellyWetSuit.  

Our handles are; 

Facebook: Welly Wet Suit Twitter: @wellywetsuit  Instagram: wellywetsuit

story:
Accents are shoe inserts that make it feel like you are putting on a new pair of shoes every day. One-day-use shoe inserts that provide comfort, cleanliness and keep your shoes and feet fresh, dry and clean!

Accents can be used in ANY type of shoe; heels, flats, sandals, wedges -
you name it, you can wear Accents with them!!! 

--- PATENT PENDING ---

Accents are:

Paper thin so there is no bulkiness added in your shoes. 
Made from a distinctive fabric that provides comfort, cleanliness and keeps your feet dry throughout the entire day! Also keeps your feet from sliding around.
Custom-shaped to shoe sizes, eliminating your need to cut them. 
Made from a unique adhesive with the ability to be repositioned if needed when inserting, yet durable to stay in place all day long.  

When your day is over, you easily remove your Accents using the helpful tab keeping your shoes and feet fresh, dry and clean!


Hi, my name is Rachele Cazarez and I invented Accents. 

On vacation while walking in the hot city of Miami my shoes literally kept flying off my feet because of the perspiration. I wondered what I could do to stop that from happening, so this idea was born. 

I am self-funded and have been working for 4 years on bringing Accents to life. I wanted to make sure that the finished product was at its best to bring to consumers. I  have been doing this while continuing with a full-time job. I work on them whenever I can; I wake up early each morning, stay up late at night and devote weekends, anything I can do to get Accents to market.

I have put in many hours to make sure that the product I created is a great one:
 I shaped and reshaped each size, 
I worked with many adhesive companies all over the country to get the right mix of repositioning capabilities and hold without leaving residue behind,
I also hunted and tested many different types of fabrics to get the right one that absorbs and doesn’t generate heat.
All of this was done while making sure everything combined with each other perfectly. 

 It has been and continues to be a rewarding adventure!!!!! I believe in my product and know it will be very helpful to you.

Currently in my 1st run of production and due to high demand - I'm moving forward with my 2nd run.  Join with me on this journey to keep the momentum going!!! I am so close to getting Accents on the market and would love your help.    



What Will Help! 

Funding Goal $15,000

If the goal for funds IS met it will be allocated to the following: 
5 Custom die cuts (for each size) 
Packaging for 1st and 2nd run (5000 boxes)
Ordering new fabric color (min order required 210 rolls)
Production of the product (in U.S.)
Shipping from overseas (fabric only)
Customs broker (clearing through customs, Port of LA charges) 
Transportation from docs to production facility
Digital advertising 
If the entire goal is NOT met, please know that all funds will used towards getting my 2nd  production run going. I am very passionate in getting my product out to market  and would appreciate any contribution.

****Whether you end up donating or not, please still request a free pair of Accents from this page (while supplies last, one pair per person). First run will be ready to ship at the end of May****

 ****Once you try them you'll wonder how you lived without them****


Accents from Top-to-Bottom

 I know my product will be very helpful providing you comfort from your workday all the way through your date night. Your contribution will be a part of helping others to enjoy their shoes more too!


Tab folds under to hide while wearing open-back shoes


Other Ways You Can Help!

If you are unable to contribute at this time, it will be a great help to me also by getting the word out about Accents to your family, friends and coworkers. Let them know a fantastic new shoe insert unlike any other is coming soon! 

****If you end up donating or not, please still request a free pair of Accents from this page (while supplies last, one pair per person). First run will be ready to ship at the end of May****

Paper thin so there is no bulkiness added in your shoes. Made from a distinctive fabric that provides comfort, cleanliness and keeps your feet dry throughout the entire day! Also keeps your feet from sliding around.Custom-shaped to shoe sizes, eliminating your need to cut them. Made from a unique adhesive with the ability to be repositioned if needed when inserting, yet durable to stay in place all day long.  

When your day is over, you easily remove your Accents using the helpful tab keeping your shoes and feet fresh, dry and clean!




Hi, my name is Rachele Cazarez and I invented Accents. 
On vacation while walking in the hot city of Miami my shoes literally kept flying off my feet because of the perspiration. I wondered what I could do to stop that from happening, so this idea was born. 
I am self-funded and have been working for 4 years on bringing Accents to life. I wanted to make sure that the finished product was at its best to bring to consumers. I  have been doing this while continuing with a full-time job. I work on them whenever I can; I wake up early each morning, stay up late at night and devote weekends, anything I can do to get Accents to market. 

I have put in many hours to make sure that the product I created is a great one: I shaped and reshaped each size, I worked with many adhesive companies all over the country to get the right mix of repositioning capabilities and hold without leaving residue behind,I also hunted and tested many different types of fabrics to get the right one that absorbs and doesn’t generate heat.All of this was done while making sure everything combined with each other perfectly. 
 It has been and continues to be a rewarding adventure!!!!! I believe in my product and know it will be very helpful to you.
Currently in my 1st run of production and due to high demand - I'm moving forward with my 2nd run.  Join with me on this journey to keep the momentum going!!! I am so close to getting Accents on the market and would love your help.    





What Will Help! 
 Funding Goal $15,000
If the goal for funds IS met it will be allocated to the following: 

5 Custom die cuts (for each size) Packaging for 1st and 2nd run (5000 boxes)Ordering new fabric color (min order required 210 rolls)Production of the product (in U.S.)Shipping from overseas (fabric only)Customs broker (clearing through customs, Port of LA charges) Transportation from docs to production facilityDigital advertising 
If the entire goal is NOT met, please know that all funds will used towards getting my 2nd  production run going. I am very passionate in getting my product out to market  and would appreciate any contribution.


****Whether you end up donating or not, please still request a free pair of Accents from this page (while supplies last, one pair per person). First run will be ready to ship at the end of May****
 ****Once you try them you'll wonder how you lived without them****





Accents from Top-to-Bottom
 I know my product will be very helpful providing you comfort from your workday all the way through your date night. Your contribution will be a part of helping others to enjoy their shoes more too!








Tab folds under to hide while wearing open-back shoes








Other Ways You Can Help! If you are unable to contribute at this time, it will be a great help to me also by getting the word out about Accents to your family, friends and coworkers. Let them know a fantastic new shoe insert unlike any other is coming soon! 
****If you end up donating or not, please still request a free pair of Accents from this page (while supplies last, one pair per person). First run will be ready to ship at the end of May****

story:
Litost by Laura Searle

 

For those who know me and those who don't, i know this sounds typical, but it's always been my dream, and i'm one of those who doesn't believe in luck, but in work, in overcoming struggle, in passion and love for what you do.

My dream is as simple and hard as this: being able to live from what i love, modestly, i don't need to be number one, i just want to share my passion with those who believe in it.

My passion? Fashion Design

The project: My graduation collection.

What's the project about?

A fashion design collection of 8 looks (24 garments), hand-made and inspired in the idea of weight and lightness. I believe in fashion, we are losing the power of ideas, of artisanal techniques, of handmade and creativity, and mass production is winning the battle. Clothes serve the purpose of dressing, but can also serve the purpose of inspiring, of imagination, of creativity and beauty.

My aim is to concentrate in the way new technologies and materials affect fashion, and combine these with the traditional and artisanal techniques of her my own country, to create garments that people can feel represented in.

What do i need, what do you get in exchange

     
  • Behind each garment, each video, each photo there is a creative professional fighting hard to create something beautiful, investing all their free time and resources that are not normally valued. People can't work for free...

    Team participating in this project:
  • Seamstress: only sewing each garment is around 70-150€
  • Myself: doing all the patterns and sewing everything i can

  • For the fashion film to promote the collection: 
    - Direction & script: Gsus López http://www.gsuslopez.com/
    - DoP: Pol Gonzalez http://polgonzalez.com/
    - 1st AD + Editor: http://www.marclapes.com/
    - VFX Artist Theo Demiris at 'One of Us' London: http://www.weacceptyou.com/
    - Make up: Gloria Ricco
    - Models

    This is only amazing people participating, leaving aside cameras, fabrics, and the rest of the material...

    What do you get?
  • Leaving aside my eternal gratitude:

    - For those giving away above 300€ i promise a personalized garment (don't worry, a wearable one, but not a simple t-shirt).

    - 200-300€: a pack of five illustrations A3 selected from my website:
    www.laura-searle.com

    - 100€: a pack of two illustrations A4 selected from my website:
    www.laura-searle.com

    - 50- 100€: one illustration selected from my website:
    www.laura-searle.com

    - 1- 50€: the promise that if i either manage to open a brand someday you'll get 15% discount, and a postcard with one illustration selected from my website www.laura-searle.com, and all my love and gratitude
    •  
  • If the total goal is not achieved, everything will still be invested in producing the garments and trying to get the best material possible for the fashion film.
    •  
What do we get out of this
 

I truly thank all of those who can help me out. I promise to invest my time, passion, work and love in this project, and basically everything i can to make everyone of you proud of helping me out.

What do we get out of this:

     
  • Showing the world that ideas and creativity also have a place in the world, and that artisans in every field, and young people who fight everyday for their dreams can still survive nowadays! (it's cheesy i know, but it's the truth).
    •  
  • A beautiful, funny and imaginative fashion film directed by Gsus López (please check his website: http://www.gsuslopez.com/)
    •  
  • A collection of the best 8 looks i can do.
    •  
 If you can't afford to help
 

Just sharing this campaign among your friends and family would help me a lot!

story:
Twisted Mustard Seed Diaper Bags

Twisted Mustard Seed aims to bridge the gap between style and functionality when it comes to diaper bags. Our goal is to create a stylish diaper bag line for both women and men that are as functional as they are fashionable.

A little about our brand and bags:

  • Founded on Christian principles (Matthew 17:20)
  • Designed for both women and men
  • Crafted from high quality, handpicked materials (Genuine Cowhide Leathers and cotton laminate lining)
  • BPA, lead, and PVC free
  • Extremely functional for daily tasks with optional branded add-ons

The Story Behind Twisted Mustard Seed

"Truly I tell you, if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you"

Matthew 17:20 has been a guiding scripture in my life and my faith based view of parenting. In 2011 God blessed my husband and I with one of HIS beautifully hand crafted gifts, a baby boy named Austin. Unaware of the journey that was ahead of us, we knew that no matter the challenges, with confidence and trust in God’s plan for our family we could move mountains.

In 2013 we welcomed our newest gem, Miss Ava. Adding to our growing family was the easy part! Keeping that strong, faith based foundation could have been a challenge. As new parents, and parents with growing families, you tend to fall into repetitious routines that can steer you away from what held your bond together, FAITH.

As a Mother of two, I’ve questioned my “place” in the world as an individual. I wasn’t sure of the professional path God wanted me on. Before staying home with my children, I had a great job with a Fortune 100 company. But, I always felt an indescribable emptiness on how I could give and show my unique 1%. With faith and years of prayer, in September 2014 I got my answer. The name Twisted Mustard Seed was placed on my heart, but I had no clue why. When I mentioned this to my husband, he quoted the scripture that has been our guiding light as parents (Matthew 17:20). I then knew I was meant to design something around my greatest gifts - my precious babies!

Raising children has been the most profound happiness of my life. But from this happiness came one of my biggest heartaches…my diaper bag! For years I’ve felt my diaper bag was an organizational necessity but not a reflection of myself. I’d always wanted a “staple piece” with the functionality of a diaper bag. Also, with my husband being an involved hands-on Dad, I wanted to have a bag that allowed him to be able to showcase fatherhood, without feminine overtones. With these ideas in mind, I began Twisted Mustard Seed. I set out to create a brand that understands the journey you go through as parents, parents to-be, and caregivers. With FAITH as small as a mustard seed you can move mountains!

What We Need & What You Get

Our first two bags (The Heartbreaker & Voyager) are currently in production but we need your support to finalize these designs and help us fund our full line.

Backers will have the ability to preorder two bags from our collection (The Heartbreaker & Voyager) and purchase optional add-ons before the general public. Items will be ready for delivery March 2016.

The Heartbreaker

The Heartbreaker is a simplistic yet attractive turquoise satchel that’s appealing to the eye, but functional for all your needs as a mother. It is made from genuine cowhide leather with a cotton laminate interior.

The Voyager

The Voyager is a durable, canvas backpack that can also be carried over the shoulder as a sling. Covered in Twill Hunter’s Green canvas with cognac leather trim accents, this bag looks both modern and rugged while providing the functionality requirements of a diaper bag. It has ample storage throughout its exterior and interior—allowing men to carry every day items in addition to their parenting goods.

Accessories

Our branded accessories pair with any of our Twisted Mustard Seed diaper bags and are BPA, lead, and PVC free. You can purchase them in combination with our bags or on their own. The accessories listed in our campaign include stroller straps, changing pad, snap-in cooler, and wet/dry pouch!

 

The Impact

With your help we will be able to complete the production of our first line and offer versatile yet fashionable diaper bags to the market.

Risks & Challenges

We have already spent over a year designing our line, picking materials, and nailing down manufacturing facilities. Our time, money, and full effort have gone into making our dream a reality.

While we know that there are many risks and challenges ahead of us, we believe that this Indiegogo campaign will provide us with the help we need to reach the next step with our brand. We are thankful for your support!

Other Ways You Can Help

We are appreciative for your campaign support--regardless of whether you are a contributor or someone who helps build awareness of our brand. As a new company we can use all the help we can get.

  • Please share our campaign on social media if you like our product and want to see us succeed
  • Parent bloggers can contact us directly for promotional opportunities

Thank you and God bless!

story:
Before presenting the campaign and our watches, we would like 
          to thank you all for visiting this page, we hope you love the project
             and we would like for you to be a part of our wonderful journey.
                                                           May Allah bless you 

                                                    Sharing is Caring

                           -They Talk About Us-        

                    


               -THE STORY BEHIND BaBaWatch- 

Thats me, Khairi  the Uncle. <---                     --->And thats Hamad, the Nephew

I was inspired by my Emirati nephew, to develop a prayer watch for kids.
I realized that kids today are bombarded with distractions on the internet making it hard for them to observe the proper times for prayer no matter how many times their parents remind them.
                      Lifelong habits, good or bad, begin in childhood

When I saw my nephew struggling to remember the correct times to pray
I purchased him a prayer watch, but he hated how heavy, complicated, and ill-fitting it was.
That was my ah-ha moment, I knew what I had to do and immediately began designing what is the first kid-approved prayer watch.


I knew that kids did not want to wear any of the heavy and complicated prayer watches produced for adults, and would prefer a more personal device 


                             -The BaBaWatch mission-

helping children to develop a pattern of praying, as childhood is an excellent period for individuals to cultivate good habits.
 And helping children to understand the broader importance of personal responsibility.

                                 This while being Stylish and Useful !

Creating a personal Watch with features such as a built in 4GB USB for use at school and an indicator that points out the proper direction for prayer.
Qibla Direction     

                                                
It is our duty as a sister uncle or parent, to welcome a child for prayer. 
                   'BaBaWatch' helps us with this responsibility  
____________________________________________________________________________  

      -Benefits of Pre-Purchasing 'The BaBaWatch'-

1:First to Get BaBa - 2:Half Price Discount - 3:Supporting BaBa - 4:Hasanaats
You are more than welcome to suggest a new Colour in the comments section  
the most suggested Colour will be the next one we develop.

with the money raised we can start production
and start shipping the watches to you!

Choose Your Early Bird package and get 
50%OFF  (normal Retail price will be $60+Shipping)
For Being the first to Support 'The BaBaWatch'

                                                       

_____________________________________________________________________________

                                                      

 _____________________________________________________________________________

                                                          

 _____________________________________________________________________________

                                                        

 _____________________________________________________________________________

                                                          

 _____________________________________________________________________________

                                                         

 _____________________________________________________________________________


               iDEAL users: Step 1 Log in to your PayPal Account
                                            Step 2 Click on the Left side 'Geld toevoegen via iDEAL' 
          Klik hier om in te loggen
_____________________________________________________________________________ 

                                      -Timeline-


__________________________________________________________________________  

Also a great gift idea for your parents


   -THE NEW MUSLIM GENERATION THANKS YOU-_____________________________________________________________________________

F.A.Q.

How do I select my watch color?
Your selection of choice for the watch will be made available after the funding period ends. We will be send out an update by email allowing you to select your choices then. 



I shared your campaign, when and how will i get my reward?
You will receive a $5-$10usd Coupon Code after the funding period ends.
We will be send out a Code by email allowing you to use it on our future website.

Do you ship internationally?
Yes we do! Our watches ship worldwide and shipping is free of charge for the business packages

Can I pledge for more than one watch?
Yes you can! You can pledge for as many watches you want to.

Does it come with a manual and how long does the battery last?
Yes it comes with a manual! Its so easy a kid can use it. And the battery should last about 2 years.

How is the warranty of my watch?
All of our watches come with a limited warranty for one year.

story:
WHO WE ARE:

For The Good Period (4TGP) helps girls in the developing world stay in school. We're a group of six passionately committed individuals working to make a difference in the lives of girls in the developing world by removing two of the major barriers to their education: inadequate understanding of reproductive health (which increases teen pregnancy and disease) and lack of access to sanitary pads. One of us ––our founder, Kayce Anderson–– is a visionary idealist with a PhD. Another, Sadler Merrill –– our awesome, empathetic male–– is a grounded and savvy entrepreneur. Our communications director, Kate Lapides, is a dedicated documentary photographer with a passion for life above 10,000 feet; our programs director, Molly Secor-Turner ––another PhD–– is a socially progressive nurse and reproductive health educator who is also an Avett Brothers groupie. Jessica Lindsley, our development assistant is a yogi who advises non-profits on thoughtful donor development. And our Kenyan outreach coordinator, Sharon Secor, is an indefatigable grandmother who has been improving rural health care and helping build schools in Kenya for over two decades.

In 2015 For the Good Period became an official non-profit. A few months later we made our inaugural trip to Kenya  to distribute reproductive health education and sustainable menstrual hygiene kits – durable and good for three years –– to 1,000 girls in rural villages. We documented the girls' hopes, struggles and dreams on that trip because we believe photography and video can be powerful tools in sharing their stories and raising awareness of the issues they face, which include pressure to drop out of school, marry early, and undergo female genital mutilation (FGM.)

Our passionate belief that girls around the world should be able to stay in school and achieve their dreams is what propels us to do our work. What will you gain by supporting our campaign?  Nothing less than helping us remove a major, but resolvable, barrier to education for thousands of adolescent Kenyan girls.

OUR CAMPAIGN:

We hope to use photography exhibits and video to raise funds for additional distribution and reproductive health education sessions to another 1,000 girls in Kenya in 2016.  Our belief is that sharing the hopes and struggles of adolescent girls around the world though compelling photography can attract potential donors for our work. Additionally, profits from all sales of prints from our exhibits will go directly to fund 4TGP's work.

WHAT WE NEED (& What You Get!):

We are requesting $2550 to cover the production costs of a traveling photography exhibit that highlights the stories of girls who benefited from our September, 2015 distribution trip to Kenya. The first exhibit kicks off the Colorado Mountain College in Aspen Gallery space and takes place from January 25-May 6, 2016. All profits from sales of prints at our exhibits will be used to support the manufacture and distribution of pads to an additional 1,000 girls in rural Tharaka-Nithi County, Kenya. Additional funds raised will be used for expanded distributions to additional girls in Kenya and potentially the neighboring country of Malawi in 2016-2017.

What do you get for supporting our work? The deep satisfaction of being part of a solution that helps thousands of beautiful girls stay in school, have a better chance to reach their potential and ultimately, improve the health of their communities.  You can also acquire some beautifully crafted photographs as either note cards or prints as a reminder of the girls whose lives you have helped change for the better.


RISKS & CHALLENGES:

Community development work and aid distribution in developing countries often provides many challenges. There are always potentials for cultural miscommunication and misuse of donated funds.

For the Good Period addresses these potential hurdles by partnering with trusted friends and staff on the ground in Kenya. Half of our U.S. staff has cultivated these relationships over the course of twenty years of development work in Kenya in the region where we work. This ensures that our communication and education regarding the sensitive issues of reproductive health are culturally appropriate and that our programs begin with the vetted input of the communities we serve.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Can't afford a cash donation, but still interested and excited to get involved and support our work? You can help us enormously by helping spread the word about our campaign and our work. If our work resonates with you, please use Indiegogo's share tools to spread word about our campaign through your own networks! Asante sana (thank you from the bottom of our hearts,) from the folks at For the Good Period.

story:
The Rewards

Pick your style, colour and size. When you pledge we'll send a message to you, to get details of which styles you want.




 

Sizing & Colour

Five colours in six sizes for men S -3XL and XS-XXL for women.  

The cut and fit of these shirts was specified by Anastasia Vouyouka, a published guru of fit in the fashion industry.  There is a comprehensive size table below.
 

Size Chart

 

The Idea

WeAdmire create t-shirts with designs by artists with one common theme: They all depict something or someone admired. Expression through admiration is the motivation behind WeAdmire. The enjoyment of admiration is universal, not limited by topic or geography and enriched by culture.

You may already know the WeAdmire store in London, now we are expanding.  The objective is to grow our business internationally both physically ,"bricks"  and electronically, "clicks". 

We will start with a physical expansion of our business by moving the majority of our production to a new venue that is physically better suited to the storage and production of shirts than our existing studio.  

To fund this expansion, WeAdmire are offering t-shirts at reduced prices with no shipping costs.

The Shirts


Every t-shirt has an artist and a story and some details of both are reproduced on a special panel inside the shirt.

Special Fabric

Our new shirts are made with   ring spun into fine yarns and knitted into a circa 170gsm single jersey fabric this is probably unique in the t shirt market.  For us the use of these fibres was a means to an end - to have quality t shirts that could be comfortably worn regularly - essentially matching the quality and thought and skill that went into the art decorating them.  But in fact the quality and performance of the shirts makes them worthy of being an end in themselves. We had to commission the manufacture of 8 tonnes of the fibres.  

We believe the use of these fibres ring spun for t shirts is a first and so does the manufacturer, Invista.  Having had the fibres precisely ring spun into yarn all but the grey yarns were dyed into our colours and then knitted into fabric.  The result is a lightweight, luxurious and breathable shirt that wicks away moisture and kills bacteria for the life of the garment.  These qualities are unaffected to any significant extent by wear or washing because both qualities are engineered into the fibres not applied onto them.  The wicking and anti microbial effects are permanent.

These qualities make the shirts marvellous to travel with:   They wash easily and dry quickly but if you can’t wash them for a day or three they stay fresh and will not become malodorous.  They wash well because washing is wicking in reverse: its quick and easy, the water and detergent penetrate and have an accelerated flow through the fibres. Finally the shirts dry more quickly than any t shirt you have previously owned and absolutely do not need to be ironed.   There is another particular advantage, travelling or otherwise - whatever you might wear with the shirts remains fresher too because bacteria do not get beyond the silvery embrace of your t shirt .  
 

The ongoing performance of the fabric is guaranteed. This is important because we know you will want to wear your shirt again and again.

Dyeing vs Printing

We dye the designs into the fabric at 720 dpi in one axis and 1440dpi in the other.   We do not print onto the the surface of the shirt.  Despite the full CMYK colour reproduction and the high resolution there is no hand feel to the decorated areas.  There is no change to the drape, the decorated areas breathe in the same way as the undecorated areas.  The size of the decorated area and the intensity of the colours in the images are immaterial.
 

Delivery

Early birds will have their shirts the working day after they pledge their support but in any case everyone who makes a pledge should have their shirts within a month of the end of the campaign.
 

Visit Us

Please feel free to visit us and perhaps collect your reward and or watch it being produced.  Our conventional address: 13-15 Great Eastern Street, London EC2A 3EJ.  Our what3words location: glove.jabs.young  We expect to be here 7 days a week for the duration of the campaign and until all the rewards are produced and posted.  Beyond that we will be closed on Sundays.  From 11am- 6pm on Saturdays but otherwise 9am - 6pm at least.  
 

Support us

Tweet, post, pin and Instagram this campaign and help us spread the word.
 

Risks


For early birds there is no risk you will not receive the reward we describe and you expect.  We have the physical stock of shirts - eight tonnes of fibre made 30,000 shirts.  And we have the library of artwork to reproduce on them.  Because the amount we want to raise is flexible we do not have to wait to hit a financial target. We will start to send the pledge rewards immediately.  For early pledges you should receive your shirts in the post the following day. (assuming a business/post day).  Later in the campaign it is conceivable that we will not be able to deliver a first choice of colour and size.  We will let you know, on this page, if this happens.

Tweet, post, pin and Instagram this campaign and help us spread the word.

For early birds there is no risk you will not receive the reward we describe and you expect.  We have the physical stock of shirts - eight tonnes of fibre made 30,000 shirts.  And we have the library of artwork to reproduce on them.  Because the amount we want to raise is flexible we do not have to wait to hit a financial target. We will start to send the pledge rewards immediately.  For early pledges you should receive your shirts in the post the following day. (assuming a business/post day).  Later in the campaign it is conceivable that we will not be able to deliver a first choice of colour and size.  We will let you know, on this page, if this happens.

story:
Short Summary

Hello. I'm Lil Mo

I am an Austin A60 half ton van. Well I was until Torcars converted me into an A60 camper van along with 149 other Austin A60 vans.

Torcars was formed at the end of 1968 by Ron & Mary Webster and Alan & Dr Margaret Hutchinson. 
At the time It was government policy to try and get businesses to move to rural regions, where jobs were desperately needed. Ron & Alan, liked what they saw at Great Torrington, in Devon, a three-acre factory site, a little over two miles, from the town at High Bullen. They insisted on having extra land beside the factory, for a camp site for potential customers to camp.

In April 1969, Torcars moved to Torrington, and into temporary premises, an old disused bakery in South Street, while the factory at High Bullen was being built for them. They started by producing 150 SunTor campers based on the Austin/Morris A60 half-ton van, of which I am one.
They went on to produce the Marina SunTor, Commer SunTor Major & HiTor, Sherpa BrenTor & SunTor, and the Toyota Hi-ace SunTor. 

During the winter and quiet periods, Torcars were "makers of quality handmade wooden toys" in there cabinet shop. With the brand name "Tortoys of Torrington", they produced such things as childrens Blackboard & easel's, Desk & chair's, Stilts, etc. As far as is known, the Tortoys was only sold through Harrods of London.

By the end of 1979, Torcars had ceased trading, and in January 1980, Brownhills of Newark, became the new owners, who bought Torcars for the SunTor brand name.

What We Need & What You Get

So there is a bit about how I came to look like this.
We are not sure how many of us are left running but I have seen only two others like me at shows so far, although there have been rumours that as many as 12 have been known to show up at the annual Suntor camping holiday.

Thing is, I am a bit poorly, quite a big bit poorly and If I am to be kept on the road I will need some help from fellow enthusiasts of historical vehicles and camper nuts.
With a new factory boxed engine installed last year, my heart is strong and although I have pretty much been rebuilt from the inside over the last few years, my frame and body contours are not what they used to be.

First up are my underneath bits. Although most of my chassis is still quite solid, the front end needs to be reinforced with some serious welding and cutting away to prevent rust from moving further up towards the other end.
My owner has spent the last year collecting all my shiny new front bits, faring, valance, grill etc and a few of my underneath bits, crossmembers, outriggers and brackets. She has also bought two new sills only to discover that, after cutting away the rot, the inner sills are not looking pretty either and will also need some quite serious surgery.

Right now I am literally in bits and although some of the work has already been carried out, the restoration is at a standstill with the hope and a prayer that my knights in shining chrome will come to my rescue...

I am a rare and beautiful thing and I always raise a smile and a giggle when I drive past folk on the street or race along at 40MPH on the motorway. I don't mind this, they are not laughing at me I just have the 'happy' effect on people which is not such a bad thing.

So here is what I need to get me rolling again.
£2000 will get the chassis in order and all my shiny new bits welded into place. This is a heroic start and although I will look a bit like a patchwork toy car, I will once again be roadworthy.
£3500 will help with a little cosmetic surgery and not only would I be rolling again but I would look pretty cute too.
Anything above that target of course would help restore me to my former glory, which is an ongoing project of re-chroming, body panel restoration, electrics, interior, etc etc etc
For now though I need to be saved from the rust demons and that is what I am hoping I can achieve with the help of the indiegogo community.

Risks & Challenges

As with all vehicles of my age, until the surgery begins we can't be totally sure of the extent of the corrosion and costs involved.  
My mechanic has had a good poke around and is confident that a maximum of £2500 will get me through the MOT.  If this target is not reached then we will make up the difference somehow and the remaining  restoration will have to happen in stages. BUT IT WILL HAPPEN!
If I can keep rolling and my engine ticking over, I'm still breathing!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially that's okay but if you would be so kind as to spread the word to folk who may be able to help by using the Indiegogo share tools and sharing my Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/lilmoa60/ That would be a fantastic help and I thank you.
