story:
Hey Indiegogo friend,

Thanks for checking out my project.

It’s been a wild ride, starting with my noticing that 30% of all clothing garments made into this world consumers don’t want to buy, that is 25 billion pieces each year meaning 32.000 Boeings 747 in KG. Say what?! AND the vast majority of even expensive fashion is made with poor materials.

Before I knew it – and without much prior-knowledge – I was trying to find a European factory to make the superior product I had in mind. So far, so good.

Fast forward and 2200 hours later, I've got unique graphic designs, the high quality fabrics and knowledge, and found a factory that needs this product as much as I need them... I just need €11.111,- to start producing your favorite T-shirts.

Please support at whatever level you're comfortable with. I'll sent your unique Zero Waste T-shirt, crafted for comfort with super-high organic quality materials you’re going to love. If you’ve got the time though, be sure to read the info below as well, it’s wordy but worth it.

Ready for the best part? Beyond this opening order, for every 111 pieces I sell, I can give two Children education for a year, so they can become whatever they want to be, instead of being forced working from the age of 7. Just imagine what a different life this child will have.

Thanks for your support and enjoy your day! Jeroen

 

TSHARED.EU Zero Waste T-shirt is....

1. A Super Premium and unique graphic T-shirt made with only the finest of organic materials. It will grow into you the way your favorite T-shirt should — getting softer with wear, and keeps on adding stories along the way

2. Transparency about our suppliers and margins on our products. Only then YOU as a consumer are able to make the right decision to buy a product.

3. Built to last, every T-shirt tells a story, your story, please share it with us, we are proud of our products, our customers, YOU!

4. Zero Waste. There is a 30% overproduction in the fashion industry,. Companies have systematically lowered your expectations about the quality of fashion clothes you buy to the point where it's hard to know what to expect anymore.It ends here NOW and it starts with a T-shirt!.

5. A smarter way to BUY. You choose what we produce, a limited and unique tshirt on demand, made just for you!!

6. A better way to manufacture - right here in Europe! By letting you choose what we produce we can shorten the supply chain, add value to other people's lives, and build a stronger connection between buyers and artists all at once.

7. A game changer. No more competing with fast fashion. Let's slow down, make things worth keeping, back them with a better level of service and become a trendsetter!

8. If you decide after five years , that you would like a new T-shirt and send it back to us we will give you 11% discount on your next purchase. Don't worry it is in good hands, we will Reuse, Recycle or Upcycle your T-shirt.

9. Always limited and numbered edition T-shirts. Only 111 pieces will be made per graphic design, per T-shirt color. So you know you are 1 very lucky person of the 111 in this world who bought this unique graphic T-shirt How cool is that!

 

Our thank you gifts (Perks)

 

 

To thank you for your generosity, I want to give you these great gifts:

From a PDF file how to reduce your own Co 2 Emission by 50% while washing, to our unique limited and numbered Graphic T-shirts and......

Even an exclusive “print your own T-shirt workshop” with Shon Price traditional graphic designer and me.

To make a difference into this world and help Tshared with her mission on our way to Zero Waste, simply choose your contribution level on the right column (under PERKS) and we will send you your gift in the next few months.

By helping Tshared you also help our Mother Earth. It is time for action right NOW, and then our children can also enjoy Mother Earth the day after tomorrow. THANK YOU!

 

 

Tshared her first Line Up:

 

 

Nr1. The Leave Everything is connected

 

 

 

 

Nr. 3 Women Faces

 

 

 

Back site....

 

 

Men Line Up....

 
Nr. 1 The Leave Everythig is connected

 

Nr. 2 Zero Waste

What size am I?

 

Vision Tshared.eu: Why do we exist!

“ we inspire, educate, reduce overproduction, make unique high quality clothing on demand , are circular, contribute and connect, cause no unnecessary harm to planet and people "

 

Mission Tshared.eu: Zero Waste Fashion!

 

I know what my dream is: — Zero Waste fashion. And I know I  can’t get there all by myself. Fact is Tshared still is a small player in the global fashion industry. I want the big players to commit to Zero Waste as well. I want to prove to them that there is a better way, a smarter way to BUY. Here’s how my roadmap to Zero Waste looks like.

Phase 1: Create awareness. Through it’s beautiful and unique T-shirts Tshared communicates it’s Zero Waste message, always and everywhere. Together with create blogs, video’s and other high quality content this will create awareness around Zero Waste. I also want you to enjoy your favorite t-shirt for as long as possible. For this I will help you take excellent care of your T-shirt with my great tips.

Phase 2: Transparency from Seed to Tee. Because I want Tshared to be transparent about the total supply chain, I’ll  show you how your t-shirt is being produced and who makes your t-shirts. I believe that humans like you and me want to know the story behind the product you buy, because humans like to connect with other human beings and we love a good story.

Phase 3: Be a role model. We love to be inspired by our fellow human beings who set an example. I want Tshared to be that role model and raise the awareness around doing business and contributing to the world at the same time. But I cannot achieve a Zero Waste fashion industry by myself. I need your support, please join me NOW!

What we do! 

Concept: Tshared is an online platform which works together with unique  Graphic designers, and produces organic T-shirts which are sustainable and socially responsible and handpicked by YOU!

I what to connect and create with you! I worked in the fashion industry since 1996, I had the privilege to work for several international fashion companies and I have seen with my own eyes, that their is no real connection with the consumers. Fashion companies just make products and try to convince YOU with a lot of expensive marketing to buy them, without asking YOUR opinion what you think of this product. Research shows that 30% of the produced garments YOU don't want to buy. By letting you choose what Tshared will produce, Tshared is able to save 30% WASTE.

My promise!

My FIRST GOAL of €11.111,-  is needed to start producing the first batch of 111 unique graphic T-shirts, kickstart Tshared and give 2 children education for one full year through the Honest Clothing Foundation.

 

Financial Transparency circle of cost T-shirt

I believe that if you want to make a conscious decision you need to be informed about the price structure of the T-shirts and products you buy in general. That is why I’ll show you how I spend your money and what everybody earns on a product. Imagine if all companies would do this!

 

 
Finacial Transparency Retail Mark up / Gross Profit (How much do we earn on 1 T-shirt)
I believe that if you want to make a conscious decision you need to be informed about the price structure of the T-shirts and products you buy in general. Below you are able to see how we devide the margin on our T-shirt after the production cost and what we really earn on a T-shirt. Imagine if all companies would do this!

 
Financial Transparency cost and earnings of our campaign
This is something no other crowdfunding campaign has ever done. And maybe there is a good reason not to do, let's find out!
This is how our earnings look like if we reach our 3 goals:

                                                       Break Even   1st Goal      2sc Goal    Ultimate Goal

 Amount Funded                         € 5.780,-      € 11.111,-     € 60.000,-   € 100.000,-

Fee IndieGoGo & Paypal Fee     € 578,-        € 1.111,-        € 6.000,-       € 10.000,-

Production Cost                        € 2.700,-      € 5.633,-       € 33.799,-     € 50.699,-

Cost produce campaign         € 2.000,-     € 2.000,-        € 2.000,-        € 2.000,-

Unforeseen expenses                 € 500,-         € 500,-            € 500,-            € 500,-

Earnings Tshared                             € 2,-       € 1.866,-     € 17.701,-      € 36.801,-

Investments done with earnings campaign!

This is how we are going to invest your money from  the earnings of this campaign.
Earnings Tshared                      € 2,-       € 1.866,-     € 17.701,-      € 36.801,-
Investments:
Break even € 2,-    buy a Icecream yummie       
1st Goal € 1.866,-  invest in online platform Tshared.eu
2sc Goal € 17.701,- working capital, do marketing, outsource customer service
Ultimate Goal € 36.801,- buy a printer, do marketing, look for own production , working capital, and outsource customer service

Time Line!

  • Campaign starts 11th of September
  • Campaign ends 22nd of October
  • Survey goes out 23th of October
  • Survey feedback on the 28th of October
  • Production begins 31st of October
  • Production completed end of November
  • T-shirts arrive at Tshared HQ early December
  • T-shirts shipped to backers early December, in time to be your CHRISTMAS present

From the people: Why I choose Tshared?
"Tshared gives creative persons a online platform to express themselves. It is a great example of sharing, which gives an added value to both. And for me it is important that the products are being produced in a honest way. And Jeroen is a really nice guy" Rebecca Solcer

Team! 

 

I strongly believe to be successful with your business you need to have a great team that is prepared to cooperate.

I found some great people who joined me to fulfill the Zero Waste mission of Tshared.eu. Together we can do this!

 
Tshared is here to contribute and to connect!

 

I believe that we are on this earth for a purpose. I would like to be a role model for my children and want them to be proud of me as their father. My legacy will be that I changed the fashion system towards Zero Waste and contributed and provided education for at least 1 million children through my donations to the Honest Clothing Foundation. Just Imagine- how many new teachers, designers, nurses, doctors, entrepreneurs these schools will bring into this world.

 

 

What can you do?

Here are a few ways in which you can make a impact, difference into this world:

1. Contribute!

 

A great place to start is to contribute and get one of our awesome gifts.

Simply choose your contribution level on the right column and I will send you your gift in the next few months.

2. Share and refer friends and win an EXCLUSIVE PRINT YOUR T-SHIRT workshop! (Travel expences not included)

I’m  running a referral contest where you can win this prize:

 

An exclusive “print your own T-shirt workshop” with  Shon Price traditional graphic designer and me.

How does it work?

Make sure you are logged in to your IndieGoGo account.

If you don't have an IndieGoGo account, go and register one by clicking here.

When you are finished, come back to this page.

At the top of this page use the share buttons to share this campaign.

You can use the social media buttons, next to the BACK IT button, but also the Link button to generate your unique link that points to this page.

Each time you share the campaign with these links - we will track them.

Important! We are awarding the prize to those who get the most people to contribute to this campaign to qualify - your network should donate together at least €500,-)

So spread the word as far and wide as you can!

Questions and answers

 

How can I pay?

We accept Paypal and major credit cards.

I don't have a Paypal account, What to do?

In 5 easy steps you can open an Paypal account please click here to create one. If it doesn't work for what ever reason please send me an E-mail at crowdfunding@tshared.eu and we will find a solution. Thanks for your support!

Can I keep track of the progress of the Tshared campaign and what happens afterwards?

Yes! We’ll keep you up to date on our progress over the coming weeks so you know how the campaign is doing. We'll also be regularly posting videos, blogs and social media updates.

Can I donate from anywhere?

Anywhere in the world and at any time before 14th of October 2016.

How do you know my size?

Good question, we don't but we will send out a survey to you right after the campaign ends and then you will tell us your size right?

When and how will I receive my gift?

The PDF will be send to you directly via E-mail.

You will receive the gift cards via E-mail end of November 2016.

 

We will produce your selected T-shirt as soon as the campaign is over. For this we need time but we’ll ship it before Christmas 2016, making it a perfect Christmas present. I'll keep you posted through email and facebook!

How much will be contributed to the Honest Clothing Foundation?

From every T-shirt that has been bought by you Tshared will donate €5,- to the Honest Clothing Foundation to give these children education thanks to YOU.

Which materials are being used for the production of the T-shirts?

We use GOTS certified cotton which guarantees the materials that are being used are Eco friendly and prodced under the right circumstances withour pesticides, chemicals that harm your body.

 

What about shipping cost?

Unfortunately for the international customers (outside EU) we have to charge some shipping cost, international customers will have to pay shipping f.i. a package to Dubai cost €60,- In cases such as those, we reserve the right to ask for a bit more to ship the T-shirt out in the first place, once actual and final shipping costs have been calculated. Unfortunately, this can't be done in advance as shipping costs vary by country and Indiegogo doesn't tell us where you are until after the funding period has closed. We will not be making money on shipping though and will be transparent about these costs.   

 

I would like to donate more then €2,222,- how?

Super fantastic, you can donate any amount you wish by clicking this link.

I like your project and mission so much I would like to become a partner, how?

 

You are the best! Thank you for your interest and the appreciation for our mission. Please send me a privat E-mail and let's have a cup of coffee to get to know each other and talk about the strength of co creation.

What if I'm the only one who bought this print?

 

Great question. Tshared her mission is Zero Waste, we want to presell at least 90 pieces out of the max 111 pieces per print. In this case we will contact you and will ask you if you would like to receive another print from us.

 

Do you have any other questions?

Please post any other question you have in the comments box and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.

We really appreciate your support!

Thank you for taking care of our planet!
story_txt:
Hey Indiegogo friend,Thanks for checking out my project.It’s been a wild ride, starting with my noticing that 30% of all clothing garments made into this world consumers don’t want to buy, that is 25 billion pieces each year meaning 32.000 Boeings 747 in KG. Say what?! AND the vast majority of even expensive fashion is made with poor materials.Before I knew it – and without much prior-knowledge – I was trying to find a European factory to make the superior product I had in mind. So far, so good.Fast forward and 2200 hours later, I've got unique graphic designs, the high quality fabrics and knowledge, and found a factory that needs this product as much as I need them... I just need €11.111,- to start producing your favorite T-shirts.Please support at whatever level you're comfortable with. I'll sent your unique Zero Waste T-shirt, crafted for comfort with super-high organic quality materials you’re going to love. If you’ve got the time though, be sure to read the info below as well, it’s wordy but worth it.Ready for the best part? Beyond this opening order, for every 111 pieces I sell, I can give two Children education for a year, so they can become whatever they want to be, instead of being forced working from the age of 7. Just imagine what a different life this child will have.Thanks for your support and enjoy your day! Jeroen TSHARED.EU Zero Waste T-shirt is....1. A Super Premium and unique graphic T-shirt made with only the finest of organic materials. It will grow into you the way your favorite T-shirt should — getting softer with wear, and keeps on adding stories along the way2. Transparency about our suppliers and margins on our products. Only then YOU as a consumer are able to make the right decision to buy a product.3. Built to last, every T-shirt tells a story, your story, please share it with us, we are proud of our products, our customers, YOU!4. Zero Waste. There is a 30% overproduction in the fashion industry,. Companies have systematically lowered your expectations about the quality of fashion clothes you buy to the point where it's hard to know what to expect anymore.It ends here NOW and it starts with a T-shirt!.5. A smarter way to BUY. You choose what we produce, a limited and unique tshirt on demand, made just for you!!6. A better way to manufacture - right here in Europe! By letting you choose what we produce we can shorten the supply chain, add value to other people's lives, and build a stronger connection between buyers and artists all at once.7. A game changer. No more competing with fast fashion. Let's slow down, make things worth keeping, back them with a better level of service and become a trendsetter!8. If you decide after five years , that you would like a new T-shirt and send it back to us we will give you 11% discount on your next purchase. Don't worry it is in good hands, we will Reuse, Recycle or Upcycle your T-shirt.9. Always limited and numbered edition T-shirts. Only 111 pieces will be made per graphic design, per T-shirt color. So you know you are 1 very lucky person of the 111 in this world who bought this unique graphic T-shirt How cool is that! Our thank you gifts (Perks) 
 
To thank you for your generosity, I want to give you these great gifts:
From a PDF file how to reduce your own Co 2 Emission by 50% while washing, to our unique limited and numbered Graphic T-shirts and......
Even an exclusive “print your own T-shirt workshop” with Shon Price traditional graphic designer and me.
To make a difference into this world and help Tshared with her mission on our way to Zero Waste, simply choose your contribution level on the right column (under PERKS) and we will send you your gift in the next few months.
By helping Tshared you also help our Mother Earth. It is time for action right NOW, and then our children can also enjoy Mother Earth the day after tomorrow. THANK YOU!

Nr. 3 Women Faces
 

 
 
Back site....

story:
Kingsley Clothing is a unique California lifestyle kids clothing brand that embraces art, action sports, and music with STYLE, COMFORT & ATTITUDE.

 

STORY: The Kingsley brand was born in 2004, after the birth of Kingsley Aarons' son Zephyr who inspired the line.  With a background in fine art, graphic design, photography, and men's contemporary sportswear design, Kingsley has designed a line that reflects OUR generation's culture and fashion sense. The Kingsley brand has filled a void in children's clothing with a brand that is FUN, STYLISH, and OUTSPOKEN.

In 2006 the Kingsley brand was injected with a boost of worldwide recognition by Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie's daughter Shilo, wearing a Kingsley tee on the cover of People magazine. At this time, Kingsley had its fair share of celebrity press, but this editorial coverage placed Kingsley into celebrity status and boosted sales and revenue.

 

In 2009 we had to take a break due to that nasty recession.  We are NOW ready to relaunch the Kingsley brand with a lean and mean business model. We narrowed our distribution and focused on creating quality product at a reasonable price.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is a modest $10,000. We’ve kept this goal relatively small because overspending on office furniture is a thing of the past. The majority of these funds are going directly to production, which includes, blank tee shirts, screen printing, ticketing, hang tagging, poly bags, info labels, and shipping items to name a few.

With a contribution you will receive an exclusive limited Kingsley item. Your contribution will go a long way and your little rocker gets to look and feel awesome. 

We really appreciate you checking us out. If you are not able to contribute, please FORWARD and SHARE to any and all social media to get the word out and make some noise about the Kingsley campaign. Don’t forget about the Indiegogo share tools and check out the perks below.

Thank you from all of us at Kingsley!!

story:
Fits the most popular electric toothbrush brands

including Oral B! 

 

AVAILABLE NOW!

 

The Schelle Electric Toothbrush travel case is the result of 25 plus years on the road. Years of trying every conceivable way to carry my electric toothbrush without it switching on accidentally, draining the battery and causing huge embarrassment as fellow travellers try to guess what’s vibrating in my case!

Indiegogo is the platform to launch our new family venture and to spread the word that at long last a simple solution to an annoying travel problem is here at last. Our simple solution is stylish , bright and practical. Its time to recycle that plastic bag and put pleasure into packing.

Our Schelle Electric Toothbrush travel case is the first of our simple solutions. There are more stylish products on the way.

We hope you’ll join us on the trip.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Designed and Produced in the East Midlands

 

We are incredibly proud of Schelle. A family business through and through. 

Our aim is to spread the word and introduce Schelle to customers around the world.

The money we raise will allow us to expand and develop the Schelle Collection, solving more problems with stylish solutions.

We have had lots of feedback on Schelle, and the key area has been the issue of charger storage. With your funding, we will be able to research and develop a stylish charger storage solution, as part of The Schelle Collection.

 

 

 

 

 

We understand that not everyone will be able to contribute, but can you help us create some buzz?

Help us spread the word by using our social channels on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram or via Email.

          

@schellebox    #myschelle

 

We really appreciate all your support, and will be regularly updating this page with news and photos. Watch this space!

We hope that you love your Schelle Box. If for any reason your unhappy, please contact info@schelle.co.uk and we will be happy to assist you.

Years of trying every conceivable way to carry my electric toothbrush without it switching on accidentally, draining the battery and causing huge embarrassment as fellow travellers try to guess what’s vibrating in my case!Indiegogo is the platform to launch our new family venture and to spread the word that at long last a simple solution to an annoying travel problem is here at last. Our simple solution is stylish , bright and practical. Its time to recycle that plastic bag and put pleasure into packing.Our Schelle Electric Toothbrush travel case is the first of our simple solutions. There are more stylish products on the way.We hope you’ll join us on the trip.          Designed and Produced in the East Midlands We are incredibly proud of Schelle. A family business through and through. Our aim is to spread the word and introduce Schelle to customers around the world.The money we raise will allow us to expand and develop the Schelle Collection, solving more problems with stylish solutions.We have had lots of feedback on Schelle, and the key area has been the issue of charger storage. With your funding, we will be able to research and develop a stylish charger storage solution, as part of The Schelle Collection.     We understand that not everyone will be able to contribute, but can you help us create some buzz?Help us spread the word by using our social channels on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram or via Email.          @schellebox    #myschelle We really appreciate all your support, and will be regularly updating this page with news and photos. Watch this space!We hope that you love your Schelle Box. If for any reason your unhappy, please contact info@schelle.co.uk and we will be happy to assist you.

story:
Important Notice: The first issue will be printed on the 30th September 2016, perks with print advertising will be for our second issue. if you are interested in advertising in our first issue, please contact me directly: siennadelorpaz@gmail.com

The Impact

The Editor was created by two editors Sienna De L’Orpaz and Dolly Mirpuri who noticed a troubling consistency in publications: all the models are skinny beyond imagination, light skinned, blue eyed, and tower at 6 feet tall. Even living in Asia, most publications and castings favor Caucasian models over Asian. Publications flock to the reigning fashion houses for advertising and clothing for editorials, while small, innovative, and groundbreaking small-time designers have to resort to blogs and other forms of social media where their presence isn’t taken seriously.

Large-scale transitions in societies are associated with both individual behavioral change and restructuring of the social network. Our mission is to make that transition and restructuring within the industry to bring ethnic diversity and body diversity into the fashion industry so that it’s not merely obligatory. To tell, not only magazines, but also other media systems that society is ready for them to be wholly representative of the diverse communities that they serve, opposed to the homogeneous, unrealistic population currently represented. Contrary to popular belief, magazines aren’t embracing diversity. From 2014 to 2015 there was only a 0.1% Improvement in diversity on magazine covers (From 19.7% to 19.8%).

The fashion industry and its publications are still discriminating; and an imbalanced and sometimes even unhealthy ideal of beauty is being pushed onto vulnerable young girls, women, and even men all over the world. “Ethnic women on the cover don’t sell magazines.” That mainstream market propaganda masquerading as fact has long been accepted as truth, but we don’t buy it. There is a long way to go in shifting the perception of beauty but we want to lead by example; we want to challenge the ideals of beauty and fashion into a much more colorful, accepting, diverse image. We want a change.

We want to be a diverse publication: One that is inclusive of minorities and people in content, employment, and, even ownership. We don’t only want to present diversity in the end result, we want to be the definition of diversity as a company to reflect the broad communities that we serve and represent. As a matter of fact, we believe that the disproportionate lack of women and minority owners is a direct cause of the lack of diverse voices, images and viewpoints. We want to change the homogeneous and racialised hierarchies of beauty that permeate the high fashion industry.

We want small brands to be appreciated and heard as much as the big fashion houses. We want models of all sizes, races, genders, and cultures. We want you, our readers, to model high fashion clothes and feel as beautiful as Giselle or Bar, because you are. In every Issue we will feature a high fashion editorial with real people you can relate to. We will use curvy, large, light skinned, dark skinned, redheads, freckled faces, albinos, trans-gendered men and women, and more to promote a more inclusive and respectful idea of diversity.



What’s in the first issue?

Our first issue of The Editor explores conformity, and the rebellion against it.

“Conformity is a type of social influence involving a change in belief or behavior in order to fit in with a group.This change is in response to real (involving the physical presence of others) or imagined (involving the pressure of social norms / expectations) group pressure. The term conformity is often used to indicate an agreement to the majority position, brought about either by a desire to ‘fit in’ or be liked (normative) or because of a desire to be correct (informational), or simply to conform to a social role (identification).”

We felt that the word conformity was a great subject to explore in our first issue. You will find editorials, articles, visuals, interviews, features and more exploring the subject. We focus on designers, artists, curators, musicians, and people of different cultures from all over the world.

The Editor Print

The Editor Publishing will publish The Editor Magazine: The first intercultural high fashion magazine. The magazine is high gloss, 80-100 pages, contemporary in look and appeal. Quality fashion and editorial content that is rich in diverse voices, viewpoints, and images is the constant goal. The magazine will be entertaining and newsworthy, inspiration invoking, and thought provoking. It will appeal to a broad readership.

In year 3, The Editor Publishing will release an annual hardcover book, along with paperback books with hardcover limited edition versions. Contemporary high fashion as well as diversity and body image themes will prevail particularly those that contemplate the demands and ideals forced onto men and women by the industry.

The Editor Digital

Both The Editor’s website and digital replica edition will be compatible with a range of mobile and tablet devices. Our digital replicas are high quality, page-turning versions of the print edition. Some titles feature enhancements, including video, image galleries, and web links. In year 2, our digital editions will come in two varieties – digital replicas or interactive iPad editions.

TheEditorMagazine.com

TheEditorMagazine.com has been soft launched approximately two weeks ago for market validation. We are proud to announce that we have been reaching our target audience internationally and are already read in 14 countries. Since our website has only been soft-launched it still does not have all the content uploaded, and we will launch it officially together with the print magazine in October, so bear with us!

Once fully launched, TheEditorMagazine.com will be updated at least once per day along with related social media and media channels. The Editor Magazine’s interactive website will include premier editorials, interviews, and articles from every issue as well as original content including behind the scenes footage, exclusive interviews, music, culture, art and fashion videos, plus branded features such as: Feature Friday, The Editor Interviews, Editor’s Choice, Mini Documentary Series, backstage fashion week coverage. As added value, we offer a wide variety of custom content for advertisers.

How will The Editor Magazine Allocate the Money?

We need your help making The Editor Magazine a reality.

This would be how the money will be divided, roughly:

  • Equipment 20%
  • Production Fees 25%
  • Printing & Shipping 25%
  • DTP (Desktop Publishing) 15%
  •  Editing and Proofreading 15%

Risks & Challenges

As with any project, there are risks involved with this crowd funding campaign. We might not be able to deliver the end product in a timely fashion, or we might run into problems with shipping and therefore we might experience delays. However, we have been working hard to make sure that doesn’t happen!

I want to write for The Editor. How can I help?

You can contact us at The Editor at Editor@theeditormagazine.com and we can go from there!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about what we are trying to do. It’s super easy; all you have to do is use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share our website (We also have sharing tools, it’s only soft launched, and will be fully launched in October!)
  • Follow us on our social media accounts!
    • Instagram: @theeditormagazine
    • Twitter: TheEditorMag
    • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theeditorthailand/

Some Behind The Scenes Polaroids:


Our T-shirt Prints to Choose From:

Mona Lisnap

story:
The Story

Pantheon was founded when Carrie was planning her wedding and needed gifts for her team of bridesmaids – all seven of them. On the hunt for something beautiful, memorable, and lasting, she decided on accessories as gifts to complement their outfits on the actual day. To her disappointment, she could not find any that could fit her designs in mind. Nothing she found was ‘just what she wanted’.

After spending months trying to find the perfect gift that would reflect her appreciation of their help, Carrie decided to come up with her very own design and have it manufactured. Having been exposed to jewellery design by her jeweller father from young, she enjoyed the process immensely and was estatic about the end product. During the hustle of wedding planning, she found that there were many other brides-to-be facing the same problem. She begun customising jewellery for them and they were well received. Soon after, Pantheon was born.

All Pantheon pieces are designed to impact the wearer with positivity and inspirations about life. Each piece carries with it a message to encourage and help one through any adversity or obstacles in life resulting in a happier soul and a happier life.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise fund in order to continue with the production. The production process is costly for a small quantity to  be manufactured. Hence, we need to raise fund to keep up with the cost of production. All fund raised will be used for cost of production and logistics. Support us and you will be able to purchase it at a lower price. 

The Impact

More often than not, people tend to look for silver plated material accessories as bridesmaid gifts as it is the most affordable option to purchase in bulk. These accessories will tarnish over time and it is unsightly to be worn again. I started Pantheon to help brides to find the perfect bridesmaid jewellery that lasts through the years. 

Risks & Challenges

Besides operating at a high cost of production and keeping it at honest pricing for brides, we also provide warranty and repair for our jewellery. Pantheon believes that we should still continue to provide our service even after a purchase has been completed, so as to ensure that our jewellery can be lasting and suitable for daily use.

Our Designs

story:
Where does the story of these beautiful recycled glass countertops and tables begin?

You’ve probably cooked some spaghetti and poured the sauce out of a glass jar, rinsed it out, and tossed it in the recycling bin, right?

That’s awesome! You’re doing your part to help reduce waste! You might guess it ends up as another pasta jar or beer bottle, right?

Well maybe, but not likely. Most of it gets crushed up and used to create fiberglass, reflective road paint, gravel or cement. It's down-cycled and its story ends there.

In comes Evolution Glass.

We’re reimagining recycled glass by using it to create beautiful, functional art. We’re extending the story of this glass to create unique and innovative surfaces that become the centerpiece of any room. Our surfaces come in a variety of shapes, sizes and colors, and we're just getting started.

 

What’s the process?

We reclaim those sauce jars and wine bottles from a giant pile at the recycling transfer station here in Charlottesville, VA, haul it away in our truck, and take it back to our shop on Broadway Ave. This is where the next chapter begins.

Each container hangs out in our one little dumpster behind the shop. We strip away the foil from all the wine bottles by hand. We dump a bucket full into our glass crusher and out comes a chunky sharp pile. We pour the clear glass base delicately into our mold and sprinkle it with hints of blue, green or brown as we prep this “canvas” for magic. The glass goes into a giant oven. Several days later, after appropriate cooling and incubation, out comes a shiny new panel of glass. Mesmerizing, ethereal and beautiful…from what was once a pile of discarded glass.

Evolution Glass Tables & Countertops

Each of these pieces is in someone's home adding vibrancy, color and light. We've installed counters and delivered tables here in Central Virginia and have projects in Washington D.C., Richmond and Chicago in development.

Evolution Glass Colors

We use a clear glass base and add in brown, green and blue glass to create a variety of spectacular colors and patterns in our surfaces. No other glass surface in the world has this look and appeal. Each piece is unique. 

Our Goals & Your Gifts

We’re aiming for $18,000. When you help us reach that goal here’s where the funds will go:

Another Kiln $8,000

We use this to melt down the glass to make these gorgeous surfaces. This is the big one. If we can get another kiln we’ll be able to produce more glass panels and give more glass a vibrant new story. We'll be able to increase production rates so our cost per square foot will decrease making this awesome and sustainable material available to a wider population.

Crowdfunding Support & Perks $8,100

We’re fortunate to have a team that’s willing to help out without payment up front, but we’ll eventually need to pay them back for their time and efforts. We hired an awesome video production company, Pando Creative, to shoot our pitch video, and Heather has been working on this campaign, mostly unpaid, for nearly a year. We also need funds to cover the costs of all our awesome perks!

Indiegogo and Payment Processing Fees $1,900

Of course Indiegogo takes a cut of our fundraising as do PayPal and our credit card payment processor. These are costs that we can't afford to cover without help! 

If we exceed our goal here's what the funds will go toward

Glass Crusher $14,500

Another super important piece in this puzzle. The glass crusher does just that! It crunches up all the glass we reclaim into tiny bits so we can re-melt it. We hope to purchase a new glass crusher that removes paper and foil for us so we don’t have to do this by hand, which will allow us to dramatically increase our efficiency. Additionally, we had to borrow money from a friend to purchase the one we’re currently using and we need to pay him back.

Equipment and Space $6,825

This effort is all about increasing efficiency and making improvements to our current processes. With this additional money we’ll be able to purchase new mold material that is necessary for creating our glass panels, and reimburse a friend who gave us money to pay for our current mold materials. We need an additional 1000 sq ft of rental space in our current building for storage and equipment. We need a walkie stacker, which helps us carefully stack glass panels in a pallet rack. Finally, we need a glass weighing scale to more effectively weigh the crushed glass for creating the surfaces.

Marketing Support for 1 year $3,600

No one will buy the product if they don’t know about it! We need a dedicated marketing budget so we can continue to get the word out about Evolution Glass.

Your Gifts

We're so grateful for any contribution you can make! In exchange we're offering the following perks. Every donor of at least $5 will have their name included on the donors list on our website.

Our team

Bill has been working to perfect the reuse of recycled glass for surfaces for over 10 years and has been creating glass art since 2000.  Heather came to the project with a marketing and business analyst background excited about the potential to shift global perception about recycled glass. Together they’re excited to launch this campaign in hopes of growing Evolution Glass. A successful campaign means they can reclaim more recycled glass and bring stunning glass surface centerpieces to more homes, offices, restaurants and schools around the world.

Why glass?

The environmental impact of mining and refining stone surfaces like marble and granite is catastrophic. Wooden counter tops, unless they’re from reclaimed wood, mean more carbon for us to breathe and less oxygen to go around. What about those particleboard and laminate counters? What is that even made from? What chemicals are leaching into the air in our homes from that stuff? The lifecycle of glass is infinite and it's readily available and just waiting to be transformed. Evolution Glass countertops and tables are the most sustainable countertop option out there.

What about the energy use and materials to create these surfaces?

We use 50% less energy to create these surfaces than it would take to make a new glass countertop surface. We’re one of only four companies in the world making solid glass surfaces from 100% recycled glass. We don’t use any epoxy, resin or other binding agents to create these surfaces so they're 100% recyclable themselves. Only glass. Glass that we gave a new story.

Risks & Challenges

We need to be able to cover the initial investments made to organize and run this campaign. Our video and marketing teams plus costs for the perks must be reimbursed so without some funding we run the risk of not being able to cover those costs.

However, our business is already up and running. We have successfully produced beautiful and functional glass tables and countertops. If our campaign does not meet the entire funding goal that means we won’t be able to grow, or reclaim a greater percentage of glass, but we’ll still keep making glass countertops.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you might not be able to give us money to help with this campaign, and that’s okay. It’s about more than money for us. It’s about creating awareness on the issue of wasted glass in our communities. It’s about sharing our passion for reusing this amazing material. It’s about showing people that transformation can happen even when you think something is spent. It’s about art, creating connections and sharing beauty with the world. Help us by sharing this campaign with your friends, family and social networks!

In exchange we're offering the following perks. Every donor of at least $5 will have their name included on the donors list on our website.Our teamBill has been working to perfect the reuse of recycled glass for surfaces for over 10 years and has been creating glass art since 2000.  Heather came to the project with a marketing and business analyst background excited about the potential to shift global perception about recycled glass. Together they’re excited to launch this campaign in hopes of growing Evolution Glass. A successful campaign means they can reclaim more recycled glass and bring stunning glass surface centerpieces to more homes, offices, restaurants and schools around the world.Why glass?The environmental impact of mining and refining stone surfaces like marble and granite is catastrophic. Wooden counter tops, unless they’re from reclaimed wood, mean more carbon for us to breathe and less oxygen to go around. What about those particleboard and laminate counters? What is that even made from? What chemicals are leaching into the air in our homes from that stuff? The lifecycle of glass is infinite and it's readily available and just waiting to be transformed. Evolution Glass countertops and tables are the most sustainable countertop option out there.What about the energy use and materials to create these surfaces?We use 50% less energy to create these surfaces than it would take to make a new glass countertop surface. We’re one of only four companies in the world making solid glass surfaces from 100% recycled glass. We don’t use any epoxy, resin or other binding agents to create these surfaces so they're 100% recyclable themselves. Only glass. Glass that we gave a new story.Risks & ChallengesWe need to be able to cover the initial investments made to organize and run this campaign. Our video and marketing teams plus costs for the perks must be reimbursed so without some funding we run the risk of not being able to cover those costs.However, our business is already up and running. We have successfully produced beautiful and functional glass tables and countertops. If our campaign does not meet the entire funding goal that means we won’t be able to grow, or reclaim a greater percentage of glass, but we’ll still keep making glass countertops.Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand that you might not be able to give us money to help with this campaign, and that’s okay. It’s about more than money for us. It’s about creating awareness on the issue of wasted glass in our communities. It’s about sharing our passion for reusing this amazing material. It’s about showing people that transformation can happen even when you think something is spent. It’s about art, creating connections and sharing beauty with the world. Help us by sharing this campaign with your friends, family and social networks!

story:
Short Summary

For as long as I can remember, I’ve always been interested in arts and crafts… As a kid I was always drawing or sketching or building my own toys or costume out of belts and bed sheets.

It was really when I reached middle school that I became fascinated with medieval history, the allure of ancient cultures and their customs, their art and their crafts, that really inspired me to want to learn to do that myself. I started going to renaissance faires and watching documentaries, just trying to immerse myself in it as much as possible. 

I’ve been doing leather working for about 10 years now and have had the pleasure of learning from some real artisans over the years. And recently, I’ve really started to develop my own look and style. Fashion trends always seem to come back around and now with the mainstream success of shows like Game of Thrones and Vikings, the aesthetics of these eras are really starting to become more prominent in the public eye. With Knotted Bone, I’m trying to create products with that flair, a sense of medieval inspiration. My passion is to give you a custom, handmade leather product  that you could use every day and still have a really unique piece of art that not many people in the world will have. And not only leather but incorporating other materials too like chainmaille come into play for making original pieces of jewelry and accessories, really brings the whole image together,

What We Need & What You Get

To make this dream a reality, we have calculated that we will need about $20,000 to cover start up costs and retail space location lease. This will cover small on-site renovations, shelving, tables, furniture, inventory supplies and materials, and some advertising.

We have excellent  perks for donation! You can donate as little as $5 or as much more as you want! each level of donation will receive a personal thanks shout out on all our social media sites, a bumper sticker and lots of different combinations of leather and chainmaille aparrel, custom made just for you.For example, contributors of the $250 or more amount will receive a 20.oz Drinking horn with Custom belt hanger! Contributors of $1000 or more will receive their choice of custom handmade tobacco pipe or birch tree candle holders from sister company Hovegaard Pipeworks, and much more!

If it so happens that we do not reach or monetary goal in the 30 days, what ever we do acrue will be used wisely and efficiently towards the same ends. just know that every little bit helps and is greatly appreciated!

The Impact

Bringing a new and different style and line of unique fashion wear out there for the world will help allow people to express themselves in new and bold ways, making a statement about who they are and what they love, There needs to be more of this kind of product available to the public!

Risks & Challenges

As with any new small business, there are some risks involved. Especially when dealing with a new product that is relatively unknown to the general public. However, I believe with the right advertising and having a physical location to go to and see and feel these new goods first hand will really help to skyrocket its popularity.

Having been a patron and artisan in medieval festivals and the renegade fashion scene for most of my life, I have seen the call and genuine interest in cultivating such crafts into businesses where people can easily go to obtain the type of products they love. We are at the forefront of this new and ever growing wave of popularity.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you simply cant donate, that's ok, we are no strangers to tough times! You can still help in enormous ways if you want to still see this succeed. Share, share, and share some more...The more this campaign gets out there the more it can potentially earn! 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Our internal mechanism is the Seiko NH35-A. The best possible movement in our price range for our desires. As self proclaimed horologists, this movement is unbeatable for the value it provides.

Our movement was a crucial aspect in our designing process. When selecting our movement we we're in search for the following things:

  • Value - Had to keep our price-point under $250 (Retail)  
  • Depth-Resistance (Must be able to work under professional regulation divers watches requirements)  
  • Quality - This movement is truly a powerhouse. There are nothing but positive reviews from horology forums with regards the Seiko NH35-A.

  • Visual representation of the Seiko NH35-A Rotor Movement upon daily wear.

  • Powered by you, the Ascent Pro will never miss a minute. With daily wear our 41 hour power reserve with hand wind-able hacking will prevent this timepiece from ever missing a beat. With the quality components in the Ascent Pro there will be no adventure to big to stand in your way of wearing it.

  • We spent over 400 hours developing the design for the Ascent Pro. Combining elements from our favorite timepieces into a collaborative modern diver using the highest quality materials.

Using Diving Grade 316L (ISO 6425 Tested) our watches will only get better looking with age. Using a rigorous polishing technique our watches are as soft as steel can get.

  • Function was incredibly important and we believe we've made the best bang for buck dive watch possible in our price range. We also focused extensively on the Ascent Pro's appearance during our designing process. Implementing elements from classic watches to our favorite diver watches we have incorporated functional elements whilst remaining visually striking.

  • We noticed Divers weren't focusing on maintaining function whilst improving on aesthetics. It was mostly one or the other. We combined both aspects with the Ascent Pro.

  • Our watches were designed with cost efficiency in mind. We could have chosen more expensive components and charged a higher price but we wanted to include multiple budgets into our target demographic. Considering our components and aesthetic our prices are super competitive to the industry standards. We stand by our value and will continue to develop projects with price point in mind.

We started developing this campaign in August of 2015. After months of research and development, countless prototypes and many pots of coffee, we are now ready to bring the Ascent Pro to Indiegogo!

  • With our projections your Ascent Pro will arrive March 2017. This timeline may be subject to faster arrival changes if everything goes as projected.

  • Designing from scratch is something a lot of companies cannot say they accomplish. We have designed every component of this watch down to the bolts that hold it all together. We believe in craftsmanship and we stand by that belief with the Ascent Pro.

  • Using 3D software we have designed and perfected the Ascent Pro. We've undergone 5 different renditions and ultimately selected our final design on usability and it's performance whilst worn.

  • Black on Black - Our Recon Edition is perfect for any occasion. Brushed & Polished Black Stainless Steel give this watch a clean and sleek appearance.

  • Silver on Silver - Polished and Brushed our Slate Silver is our signature piece. Designed in Toronto we believe this is the perfect rendition of what a dive watch should encompass.

Gold on Gold - This is our most elegant option of the Ascent Pro. Featuring Polished Rose Gold and a Graphite Grey Bezel and face this is an eye grabber.

  • An anti-reflective or anti-reflection (AR) coating is a type of optical coating applied to the surface of lenses and other optical devices to reduce reflection.

  • This improves the efficiency of the Luminous display since less light is lost, the reduction in reflections also improves the contrast of the image by elimination of stray light. Rain or shine, your Ascent Pro will be clear.

  • We are a community driven brand committed on bringing forward what you want to see in a watch company. We have learned allot since our last campaign and plan on putting what we've learned to the test with this campaign on Indiegogo

  • We want to give our backers the ability to have a voice, we are very interested in hearing your feedback and also pros/cons with regards to our creations. We are always striving to improve and believe we've succeeded with that venture with the creation of the Ascent Pro. Our last campaign the C-SERIES was a great success. Here are some of the reviews our amazing backers have left us from Kickstarter: (Names blurred for Privacy)

  • Reaching our funding goal is just the start to what we have planned for the campaign. We plan on continuously enhancing your experience with the Ascent Pro. Here are a few examples how:

 

Risks and challenges?

The release of the Ascent Pro marks our second crowdfunding project. We have spent the past year developing and perfecting our strategy required to accomplish this project and we are prepared for the tasks ahead. Our last project was successfully funded on Kickstarter. We are exploring our alternatives and have decided to launch the Ascent Pro on Indiegogo.

Challenges may include shipping deadlines, import and export as well as customer service contact being available 24/7. We are confident in our ability as a team to co-ordinate designated tasks to limit our potential for failure. We are prepared for the growth that we expect this project to have from our last project.

story:
I got the idea to invent Ready-Tee while playing golf with friends and seeing the frustration on their faces when one of the players didn't have a tee on him.  Everyone thinks we're losing time. I could just hear some saying, "Hurry up I got to get home in time for dinner."

My goal is to raise enough funds to mass produce Ready-Tee and place it on the hands of over 60 million golfers in the US. Plus creating hundreds of jobs in the US in particular hiring the under privileged and help them obtain an education. The funds are needed to purchase the machinery, equipment, and inventory to manufacture Ready-Tee in the United States and not rely on outsourcing to other countries.  Ready-Tee will be a Made in the USA product and job creator. 

Ready Tee can be customized with your own school or company logos.  They can function as a great promotional giveaway.  

Ready Tee has even been used by some professional golfers.  

 

Ready Tee was a winner of the McAllen Innovative Grant Award. 

Ready Tee can be anywhere you can clip it onto.

story:
My wife and I have run a marketing agency for 20 years. Our customers have included Porsche Cars North America, Home Depot, Mizuno USA, and many others. You can visit our website www.KarenImages.com for more info.

In 2016 we decided we wanted to do something more meaningful than helping corporations market their brands. We wanted to market something that mattered to us, Disc Golf. The question was, who on earth would ever hire us to market Disc Golf to the world?

We couldn't answer that question either. So, with every marketing principle we ever learned, we developed a brand to produce and sell Disc Golf Lifestyle merchandise to help other people build free public Disc Golf Courses. After developing the brand we wrote and filmed a comedy piece about a novelty product made by the brand that many in the sport would love to have, if it could only be real. We bought an airduster for $6.99 from an auto parts store, wrapped a label on it and shot a scene for CHEENGZ Organic Tree Repellent. Then more and more jokes started coming to us, and, the impossible started seeming like it might be possible!

The First CHEENGZ Challenge

Redan Disc Golf Course was one of the first courses I played in 1994. When we learned they needed new signs for their tee pads we wanted to help. Our first campaign is to fund 18 new signs for the Historic Redan Disc Golf Course just outside Atlanta, GA.

Back To The Brand

If you have ever played disc golf you have heard the sound "CHEENGZ" made by the disc as it hits the chains of the target "basket". When you play disc golf long enough this sound begins to ring in your dreams. The logo we created represents 4 main elements of the sport:

  • The sound of a successful throw landing in the basket "CHEENGZ"
  • The word CHEENGZ in caps embodies the shape of a disc golf putter
  • The triangle, CHEENGZ, and stem elements combine to represent a disc golf basket
  • The double circles surrounding the logo transforms everything into a disc golf driver

We believe these elements combine to create a successful Disc Golf Lifestyle brand that has the ability to build at least one public Disc Golf Course every single year. We aim to prove this brand and business model can fund the building of Disc Golf Courses across America.

What Will We Build?

Because we are starting only with an idea and the hope for support from people like you, our goal for 2017 is to fund the installation of one 9 hole disc golf course somewhere in the USA.

Why Only a 9-hole Disc Golf Course?

A 9-hole course is the easiest to build in terms of the amount of land needed from a park for a course footprint, as well as the capital necessary to build it. 

And while we know 18 holes are necessary for a tournament quality course, we believe it is better to seed 9 hole courses on public property that have room for expansion to 18 or more holes. We believe if you plant a course the course will grow itself if nurtured by the community. The first course we played was a 9 hole course in Marietta, GA located within the extra green space of the baseball fields at Oregon Park. This little course had 9 baskets and 54 earthen tee pads in 1994. Today it has 36 baskets and 36 concrete tee pads that form four different courses thanks to the commitment of the amazing volunteers comprising the Cobb Disc Golf Club over the years.

By funding nine hole courses in public parks that have space for expansion to 18 holes CHEENGZ will seed twice as many disc golf courses for twice as many communities. Successful clubs will grow the course as they demonstrate the importance of Disc Golf to their own communities. 

Where Will You Build Courses?

That is up to you, and this decision has nothing to do with Indiegogo or this campaign. Our mission is to provide grants to build 9 Hole Disc Golf Courses. You can learn more about this at our website http://www.CHEENGZ.com

Who Are You?

My wife and I are relatively unknown in the world of competitive Disc Golf.  I have been playing disc sports for as long as I can remember and Karen has been by my side the entire time either playing, watching, or supporting me in competition and recreational play. From throwing disc in the street, to playing guts, ultimate, and training a champion disc dog that beat other future world champions, Disc Play has always been a part of our lives.

In 1994, after competing in our first Friskees Regional Finals in Tampa, Florida, my dog dislocated her knee and we both retired from the sport so she could heal and have a normal long life free of further injury. Missing daily disc play, I discovered disc golf and I have been addicted to the sport ever since. In fact, I am not only a long time participant, I am the founder of Disc Golfers Anonymous #00001.

Have You Won Any PDGA Disc Golf Competitions?

I rarely compete in Disc Golf and I consider myself a recreational player that occasionally joins a league night or a benefit tournament. After competing in Disc Dog Competitions I always enjoyed playing disc golf casually with friends, competing against myself, encouraging others to improve their game, and not take it so seriously. We believe the fellowship of the people you play with is what makes the sport so special.

We love introducing new people to the sport, which is also a focus of this campaign. I love teaching beginners the beauty of a backhanded anhyser throw and its importance to their game.  This philosophy carries on in the creation of this brand.

CHEENGZ is not here to compete against other amazing Disc Golf brands that made it possible for us to love this sport. In fact, we hope to partner with you to grow the sport for the benefit of everyone who loves to play it. Instead of giving away your discs to beginners, we are upping the ante on ourselves to give away Disc Golf Courses so more people will buy disc golf products growing the sport for the benefit of all who love it.

We hope you will join us...

CHEENGZ!

What We Need & What You Get

We are starting with a modest goal to raise capital for setting up the company, legal and accounting advice, perk production, shipping, and 18 Tee Signs for the Historic Redan Disc Golf Course. Prices for perks are set to be as affordable as possible, competitive to the market, and include fees to Indiegogo for use of their platform. We expect 60% of the proceeds to cover the production and shipping of perks. It can cost up to $4.70 to ship 1 can of tree repellent! The rest will be split between new signs for Redan, marketing expenses, and hopefully enough to legally establish CHEENGZ as a 501C3 charitable organization. Many thanks for your support!

Risks & Challenges

The main risks we face are in the arena of creating products that people in the sport will enjoy having, pricing them competitively while earning additional revenue that will allow us to provide grants to communities for the installation of courses. Our initial goal of $10,000 will provide great insight into how we operate going forward. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, money can be tight these days, but there are other ways you can help. Share our facebook video, subscribe to our email list, and we will send you a free CHEENGZ sticker. You can also use the tools here in Indiegogo to quickly share straight from this page.

I rarely compete in Disc Golf and I consider myself a recreational player that occasionally joins a league night or a benefit tournament. After competing in Disc Dog Competitions I always enjoyed playing disc golf casually with friends, competing against myself, encouraging others to improve their game, and not take it so seriously. We believe the fellowship of the people you play with is what makes the sport so special.

We love introducing new people to the sport, which is also a focus of this campaign. I love teaching beginners the beauty of a backhanded anhyser throw and its importance to their game.  This philosophy carries on in the creation of this brand.
CHEENGZ is not here to compete against other amazing Disc Golf brands that made it possible for us to love this sport. In fact, we hope to partner with you to grow the sport for the benefit of everyone who loves to play it. Instead of giving away your discs to beginners, we are upping the ante on ourselves to give away Disc Golf Courses so more people will buy disc golf products growing the sport for the benefit of all who love it.
We hope you will join us...
CHEENGZ!


What We Need & What You Get
We are starting with a modest goal to raise capital for setting up the company, legal and accounting advice, perk production, shipping, and 18 Tee Signs for the Historic Redan Disc Golf Course. Prices for perks are set to be as affordable as possible, competitive to the market, and include fees to Indiegogo for use of their platform. We expect 60% of the proceeds to cover the production and shipping of perks. It can cost up to $4.70 to ship 1 can of tree repellent! The rest will be split between new signs for Redan, marketing expenses, and hopefully enough to legally establish CHEENGZ as a 501C3 charitable organization. Many thanks for your support!

Risks & ChallengesThe main risks we face are in the arena of creating products that people in the sport will enjoy having, pricing them competitively while earning additional revenue that will allow us to provide grants to communities for the installation of courses. Our initial goal of $10,000 will provide great insight into how we operate going forward. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Hey, money can be tight these days, but there are other ways you can help. Share our facebook video, subscribe to our email list, and we will send you a free CHEENGZ sticker. You can also use the tools here in Indiegogo to quickly share straight from this page.

story:
Hi, guys!

We are TagMe team and we have got a social business. We produce and sell medical ID bracelets and the part of our income is given to charity – it’s free of charge medical ID bracelets for children with different medical conditions.

We have released a new product. It’s two-layer silicone bracelets with an individual laser engraving and we want to expand our production!

We Need Your Help:

We started these bracelets production six months ago and spent already $ 5 000 from our wallet. But we would like to organize the cyclical turnaround and apart from bracelets for adults we want to create those for children. And we need your support

There are two ways you can help us:

  1. You can support our project with the money and receive beautiful bracelets with the any laser engraving and of the any colors you choose.
  2. Share. Let people know about this awesome deal! Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat!

Risks & Challanges:

We already have 1000 bracelets at our warehouse and we are able to produce up to 100 pcs per day.

Please ASAP AFTER YOUR DONATION write us the colors, size, text or picture for laser engraving, font code.

When the campaign is finished we will start shipping out. It will take 30 days from the campaign finish date. If you don’t write us the size and/or color and/or text for engraving due to some reasons within two weeks from the campaign finish date, we reserve the right to send you any size and/or colour bracelet with any laser marking text.

10 colors:

Size chart:

Font text engraving:

Perks:

We've carefully thought out each reward and broken it down to make it simple for you. Those prices are 25-50% off Retail! Look over the rewards and read the pledge descriptions for more details. If you have any questions please feel free to ask us in the comments section and we'll do our best to answer them for you.

Time line:

FAQ:

  • What can I engrave on my bracelet? You can engrave any words in any language and any text font, numbers, signs, figures, characters and EVERYTHING you wish!
  • Can I engrave a picture on my bracelet? Yes, you can if you send it to us in curves.
  • What inscription length can be placed onto a bracelet? You can engrave it into one string (then it will be 18-22 characters depending on the text font) or into two strings (then it will be 45-55 characters depending on the text font).
  • Won’t I have an allergic response to your bracelet? No! The bracelets are made from 100% hypoallergic silicone.
  • Can I choose only one color for set of bracelets and engrave only one inscription on all the bracelets? You can choose any colors and any texts for your bracelets laser marking.
  • How long shall I wait for the parcel? We are located in Ukraine and delivery term to the USA and Japan can be up to 25 days. The delivery term to Europe is 10-15 days.

story:
XY

From inception, XY The Brand was meant to be a fresh perspective on modern day street wear that defies the laws of fashion by embracing the term 'be different' without being cliche in today's industry.

 

From The Beginning

Life was growing increasingly hard for us..

With a high unemployment rate, lack of 'real' opportunities and an unplanned pregnancy, the brain child of an artistic man coupled with the need to support our family, XY was born.

In October 2016, a quite serious pillow conversation made a quick turn into a business idea while trying to guess what the sex of our child was going to be. After constant back and forth, the consensus went from pink to blue and so did our idea. 

Shamar always had a 'thing' for hats and as he was customizing his cap while sitting at the bottom of our bed, bouncing ideas off of each other, he flipped it around and there it was.. X Y.

 

 

From that day on, we made the conscious decision put our heads together, use what little funds we had, our creativity and talents to make XY a reality.

 

How We Did It

Without access to conventional means of printing, or funds to outsource the creation of our designs, our only option was to paint everything by hand on our dining table. We first began using inexpensive oil based paints - boy did we learn our lesson, to educating ourselves about the appropriate paints and tools necessary to execute our ideas.

From being self taught in Photoshop, to using a simple stencil knife to cut out our designs, applying the stencils with cheap scotch tape, and finally retouching with a paintbrush, no matter how taxing, we've always pushed through despite the adversity and did what had to be done.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What's Next For Us

Over the course of the last year, we've thoughtfully increased our brand awareness here in Barbados but our ideas for our growth has outgrown our current capabilities so with your help, we can expand our product range and our brand. 

With your support we can:

  • Build a website (and an app)
  • Lease a Direct to Garment printer and purchase supplies
  • Purchase stock (various types of apparel, bags, promotional pieces)
  • Increase output and decrease production time
  • Securing a storefront and storage space
  • Employ staff

Future Mission

With continued growth, we intend to make XY a globally recognized streetwear powerhouse that will open more opportunities for us to change the culture.

Drawing the inspiration from the newest addition to our family, Harper-Ryan became a symbol of strength, resilience and determination for us to create something unique and artistically inclined to transform the course of fashion in the Caribbean and then the world.

story:
Monkey Jabber

The Best Kids’ Device To Find Your Lost Child

The first Designed-in-Canada GPS / instant Walkie-Talkie / SOS emergency button smart watch for kids 6-12.

 

As a parent, this horrifying story of a child disappearing into thin air is scary. I don't want this to happen to anybody! Then I read how 500,000 kids are reported missing in North America each year!  That number really scared me!!  That's why I created the Jabber smartwatch with safety in mind first! 

Not only that, we've also made in such a way that kids and parents with #Autism can also benefit from it. How? The JABBER smartwatch has both voice & Messaging capabilities. Parents can talk to their kids and they can respond via pre-defined Emojis. This keeps kids in communication with their parents. Being a parent is hard but, kids with #Autism don't need to be left out. 

The Jabber, a GPS Walkie Talkie smartwatch for kids that allows you to identify your child's exact location whenever they wonder off or go missing. It comes equipped with a GPS locator, safe-zone perimeter fencing, two-way walkie talkie communication capabilities and a SOS alert button for emergencies. The Jabber can be easily integrated with your smartphone (Apple or Android) with The Jabber App.

With this new smart technology, you can stop worrying and never panic again when your child moves out of view!

Features:

 

GPS Tracking

We use state of the art icloud technology with GSM 4G GPS tracking. As self-described communication technology geeks, this is our top priority. Know where your child is from 16 feet and beyond at all times!

 

GEO Safe Zone

You set your child’s boundaries with perimeter setting, whether it’s the sandbox, or an entire shopping mall. You’ll get an instant alert when they leave the area, but they’re free to play without you hovering over their shoulder.

SOS Alert Button

If an emergency happens, like your child falls in the playground and needs your help, they can press the SOS emergency button and start helping them from wherever you are and know where to look for them!. Get there before anyone else!

 

Two-Way Walkie Talkie Capabilities 

Instantly talk to your child from your cell phone for as long as you want! Hear your child’s voice the second they ring you and get the instant peace of mind you need when they’re out of your sight.

Kids’ friends and siblings also have unlimited instant walkie-talkie conversation ability with each other! They can chat on the playground to each other (how fun is that?), and check in with parents, grandparents or babysitters all at once!

 

Messaging

Kids can receive instant messages from their parents and reply right away via cool emojis to check in with their status.

Additional Features Include:


Contact List 

Parents can manage the contact list of the watch directly from the smart watch. 

School Zone

If kids are in school, parents can set the Jabber watch to silent and only allow SOS calls. No need for them to get in trouble for playing with it in class!

Colourful style

We're making stylish, colourful wristbands that kids love. And we know – because we asked them! Kids aren’t going to wear something they don’t like, so we went to the source to find out what is cool and fun for boys and girls.

Long Battery Life

Monkey Jabber operates for 24 hours at a time with regular use. We wanted it to last about as long as your own phone, so you can charge them together, without having to think too much about it.

Time of day

The Jabber also functions as a digital watch so kids know can learn to tell time or time their walk home from school. 


Connect To Your Smartphone

Download our free phone App to manage the watch and keep your kids safe. We created an interface that’s super simple because we want to make your lives easier, not challenge you with complicated software.

You can track your child and communicate with them instantly – that’s it!


Safety Can Be Expensive!

Creating an amazing smartwatch requires us to be rigorous with our manufacturing standards, as the safety of your kids is our top priority. Because of this noble goal, we need to pay for some expensive equipment and testing procedures that ensure all the benefits we’re planning to deliver.

We’ve worked directly in the walkie-talkie-over-cellphone industry and overcome severe challenges, so we know the amount of testing it takes to make products perfect, and we’ve seen the disasters that can happen when people cut corners. That’s why we don’t want to skimp – we want a high quality product worthy of every family we ship to.

We’re striving to exceed your expectations with simply the best, top quality product on the market. We’re not here to cash in on a temporary trend – we plan to be the #1 go-to safety watch on the market, and to make families feel safe and proud of their purchase.

We promise to treat your money with the ultimate respect and integrity, just like we do with our kids! You deserve the best and that’s what we plan to deliver to your door.

Can’t Contribute? Please Consider Sharing!

SHARE, SHARE, SHARE  with ALL your friends! Whether they have kids or not, everyone wants to see the world become a safer place : )

USE the buttons below to tell the world about our mission and goal! We are so grateful to you for taking the time to learn about Monkey Jabber.

 

 

Creators You Can Trust

I’m the creator Jacob Moshinsky, and as you saw in the video, I had a full-on panic attack when I lost my son, who as it turned out, had just exited a bathroom from a different door. I vowed to create an app for parents that solved this problem once and for all, elegantly and effortlessly.

I’ve worked for two of the big three cellphone companies in Canada (Rogers & TELUS), so I’ve learned all there is to know about trouble-shooting communication devices, and with Monkey Jabber, I’m combining my communication experience with my business education to develop a much needed, quality tracking device for kids.

We’re launching this campaign to move forward with our final manufacturing. All the money we raise will go to ensure the Monkey Jabber is manufactured to the highest standard. We want to build your trust, keep kids safe, and make your parenting lives easier!

Founder:  Jacob Moshinsky

 

Advisors:

Yaron Varona - CEO Iota Security

 

Dan Abitbol - CTO ListenApp


Why We Need You & What You Get

Your support will be used 100% to manufacture the Jabber watches. Our prototypes are fully functional, so now we need to create them to the highest quality standard!

Support us with $75 or more and you’ll receive a watch once the manufacturing is complete! You can give more to get more watches earmarked for shipment to you, and all orders come with rolls of cool stickers to add to the kids’ fun. Check the ‘Perks’ section for details on every donation level.

By giving even $10 to Monkey Jabber, you will automatically be signed up for our newsletter which will give you all the exciting updates about the watch, how you can get big discounts (especially useful if you didn’t purchase one as part of your donation) and vital information on child safety!

Know that you are supporting a company that cares. To ensure kids learn about safety, a portion of our sales (not campaign money) will go directly to a charity that helps teach kids to be safe.


Making The World Safer For Your Children

We are so grateful for your support at any level to make this dream a reality. Our passion is keeping kids safe, and lowering that frightening number of annual ‘amber alerts.’ Together we can use technology for a positive good and never lose sight of our children again!

Your support brings this vital necessity to life, and we've been lucky to have the business validation and support from two prestigious business incubators in Canada already! We tell you this so that you know we are genuinely well versed in this field, and that our tech savvy experience combined with our passion as parents is that magic combination that will create the perfect watch to keep your kids safe!

 

http://www.yedinstitute.org

 

https://www.communitech.ca

 

Monkey Jabber/Jacob Has Been Featured In These Media Outlets:
