story:
I designed my first timepiece at Art school in England over 35 years ago and I love the challenge of defining this art and bringing together all the elements into a design that has both a visual and tactile connection with the owner.

  • Over the years I have designed and made many different products and I am passionate about bringing affordable well designed and high quality products to the market.

  • This new collection of watches is designed for distribution through retail and online stores. There are about 50 variations of case, face and strap and there should be something to appeal to everyone in some way. Even your children and younger kids will find that I have also thought of them, along with some help from my 4 year son Louis. Many of the designs compliment the existing alarm and wall clocks in my collection and I would encourage retailers and distributors to consider carrying both collections.


     

                         Retail window display for 12 watches and 4-5 desire alarm clocks

    With 5 distinct and unique case designs the realization of this new watch collection will be a huge step for my business as it will add a whole new dimension to what we are able to offer alongside our already established collection of Clocks.  With the Pro series 6S20, 4 beats per second movement and the 165 feet water resistance of the case, the Chronograph series offers a superbly well specified watch and like all the collection, the attention to detail and quality have been the top priority.

  • With the successful funding of this campaign we can gear up for a production run of about 3000 pieces and have some spare resources left over for marketing. The product development and design is already done and the products you see in the video  presentation and in the gallery section here are full production samples. So please find something you would love to own or give away and help us do what we love to do.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for funding of $40,000, of a total budget requirement of $75,000.

  • $60,000 for the production including the packaging and in store displays. We have already committed a substantial investment into the design and the making of the working samples .
  • $15,000 will be used for the first phase of the marketing which will principally be showing and exhibiting the collection to customers, some of whom we already know and are working with.
  • The perk for you, is to be able to save up to $115 and be one of the first owners of this exciting new collection and be a generous supporter of “good design” that is at the heartbeat of style today.


  • If you chose a perk that is a voucher then you have a wonderful choice of alarm and wall clocks, barometers and weather stations and the wonderful SpiceBoy pepper mill to choose from on our website www.oliverhemming.com  and these can all be in your hands within a few weeks of your pledge.

  • If we are partially funded we will continue with the collection but will scale back the production volume.

  • Here are some more images of the main perks.


Risks & Challenges

The main challenge up to now has been in the design, which has now been completed successfully and I am delighted by the full collection and the quality we have achieved. We are working in collaboration with a great watch factory and their technicians have helped us resolve all the technical and production issues and I want to say a big thank you to Eddie, Billy and Key for all their professional help and advice. I know that they will help us make a product that is worthy of your support and our Brand. As you see from the samples in the gallery section here, they look great! So please take a good look at this collection and find something you would love to own or give away and help us reach our goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help in another way, then please tell your friends about what we are doing and if you know of a cool retail design store in your own town, go in and grab their details and email them to us ! info@oliverhemming.com

That would be brilliant, thank you so much for considering this and thank you very much for your support.

best wishes

Oliver Hemming

Over the years I have designed and made many different products and I am passionate about bringing affordable well designed and high quality products to the market.


 This new collection of watches is designed for distribution through retail and online stores. There are about 50 variations of case, face and strap and there should be something to appeal to everyone in some way. Even your children and younger kids will find that I have also thought of them, along with some help from my 4 year son Louis. Many of the designs compliment the existing alarm and wall clocks in my collection and I would encourage retailers and distributors to consider carrying both collections.
     

                         Retail window display for 12 watches and 4-5 desire alarm clocks





With 5 distinct and unique case designs the realization of
this new watch collection will be a huge step for my business as it
will add a whole new dimension to what we are able to offer alongside our
already established collection of Clocks. 
With the Pro series 6S20, 4 beats
per second movement and the 165 feet water resistance of the case, the Chronograph
series offers a superbly well specified watch and like all the collection, the attention
to detail and quality have been the top priority.











With the successful funding of this campaign we can
     gear up for a production run of about 3000 pieces and have some spare resources
     left over for marketing. The product development and design is already done
     and the products you see in the video  presentation and in the gallery
section here 
are full production
     samples. So please find something you would love to own or give away and
     help us do what we love to do.


What
We Need & What You Get
We are asking for funding of $40,000, of a total budget requirement of $75,000.

$60,000 for the production


     including the packaging and in store displays. We have already committed a substantial investment into the
     design and the making of the working samples .
$15,000 will be used for the first phase of the
     marketing which will principally be showing and exhibiting the collection
     to customers, some of whom we already know and are working with.
The perk for you, is to be able to save up to $115 and be one of the first owners of
     this exciting new collection and be a generous supporter of “good design” that
     is at the heartbeat of style today.



If you chose a perk that is a voucher then you have a
     wonderful choice of alarm and wall clocks, barometers and weather stations
     and the wonderful SpiceBoy pepper mill to choose from on our website www.oliverhemming.com  and these can all be in your hands
     within a few weeks of your pledge.


If we are partially funded we will continue with the
     collection but will scale back the production volume.


Here are some more images of the main perks.







Risks
& Challenges


The main challenge up to now has been in the design, which has now been
completed successfully and I am delighted by the full collection and the
quality we have achieved. We are working in collaboration with a great watch factory
and their technicians have helped us resolve all the technical and production
issues and I want to say a big thank you to Eddie, Billy and Key for all their
professional help and advice. I know that they will help us make a product that
is worthy of your support and our Brand. As you see from the samples in the
gallery section here, they look great! So please take a good look at this
collection and find something you would love to own or give away and help us
reach our goal.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you want to help in another way, then please tell your friends about what
we are doing and if you know of a cool retail design store in your
own town, go in and grab their details and email them to us ! info@oliverhemming.com
That would be brilliant, thank you so much for considering this and thank
you very much for your support. best wishes
Oliver Hemming

story:
Inspired by summers spent in the Ozark Mountains, we found a need for a more convenient pair of sunglasses. After losing countless pairs to the bottom of the lake, we thought of the perfect solution. We need to find an affordable pair of sunglasses that can withstand time spent on the water, and at the end of the day, not end up at the bottom. After searching and comparing products, we decided on  natural bamboo sunglasses. 

All of our sunglasses are handmade from natural woods, built sturdy and lightweight. Held together by stainless steel hinges they are designed to keep their shape. Did we mention that they float?! You will never have to worry about another pair of your favorite shades sinking to the bottom of the water. 

We want you to worry less about what you are wearing and more about enjoying the moment.

Perks of Lumberlens:

  • Handmade
  • Polarized lenses- protection from UV rays
  • Flexible legs that fit all sizes
  • Super light weight - less than 1 oz. 

The Ozark Collection

Ozark Gray- Caramel Bamboo Frame with Gray Lens


Ozark Green- Caramel Bamboo Frame with Green Lens

Ozark Red- Caramel Bamboo Frame with Red Lens

The Versailles Collection | Early Release

Versailles Black/Gray- Painted Black Bamboo Frame with Gray Lens

What We Need & What You Get

In order to launch Lumberlens we need $6000. All funds will go directly into manufacturing of our first launch collection. We have already spent the last six months getting the brand built, we just need your help to get over the final hurdle! As a benefit to you, we are offering discounts on all of our products: the signature Ozark Series and our IndieGoGo Early Special - the Versailles Painted Black Bamboo.  

Our Perks:

  • $39 Early Bird one pair of your choice (First 75)
  • $49 One pair of your choice
  • $89 Two pair of your choice
  • $99 Early Bird Ozark Collection (First 35)
  • $119 Three pair of your choice
  • $149 All 4 pairs of our first launch

Behind the lens of our green Ozarks

Don't worry about them floating to the bottom. They will be waiting for you to come back to the top.


The round bamboo case. A special add-on for the Ozark Collection series and all 4 pairs perks.
Risks & Challenges:

We need your help with funding to meet our goal. We have spent the last 6 months working on the brand, perfecting our product and now we are ready to go.

How else you can help us!

Share our campaign! All it takes is one click from each of you to put this in front of A LOT of people!

Follow us on our social media accounts and subscribe to our emails! We make sure to send out cool info that you won't want to miss  :).

You can find us on our Instagram by clicking the link or @lumberlens

story:
¿What is instaguapa?

Instaguapa is a Web Magazine created two years ago, having an incredibly positive acceptance in social networks. Currently we have 116,000 followers in Instagram, from different countries all over the world (www.instaguapa.com).

Everyday we have followers asking us to sell the outfits we publish, and for that reason, even though is scary, we decided to make our dream happen by building our own clothe brand "THE GUAPA"

____

¿Que es Instaguapa?

Instaguapa es una Revista Virtual que nació hace dos años y ha tenido una increíble aceptación en las redes sociales. Actualmente contamos con una comunidad de  116.000 seguidores en la red social Instagram, proveniente de diversos países del Mundo, así como con nuestra página web (www.instaguapa.com).

Nuestros propios seguidores diariamente nos piden que vendamos todas las combinaciones que publicamos, razón por la cual, luego de dos años y llenas de dudas, miedos, sueños y trabajo, hemos decidido construir nuestra Marca de Ropa ¨THE GUAPA¨



THE GUAPA 


All proceeds will be used to the clothe's manufacture and commercialization, which will be sold worldwide online.  Our goals with this new brand are:

  1. Make clothe for all type of women's different body shapes.
  2. Teach our customers how to combine and wear our clothe through the outfits elaborated and published by us.
  3. We know how difficult it is to start your own business, so part of our goal is to collaborate and help future entrepreneurs build their businesses through proceeds obtained from the sell of our clothe.

Our campaign's collaborator will be involved from the beginning of the proyect until business starts. Instagram



THE GUAPA 


Los fondos recaudados, serán destinados a la fabricación y comercializacion de la ropa, que será vendida inicialmente online a nivel Mundial. Con esta marca tenemos varios propósitos, entre los más importantes están: 

  1. Hacer ropa para todo tipo de cuerpo, reforzando una línea para las mujeres petit. 
  2. Enseñar al consumidor como usar la ropa que va a comprar a través de nuestras combinaciones. 
  3. Colaborar con futuros emprendedores en la realización de sus proyectos, mediantes fondos recaudados por la venta en la plataforma web de nuestros productos. 

El colaborador de esta campaña tendrá acceso directo a los avances de la marca a través de nuestras redes sociales, van a estar involucrados desde el inicio hasta la puesta en marcha del negocio. Instagram



¿Why is this proyect so important to us?

Because we finally found our true passion, what really inspire us, what gets us out of bed with excitement every morning to work in what we really love, and because we know all this hard work will be paid off.

We want to show the world that dreams can come true, that if you really put your heart and mind into something ,  all those times you failed and fell down were only experiences that had to happen in order to understand that what matters is that we have to believe in ourselves and pursue our dreams.

Please remember to share this campaign, leave your comment and to dress your dreams into reality...

____

¿Por qué es importante para nosotras construir esto?

Porque ahora fue que descubrimos nuestra pasión, lo que nos inspira, lo que nos invita a trabajar diariamente y porque sabemos que llegará la recompensa a tanto esfuerzo dejado en el aire.

Queremos demostrarle al Mundo que los sueños se cumplen pero cuando se trabajan, que no importa los fracasos que puedes tener en el camino, lo que importa es que creas realmente en TI.  

Recuerda compartir esta campaña, colaborar y dejar tu comentario....


¡Gift!

If you collaborate with this campaign, you will participate in a drawing for an Image Consulting Online + 1 (one) Total Look our collection.

____

¡Sorteo!

Al colaborar con esta campaña participaras en un sorteo de una Asesoría de Imagen Online + 1 (un) Total Look de nuestra colección.

story:
Just Lift It is not about fitness, it’s about what we believe. 

This is what will drive us to achieve more, motivate others and give more. Our aim is to make this brand a universal concept that can get people to stay active and live a healthy lifestyle.

Combining cutting-edge design with an affordable price tag, we want to push boundaries to promote fitness, bodybuilding and great athleticism.

Our Current Range. More to be added.. 


Our aim is to introduce high performance clothing and accessories range that you can wear with pride. We also want to give something back. That is why we are working with “The Hunger Project” to eliminate poverty in the world. Each year we will run events to raise money for this and we will give 10% of the profit to this project to reach their goal.

With your support we will be able to bring this global concept to live!!! From the money we raise we will launch our web platform so that you can buy our products, learn how to train and stay motivated.

Oh! Yeh! Don’t forget to share your passion with others!!!,,

JUST LIFT IT. - Join us to change the world!  


Time line:

Campaign start date: March 2015

Campaign end date: May 2015

Manufacturing start: 8/4/15

Shipping start: May 2015

Online platform goes live: April 2015


Risks and challenges

Production 
We want to produce clothing of the highest quality and make sure we are on top of new fitness clothing fabrics and styles that will help you change your game! 
Potential risks would be manufactures not meeting demand dates but we are in constant contact with them and if any changes or delays take place you will be the first to know. As my backers I want to make sure you are happy with everything and have all the information you need to back us up and bring our dream to life.

Exchange Policy 
If you are not satisfied with the clothing you will be able to return it for another piece of clothing at your size. If we do not have anything in we will do everything we can to come to an arrangement so as to satisfy your needs.

International shipping: Shipping outside the USA and UK will generate an additional $10 shipping cost.

story:
iMbrief is the hippest briefcase in the world. It’s truly one-of-a-kind. Offering more than just security and functionality, iMbrief is also an object of art and a fashion statement in its own right. 

We’ve all been dazzled by those cool briefcases in spy films. But you never see them in the real world. So we came up with this idea to build a flashy briefcase packed with all the indispensable technologies required by today’s professional road warriors.

Fashion, security and versatility are what they demand in a mobile office. And it’s all here. Technology merged with a timeless slick style.


Mobile. Versatile. Stylish.

As technologies get smarter, more become possible. This is what inspires us at Magicubie – to create products that empower you through devices that do more. We aim to create delightful products with your own style.

iMbrief is designed to solve a wide range of challenges that road warriors face, such as accessing a reliable power supply and keeping personal items secure. Reliable and smart, tailor-made to be the most secure briefcase in the world.

  Secure


  • Lock: Fingerprint access / Wireless lock / Kensington lock

For your peace of mind, iMbrief is protected by: 1) a state-of-the-art fingerprint access system; or 2) you can use your mobile device to control access through a secure connection. Only you have authorized access to your iMbrief. It will lock itself once the connection with your mobile device is unexpectedly severed. Using the iMbrief app, you’re always in control. In addition, your iMbrief is equipped with a Kensington Lock slot so valuable contents are protected while your iMbrief is securely tied to a post.

Any unauthorized attempt at opening the iMbrief will be greeted with a loud audible warning. In the off-chance that someone should attempt to take your iMbrief by force, the built-in speaker can emit a loud wail to scare off the perpetrator. When not acting as a siren, the wireless speaker will play your preferred tune at your command.


  • Siren: Alarm / Auto-lock on unplanned disconnection


  • GPS: Path / Location tracking

If you misplace your iMbrief, the built-in GPS ensures that it can be tracked down easily. The GPS also keeps a log of its tracks so you can quickly retrace your trip. 



  Smart


  • Internal and external charge access

iMbrief is your power source on the go.  Keep your mobile phones and tablets functioning into the wee hours even when you’re away from an electric socket. The two discrete USB connectors tether your devices to iMbrief’s built-in battery. Or your devices can stay snuggly inside iMbrief, charging through either of the two internal USB connectors. 

  

  • Battery (optional second)

What’s more, an optional battery pack will power your laptop. Road warriors will never be crippled again by running out of juice.


  • Wireless storage

Use iMbrief for storage when you’ve run out of space in your devices. You can securely store, access, and share your digital information wirelessly through a built-in data storage facility. The setup is easy, storage is secure and the convenience it affords is priceless.


  • Music player / Reminder

The standard-issue built-in Bluetooth speaker alerts you to calendar reminders and also plays your favorite tunes at your whim. Simply set up these functions with the iMbrief app.

  • Internal lighting with light sensor

LEDs inside the briefcase light up the interior – so no more playing hide-and-seek when you’re trying to find things in the dark.

  • We speak both iOS and Android.

Keep control of your iMbrief with the iOS and Android app.

  Elegance

iMbrief exudes pure elegance. Its clean lines, no-nonsense svelte shape and bright colors give it an inviting tactile sensation. The hidden handle, out-of-sight shoulder strap rings, anti-theft lock slot, and ample internal space all exemplify the Magicubie team’s attention to detail in crafting this object of art and a fashion statement. 


  Color


  Interior



As a token of our appreciation for your support, we've knocked off a huge 40% from the sticker price so you’ll be paying only $359 instead of $599. What’s more, a fashionable and versatile iMbrief tote bag, which can be used both as an iMbrief cover and a stand-alone bag, is included for orders placed on Indiegogo.

  • Tote bag

In addition, the following personalized trims are available to go with your unique iMbrief.

Add $30 for an iMbrief badge engraved with your name.

With $300 extra, you get a custom hand-made internal layout mold per your specification.

For $9,999, a leather iMbrief in your chosen color with name badge and custom internal velvet felt mold to protect your valuables will be manufactured specifically for you.

In addition, a three-day visit to meet the Magicubie team in Taiwan will be arranged. The trip is designed to help you understand first-hand the design and manufacturing environment in Taiwan. We’ll throw in a two-day sightseeing package to make the trip a fantastic once-in-a-lifetime experience!




Everyone we’ve spoken to has been super-excited and can’t wait to get their hands on the iMbrief. We feel greatly humbled and inspired. To show our appreciation for helping us bring iMbrief to the world, the Magicubie team will enhance your iMbrief even further with the following items:

* A Magicubie Tag

* A Kensington Lock

* 16GB or 32GB SD card

They will come to you per the scheme below. Each number in the table represents a milestone of funds raised. Once the milestone is reached, all customers will receive the extra items listed accordingly. So help us to get there by spreading the word about iMbrief so we can bring this amazing briefcase to life and delight even more people everywhere!

   



Magicubie will continue to update its apps to support the latest and hottest devices on the market.

  • Smart watch app


  • Fashionable and versatile carry-on luggage and backpack



Magicubie is built by a team of engineers and professionals well versed in design. There are inherent risks involved in manufacturing and sourcing products, however.. With that said, we are experienced and ready to overcome all challenges to bring you a superb iMbrief that matches up to your caliber and taste.

This also means that in order to deliver the best iMbrief we possibly can, actual specifications may change to reflect an enhanced iMbrief.



[ Hardware ]

Q: What is the weight of iMbrief?

A: iMbrief is projected to be around 4lb (1.8Kg).

Q: Can I open the iMbrief if the battery is out of power?

A: You need to charge your iMbrief first before you can open it again.

Q: What is the battery capacity?

A: The main battery is rated at 5,000mAh, the optional secondary battery is rated at 18,000mAh.

Q: What are the three buttons on iMbrief for?

A: The first one is a power button. When the power is off, all functions except for the GPS sensor will be shut down. The second button is the wireless speaker toggle switch. The third button is the WiFi toggle switch.

Q: How do I tell what the power level of the battery is?

A: A flashing LED indicates the power level of the battery.

Q: Can iMbrief be worn on the shoulder？

A：Yes, a detachable shoulder strap is part of the iMbrief package.

[ Software ]

Q: What iMbrief functions are accessible via the iMbrief app?

A: You can lock/unlock your iMbrief, activate/deactivate the wireless speaker, enable/disable the GPS sensor, and check the state of the storage as well as the remaining battery life.

Q: Where can I find the iMbrief app?

A: It's available either at the Apple iTunes App Store or on Google Play.

[ Order ]

Q: How long is the warranty?

A: A 5-year warranty is offered for all iMbriefs purchased on Indiegogo.

Q: How do I personalize the iMbrief badge?

A: Magicubie will contact customers who order the personal badge separately for the exact wording on the badge.

Q: How do I customize the interior layout?

A: Magicubie will contact customers who order a customized interior layout separately for the layout plan.


We’re a band of industrial designers, software and hardware engineers, and project managers passionate about crafting beautiful technologies for everyday use. Together, as entrepreneurs, we’re inspired to delight consumers with the iMbrief. 


We want to thank those who helped us along the way on this project and encouraged us to be dreamers, risk takers and doers.


All funds raised will be used to  bring this dream briefcase to life. We’re on a mission to bring technology and creativity to life through fashionable and versatile products.

We need your help to bring it to market. So help us with comments, your funding contributions, and spread the word.

wireless speaker will play your preferred tune at your command.




Siren: Alarm / Auto-lock on unplanned disconnection









GPS: Path / Location tracking

If you misplace your iMbrief, the
built-in GPS ensures that it can be tracked down easily. The GPS also keeps a
log of its tracks so you can quickly retrace your trip. 



  Smart







Internal and external charge access

iMbrief is your power source
on the go.  Keep your mobile phones and tablets
functioning into the wee hours even when you’re away from an electric socket.
The two discrete USB connectors tether your devices to iMbrief’s built-in
battery. Or your devices can stay snuggly inside iMbrief, charging through
either of the two internal USB connectors. 





  


Battery (optional second)



What’s more, an optional battery
pack will power your laptop. Road warriors will never be crippled again by
running out of juice.







Wireless storage

Use iMbrief for storage when you’ve
run out of space in your devices. You can securely store, access, and share your digital information
wirelessly through a built-in data storage facility. The setup is easy, storage
is secure and the convenience it affords is priceless.







Music player / Reminder



The standard-issue built-in Bluetooth
speaker alerts you to calendar reminders and also plays your favorite tunes at
your whim. Simply set up these functions with the iMbrief app.


Internal lighting with light sensor


LEDs inside the briefcase light up
the interior – so no more playing hide-and-seek when you’re trying to find things
in the dark.




We speak both iOS and Android.



Keep control of your iMbrief with
the iOS and Android app.





  Elegance


iMbrief exudes pure elegance. Its clean lines, no-nonsense svelte shape and bright
colors give it an inviting tactile sensation. The hidden handle, out-of-sight
shoulder strap rings, anti-theft lock slot, and ample internal space all
exemplify the Magicubie team’s attention to detail in crafting this object of
art and a fashion statement. 











  Color


  Interior


















As a token of our appreciation for your support, we've knocked off a huge 40%
from the sticker price so you’ll be paying only $359 instead of $599. What’s
more, a fashionable and versatile iMbrief tote bag, which can be used both as an
iMbrief cover and a stand-alone bag, is included for orders placed on
Indiegogo.



Tote bag





In addition, the following personalized trims are available to go with your unique iMbrief.
Add $30 for an iMbrief badge engraved with your name.
With $300 extra, you get a custom hand-made internal layout mold per your specification.




For $9,999, a leather iMbrief in
your chosen color with name badge and custom internal velvet felt mold to
protect your valuables will be manufactured specifically for you.
In addition, a three-day visit to
meet the Magicubie team in Taiwan will be arranged. The trip is designed to
help you understand first-hand the design and manufacturing environment in
Taiwan. We’ll throw in a two-day sightseeing package to make the trip a
fantastic once-in-a-lifetime experience!

















Everyone we’ve spoken to has been super-excited and can’t wait to get their hands on the iMbrief. We feel greatly humbled and inspired. To show our appreciation for helping us bring iMbrief to the world, the Magicubie team will enhance your iMbrief even further with the following items:
* A Magicubie Tag
* A Kensington Lock
* 16GB or 32GB SD
card


They will come to you per the scheme below. Each number in the table represents a milestone of funds raised. Once the milestone is reached, all customers will receive the extra items listed accordingly. So help us to get there by spreading the word about iMbrief so we can bring this amazing briefcase to life and delight even more people everywhere!


   




















Magicubie will continue to update its apps to support the latest and hottest devices on the market.



Smart watch app






Fashionable and versatile carry-on luggage and backpack






Magicubie is built by a team of engineers and professionals well versed in design. There are inherent risks involved in manufacturing and sourcing products, however.. With that said, we are experienced and ready to overcome all challenges to bring you a superb iMbrief that matches up to your caliber and taste.
This also means that in order to deliver the best iMbrief we possibly can, actual specifications may change to reflect an enhanced iMbrief.

[ Hardware ]
Q: What is
the weight of iMbrief?A: iMbrief
is projected to be around 4lb (1.8Kg).
Q: Can I
open the iMbrief if the battery is out of power?
A: You need
to charge your iMbrief first before you can open it again.
Q: What is
the battery capacity?
A: The main
battery is rated at 5,000mAh, the optional secondary battery is rated at 18,000mAh.
Q: What are the
three buttons on iMbrief for?
A: The first
one is a power button. When the power is off, all functions except for the GPS
sensor will be shut down. The second button is the wireless speaker toggle
switch. The third button is the WiFi toggle switch.
Q: How do I
tell what the power level of the battery is? 
A: A flashing LED indicates the power level of the battery.
Q: Can
iMbrief be worn on the shoulder？
A：Yes, a
detachable shoulder strap is part of the iMbrief package.
[ Software ]
Q: What iMbrief
functions are accessible via the iMbrief app?
A: You can lock/unlock
your iMbrief, activate/deactivate the wireless speaker, enable/disable the GPS
sensor, and check the state of the storage as well as the remaining battery
life.
Q: Where can
I find the iMbrief app?
A: It's available either at the Apple iTunes App Store or on Google Play.
[ Order ]
Q: How long is
the warranty?
A: A 5-year
warranty is offered for all iMbriefs purchased on Indiegogo.
Q: How do I personalize the iMbrief badge?
A: Magicubie
will contact customers who order the personal badge separately for the exact
wording on the badge.
Q: How do I customize the interior layout?
A: Magicubie will contact
customers who order a customized interior layout separately for the layout plan.
We’re a band of industrial designers,
software and hardware engineers, and project managers passionate about crafting
beautiful technologies for everyday use. Together, as entrepreneurs, we’re
inspired to delight consumers with the iMbrief. We want to thank those who helped us along the way on this project and
encouraged us to be dreamers, risk takers and doers.



All funds raised will be used to  bring this dream briefcase to life. We’re on a mission to bring technology and creativity to life through fashionable and
versatile products.
We need your help to bring it to market. So help
us with comments, your funding contributions, and spread the word.

story:
Introducing the Rouncer

The Rouncer is a patented 5 seconds Onion Dicer + Slicer Cutter with no peeling required, no more spending hours chopping onions, no more crying, no more onion wastage, no more cuts on fingers from sharp knives! 

Comes with 14 Multifunctional blades bundled in the Rouncer including:  The Spiral Julienne strips cutter, Apple coring, Peeler, Grater, Mandoline slicer, Herb chopper, square cutter, pie cutter, rectangular cutter, wavy slicer.

A novel invention and a must have genius tool for everyone's daily kitchen needs! 

With 2 stacked blade choices in a collection container, meet the world's first onion dicer/slicer to chop up onions without even having the need to peel them first unlike other products in the market. Just cut into half and go! Total of 14 amazing blades for a multitude of functions!

Also includes a clearing tool for cleaning round blades of any onions stuck between blades, for clearing all vegetable and fruit cuttings on the flat blade instantly, and also acts as a hand guard for protection against the disc blades when using the device for its Mandoline and grating functionality!

In your hand by July-August 2015!

Grab your self a good deal, in store price will be starting from £39.99

Your backing will help us release a third colour option in RED called FLAMING FLAMENCO to go with the current planned OLD GREY and the AUTUMN LEMON colour variations!

At the end of the funding, you can pick any colour you like!

What's so cool about our design?

  • Very quick, in just 5 seconds, you can dice or slice an onion from whole, start to finish. Huge time savings in the kitchen!
  • World's first invention for cutting onions without peeling saving stacks of time.
  • No more tears, the quick cutting process ensures you can get back to cooking without the sore eyes and pain.
  • No more Onion wastage from cutting off too much of the onion's scaly outer leaf and inner juicy leaves.
  • Slicing blades for 6mm thin onion slices, great for barbecues, hot dogs, pizzas, pastas, salads and more.
  • Dicing blades for 6mm onion squares , useful for curries, pizzas and all your cooking needs!
  • The Spiral/Spiraliser Slicer enables you conjure up endless Julienne strips of carrot, zucchini, cucumber, squash and all kinds of other firm vegetables.
  • Apple coring, Peeler, Grater, Mandoline slicer, Herb chopper, square cutter, pie cutter, rectangular cutter, wavy slicer
  • 14 total Stackable blades for easy storage in the spiral cutting tool container. 5 Disc blades, 2 round onion blades and 7 flat cutting blades.
  • Two amazingly designed colour options to suit your kitchen!
  • Patented blade and product design enables a unique approach to common kitchen problems.
  • Collection container at the top of device for storing the diced, sliced or cut fruits and vegetables.
  • Perfectly square diced Onions or slices every time!
  • No more finger cuts from knifes whilst chopping onions! Increases safety whilst doing this daily task every meal time!
  • Easy to clean, store, BPA free, microwavable, dishwasher friendly, freezer safe, food grade plastic!

The Blades:

Rounded Blade Part R

No peeling required, no tears, under 5 seconds onion dicer blade insert for:  

  • Onions for goulash or onion sauces, casseroles or many other dishes  
  • Dicing chilli, garlic and herbs like coriander, chives, rosemary, parsley, for dishes or garnishing  
  • Carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers and much more for vegetable salads and vegetable dishes  
  • Celery, leek, kohlrabi, horseradish, mushrooms, radishes for vegetable salads, wok dishes or as ingredients in soups or stews  
  • Crispy salads like iceberg lettuce, radicchio, Chinese cabbage, etc.  
  • Bologna, mortadella, ham for pasta salad or cold meat salads  
  • Cheese like e.g. feta, mozzarella or Gouda for cheese plates, casseroles or salads  
  • Apples, pears, peaches, apricots, pineapples, bananas, kiwis, melons, mangoes for fruit salads, desserts or for enhancing muesli

Rounded Blade Part S

No peeling required, no tears under 5 seconds onion slicer blade insert for:  

  • Onions for goulash, sauces, hot dogs or wok dishes  
  • Potatoes for roasted potatoes, casseroles or for potato salad  
  • Tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers, leek, radishes, mushrooms, patty pan and many others for salads or vegetable dishes  
  • Bologna or mortadella for salads  
  • Eggs (boiled) for salads or sauces  
  • Apples, apricots, bananas, kiwis, mangoes, melons, papaya, pears, peaches, strawberries for fruit salads, desserts or for dressing baked pastry cases and pies

Flat Blade Part G

Quarter cutting blade insert for:  

  • Cucumbers, horseradish, peppers, radishes, tomatoes, zucchini for salads, vegetable dishes and assorted vegetables  
  • Boiled Eggs for putting on slices of bread and for garnishing dishes  
  • Cheese (Gouda, Edam, mozzarella, etc.) for cheese plates, cold cuts or for garnishing dishes  
  • Mushrooms for mushroom dishes or salads  
  • Large olives for tzatziki or the mediterranean cuisine  
  • apples, apricots, grapes, kiwis, plums, peaches, pears, Strawberries and more for fruit salads, fitness dishes with slices of fruit, for cocktails or wine coolers  
  • Citrus fruit like oranges, limes, lemons and more for fitness dishes with slices of fruit, cocktails, wine cooler or for garnishing dishes

Flat Blade Part H

Apple coring, wedge and 1/8th cutting blade insert for:

  • Core apples easily ready for eating into 8 fun parts.  
  • Potato wedges for baking  
  • Cucumbers, horseradish, peppers, radishes, tomatoes, zucchini for salads, vegetable dishes and assorted vegetables  
  • Boiled Eggs for putting on slices of bread and for garnishing dishes  
  • Cheese (Gouda, Edam, mozzarella, etc.) for cheese plates, cold cuts or for garnishing dishes  
  • Chunky Mushrooms for mushroom dishes or salads  
  • apples, apricots, kiwis, plums, peaches, pears and more for fruit salads, fitness dishes with slices of fruit, for cocktails or wine coolers, fruit infusers  
  • Citrus fruit like oranges, limes, lemons and more for fitness dishes with slices of fruit, cocktails, wine cooler or for garnishing dishes

Flat Blade Part J

Small and medium sized cutting insert for:  

  • Onions, garlic or shallots for cooking and dressings  
  • Potato sticks or dices as ingredients in soups or stews  
  • Bell peppers, carrots, celery, cucumbers, leek, kohlrabi, radishes, horseradish, zucchini for vegetable salads, wok dishes or as ingredients in soups or stews  
  • Bologna or mortadella for salads  
  • Cheese e.g. Mozzarella, feta or Gouda for salads or casseroles • Boiled eggs for salads or sauces  
  • Apples, apricots, bananas, pears, peaches, kiwis, melons, strawberries for fruit salads, desserts or even for enhancing muesli

Flat Blade Part I

small sized square cutting insert for:  

  • Dicing chilli, garlic and herbs like coriander, chives, rosemary, parsley, for dishes or garnishing  
  • Onions for goulash or onion sauces, casseroles or wok dishes  
  • Carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers and much more for vegetable salads and vegetable dishes  
  • Celery, leek, kohlrabi, horseradish, mushrooms, radishes for vegetable salads, wok dishes or as ingredients in soups or stews  
  • Crispy salads like iceberg lettuce, radicchio, Chinese cabbage, etc.  
  • Bologna, mortadella, ham for pasta salad or cold meat salads  
  • Cheese like e.g. feta, mozzarella or Gouda for cheese plates, casseroles or salads  
  • Apples, pears, peaches, apricots, pineapples, bananas, kiwis, melons, mangoes for fruit salads, desserts or for enhancing muesli  

Flat Blade Part L

Large thick square blade insert for:  

  • Dicing or slicing already peeled Onions  
  • Raw potatoes for large square cut French fries • Bell peppers, cucumbers, tomatoes, zucchini, kohlrabi for vegetable salads, wok and vegetable dishes  
  • Crispy salads, like iceberg lettuce, radicchio, Chinese cabbage, etc. 
  • Cheese like e.g. cheddar or Gouda for cheese plates or salads  
  • Apples, apricots, melons, mangoes, pears, peaches, pineapples for wine cooler or fruit salads

Flat Blade Part K

Rectangular dicing insert for:  

  • Onions for goulash or wok dishes  
  • Potatoes for roasted potatoes, casseroles or for potato salad  
  • Tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers, leek, radishes, mushrooms, patty pan and many others for salads or vegetable dishes  
  • Bologna or mortadella for salads  
  • Eggs (boiled) for salads or sauces  
  • Apples, apricots, bananas, kiwis, mangoes, melons, papaya, pears, peaches, strawberries for fruit salads, desserts or for dressing baked pastry cases and pies

Disc Blade Part M

Mandolin slicing blade insert for:  

  • Onion, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, potatoes, carrots slices  
  • Mushrooms for dishes  
  • Kohlrabi, radishes, celery, red radishes  
  • Red or white cabbage  
  • Kiwis, apples, pears, bananas for various fruit dishes

Disc Blade Part N

Mandolin wavy slicing blade insert for:  

  • Onion, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, potatoes, carrots slices  
  • Kohlrabi, radishes, celery, red radishes  
  • Red or white cabbage  
  • Kiwis, apples, pears, bananas

Disc Blade Part O

Coarse grating disc blade insert for:  

  • Fine grating of food like nutmeg for cooking, hot chocolate and more  
  • Various fine cheese grating like parmesan  
  • Lemon and orange zest for sauces  
  • Fine vegetables gratings like carrots, celery or cucumbers

Disc Blade Part P

Coarse grating disc blade insert for:  

  • Various cheeses like parmesan, red leicester and cheddar  
  • Chocolate  
  • All harder fruits like apples, pears  
  • Lemon and orange zest for sauces  
  • Vegetables gratings like potatoes, carrots, celery, cabbage or cucumbers  
  • Grate frozen butter on top of sauces and dishes

Disc Blade Part Q

Vegetable peeler for:  

  • Potato, cassava, parsnips sweet potato peeling  

Spiral Cutter / Spiraliser Part E

Spiralizing is the art of turning vegetables into noodles/spaghetti, using a spiralizer. Spiral cutting / spiraliser tool is for:

  • Apple, Pears and more
  • Beet, Broccoli, Butternut Squash, Cabbage, Carrot, Celeriac, Chayote, Cucumber, Daikon Radish, Jicama, Kohlrabi, Onion, Parsnip, Plantain, Rutabaga, Sweet Potato, Taro Root, Turnip, White Potato, Zucchini + Summer Squash  

The Clearing Tool:

This tool has three functions:

  • 1) Help in the cleaning of the Rounded Onion dicing and slicing blades after use in order to clear out any onion leaves left behind or stuck in between the blades.

  • 2) Acts as the base for clearing food when using the flat discs. When inserted in the Rouncer base device’s semi-circular groove and the handle is pressed down, the food cuttings clears the blades and collects in the small container thanks to the clearing tool and its spikes.

  • 3) Disc blade hand guard. When using the disc blades for its mandolin functions in slicing, wavy cutting and even for grating, the hand guard allows you to latch on to the top of the vegetable or block of cheese as you get closer to the blades in order to avoid any finger cuts. 

How to use the Rouncer:

Take a look at our video for an easy guide on what our patented Rouncer will do for you!

  • Simply cut an onion into half with a knife and chop of the two ends with shoot and stem, and then place it in the semi-circular groove of the Rouncer base unit, attach the round onion blade on the top blade slot of the unit (pick one out of the 14 depending on your requirement).
  • Use the top base unit handle to hand press the blade through the onion in the bottom base unit. This will force the onion through the blades.
  • The onion will not completely go through and collect in the top compartment, about 2mm of the onion skin will stay below the blade which ensures that the scaly leaf does not get cut and go through the blades.
  • Remove the scaly leaf before adding the next onion to cut up. 
  • Lift up the top handle of the device, simply peel off the scaly skin on top of the blade.
  • Put the lid down and turn the device upside down to shake and allow any vegetables stuck between blades to fall through. Use the platform filler tool which also acts as a dicing/slicing clearing tool to clean blades of cuttings which are stuck in between.
  • To use any of the flat cutting blades, insert the blade, but place the semi-circular plastic space filler in the bottom base unit groove to cover the onion slot and make the surface flat. You can then use the device in the same way as above.
  • To use the disc blades, insert part to the blade slot and then turn the device upside down with the lid open and away from the base, rotating to the opposite direction. To use the disc blades, you simply slide to mandoline cut, grate, wavy slice and more on the underside of the top lid handle cover rather which is now exposed to the top. Please refer to images for more guidance.

The Rouncer Family

Rouncer comes designed in 2 cool colours! The "Autumn Lemon" and "The Old Grey".

We sprayed the prototypes with acrylic resin and took professional studio images to show and develop our concept, The final production results will resemble the two variations types above.

Rouncer – Form, Function and High Quality

We have designed the Rouncer with quality in mind, a uniquely designed product like nothing else available in the market, a real problem solver and one we believe that will make the world a better place!

It will be constructed of the finest materials and created with precision quality. There will also be a money-back guarantee against defects or cancellation.

Home and kitchen products have become very popular with consumers looking for new cool and useful products to add to their kitchen gadget list. The Rouncer will become a must have tool for every kitchen just as a knife would be, the ability to save you time and stop tears has been very well accepted by reviewers. 

Get perfectly sized and square cut diced onions every time! Slices are of the same thickness every time you chop onions! No more health and safety concerns whilst cutting onions, this is a common knife cut in the kitchen that you can do without, and now with the Rouncer, you can chop away safely.

We have secured retail distribution in the USA and the UK if we successfully manage to mass produce this product. Production planning has already began.

In the News:

Our initial prototype V1 made the news because of what it represented, the idea that could become part of everyone's life through their kitchen!

http://www.cateringinsight.com/16150-onion-slicer-maker-looking-for-investors/

What can you do with the Rouncer:

Comes with 14 Multifunctional blades included in the Rouncer including:  The Spiral Julienne strips cutter, Apple coring, Peeler, Grater, Mandoline slicer, Herb chopper, square cutter, pie cutter, rectangular cutter, wavy slicer.

Here are some meals we prepared, with the vegetables and fruits only cut using Rouncer.

What We Need, and Why

Newtonstein – that’s the name of our start-up company – has already spent over $18,000 of our own funds in the development of this project, which has enabled us to create a variety of prototypes, apply for our patent, pay for legal fees, set up of logistics and choose a packing operation in Europe just like all our invention approaches.

We require $2,000 to which will enable us to release a third colour option in RED, if we achieve this goal, at the end instead of 2 colour options, you will be able to pick 3 options. We have secured funding for 100% of the production order now. This is where you come in and get to grab the opportunity of becoming one of the first backers to put your hands on one at a discounted price of $40 instead of store retail price of $60! We are not setting any limits, because the more we get funded, the more we can spend on new variations and trade shows to establish this product in global markets whilst putting a team in place to drive its growth through retail distribution in other countries like India because they cook with onions everyday!

All quotations for tooling and manufacturing ready, we got our final prototypes made by the same factory to ensure they are familiar with the product long term.

Funding from our friends at Indiegogo is essential to launch the Rouncer properly. Help us bring this amazing invention to life and revolutionise onion cutting in the kitchen!

The entire process of crowd funding will inevitably help us learn a great deal more about our market, our product and our direction for the future because your critical appraisal and feedback will help us perfect our invention, after all, it is you that will make use of it the most!

Retail Distribution:

We have signed agreements with Davison Product Group in the US, we have a verbal agreement with YCE catering distribution company in the UK, and we are in discussions various other marketing groups in the Gulf and Europe to bring Rouncer to stores this Summer.

The Journey

We came up with sketches Prototype 1 of the Rouncer, and started looking at perfecting the design last month, reducing costs as three different blades would require three different housing blade drums and moulds. By creating a clever grooved blade housing, we managed to build this product with only one tool that allows us to interchange its assembly. Our aim was to enter the market long term in the $20 - $30 price range.

 Our revisions produced Prototype 2 which was cool, sleek and trendy. 3D printed using our very own Form Labs 1+ Printer. Once we got this in our hands we collectively agreed that it would need to be sleek and stackable.

Finally we came up with Prototype 3 as shown on all our images which put forward our vision for this product perfectly. We modified the blade housing to require a single moulding tool, the product evolved to a multi functional blade tool giving customers more value for their money!

Rewards & Goals

The Newtonstein Team

Priyesh is the founder of Newtonstein, and is one of the two inventors for this small business.  He has run commerce operations and designed bespoke ecommerce systems for marketplace selling. His success came from Retailing before embarking on Newtonstein.com

Snehal is the vice president of Newtonstein, and a fellow inventor. The dreamer, “we lock him away in a little cupboard and out comes the crazy invention ideas,” he wholly focuses on the next big project. He is a qualified medical professional at the University of East Anglia. His life’s ambition is to develop medical products that will save patient’s lives.

Mrs. S. Patel has a vast amount of experience in management of start up ventures with knowledge of product development, operations and distribution.

Mark Perry is our amazing genius! A wizz designer and 3D modeller. A mechanical design engineer with over 15 year’s experience, he produces 2D and 3D solutions for all areas of design and drafting - everything from concept to photo realistic renderings and manufacturing drawings.  He is a 6 Sigma, qualified to a Black-Belt level, and has experience in Lean Design including FMEA's, Quality Control Procedures and Lean Manufacturing.

We work with numerous professionals in addition to our core team to help us manage various aspects of product invention and consumerism for example Video Graphy, Graphic designers, Press and Marketing, prototype engineers, Legal advisors, Accountants and many more.

Look out for our other inventions coming soon like the world's first desalination water bottle (ability to drink sea water), a sleek blend and go device and many more amazing inventions (well we like to think so). 

Our other Work:

One we have already done is the Intelishake! See it here: bitly.com/intelishake-all

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share the news about our Rouncer Campaign on your social media pages, and with your cooking organizations, home and kitchen enthusiasts and everyone else you can think of!

Here are all the variations: bitly.com/rouncer-all

Patented:

Our utility patent application to protect our design as we think it will be a world beater, is filed at the USPTO, we are currently completing the same process in Europe and China!

Your Orders:

Please note that our prices include free standard international shipping to any location in the world, our knowledge on ecommerce gives us the advantage of having numerous fulfilment partner relationships, we intend to store our products in Europe, where we will ship out all orders worldwide a costs of less than $5 per parcel. Our fulfilment partner can ship out 8000 orders a day without pre planning.

 Some more images of the product:

Carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers and much more for vegetable salads and vegetable dishes  
Celery, leek, kohlrabi, horseradish, mushrooms, radishes for vegetable salads, wok dishes or as ingredients in soups or stews  
Crispy salads like iceberg lettuce, radicchio, Chinese cabbage, etc.  
Bologna, mortadella, ham for pasta salad or cold meat salads  
Cheese like e.g. feta, mozzarella or Gouda for cheese plates, casseroles or salads  
Apples, pears, peaches, apricots, pineapples, bananas, kiwis, melons, mangoes for fruit salads, desserts or for enhancing muesli

Rounded Blade Part S

 
No peeling required, no tears under 5 seconds onion slicer blade insert for:  

Onions for goulash, sauces, hot dogs or wok dishes  
Potatoes for roasted potatoes, casseroles or for potato salad  
Tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers, leek, radishes, mushrooms, patty pan and many others for salads or vegetable dishes  
Bologna or mortadella for salads  
Eggs (boiled) for salads or sauces  
Apples, apricots, bananas, kiwis, mangoes, melons, papaya, pears, peaches, strawberries for fruit salads, desserts or for dressing baked pastry cases and pies

Flat Blade Part G

 
Quarter cutting blade insert for:  

Cucumbers, horseradish, peppers, radishes, tomatoes, zucchini for salads, vegetable dishes and assorted vegetables  
Boiled Eggs for putting on slices of bread and for garnishing dishes  
Cheese (Gouda, Edam, mozzarella, etc.) for cheese plates, cold cuts or for garnishing dishes  
Mushrooms for mushroom dishes or salads  
Large olives for tzatziki or the mediterranean cuisine  
apples, apricots, grapes, kiwis, plums, peaches, pears, Strawberries and more for fruit salads, fitness dishes with slices of fruit, for cocktails or wine coolers  
Citrus fruit like oranges, limes, lemons and more for fitness dishes with slices of fruit, cocktails, wine cooler or for garnishing dishes

Flat Blade Part H

 
Apple coring, wedge and 1/8th cutting blade insert for:

Core apples easily ready for eating into 8 fun parts.  
Potato wedges for baking  
Cucumbers, horseradish, peppers, radishes, tomatoes, zucchini for salads, vegetable dishes and assorted vegetables  
Boiled Eggs for putting on slices of bread and for garnishing dishes  
Cheese (Gouda, Edam, mozzarella, etc.) for cheese plates, cold cuts or for garnishing dishes  
Chunky Mushrooms for mushroom dishes or salads  
apples, apricots, kiwis, plums, peaches, pears and more for fruit salads, fitness dishes with slices of fruit, for cocktails or wine coolers, fruit infusers  
Citrus fruit like oranges, limes, lemons and more for fitness dishes with slices of fruit, cocktails, wine cooler or for garnishing dishes

Flat Blade Part J

 
Small and medium sized cutting insert for:  

Onions, garlic or shallots for cooking and dressings  
Potato sticks or dices as ingredients in soups or stews  
Bell peppers, carrots, celery, cucumbers, leek, kohlrabi, radishes, horseradish, zucchini for vegetable salads, wok dishes or as ingredients in soups or stews  
Bologna or mortadella for salads  
Cheese e.g. Mozzarella, feta or Gouda for salads or casseroles •	Boiled eggs for salads or sauces  
Apples, apricots, bananas, pears, peaches, kiwis, melons, strawberries for fruit salads, desserts or even for enhancing muesli

Flat Blade Part I

 
small sized square cutting insert for:  

Dicing chilli, garlic and herbs like coriander, chives, rosemary, parsley, for dishes or garnishing  
Onions for goulash or onion sauces, casseroles or wok dishes  
Carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers and much more for vegetable salads and vegetable dishes  
Celery, leek, kohlrabi, horseradish, mushrooms, radishes for vegetable salads, wok dishes or as ingredients in soups or stews  
Crispy salads like iceberg lettuce, radicchio, Chinese cabbage, etc.  
Bologna, mortadella, ham for pasta salad or cold meat salads  
Cheese like e.g. feta, mozzarella or Gouda for cheese plates, casseroles or salads  
Apples, pears, peaches, apricots, pineapples, bananas, kiwis, melons, mangoes for fruit salads, desserts or for enhancing muesli  

Flat Blade Part L

 
Large thick square blade insert for:  

Dicing or slicing already peeled Onions  
Raw potatoes for large square cut French fries •	Bell peppers, cucumbers, tomatoes, zucchini, kohlrabi for vegetable salads, wok and vegetable dishes  
Crispy salads, like iceberg lettuce, radicchio, Chinese cabbage, etc. 
Cheese like e.g. cheddar or Gouda for cheese plates or salads  
Apples, apricots, melons, mangoes, pears, peaches, pineapples for wine cooler or fruit salads

Flat Blade Part K

 
Rectangular dicing insert for:  

Onions for goulash or wok dishes  
Potatoes for roasted potatoes, casseroles or for potato salad  
Tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, bell peppers, leek, radishes, mushrooms, patty pan and many others for salads or vegetable dishes  
Bologna or mortadella for salads  
Eggs (boiled) for salads or sauces  
Apples, apricots, bananas, kiwis, mangoes, melons, papaya, pears, peaches, strawberries for fruit salads, desserts or for dressing baked pastry cases and pies

Disc Blade Part M

 
Mandolin slicing blade insert for:  

Onion, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, potatoes, carrots slices  
Mushrooms for dishes  
Kohlrabi, radishes, celery, red radishes  
Red or white cabbage  
Kiwis, apples, pears, bananas for various fruit dishes

Disc Blade Part N

 
Mandolin wavy slicing blade insert for:  

Onion, tomatoes, cucumbers, zucchinis, potatoes, carrots slices  
Kohlrabi, radishes, celery, red radishes  
Red or white cabbage  
Kiwis, apples, pears, bananas

Disc Blade Part O

 
Coarse grating disc blade insert for:  

Fine grating of food like nutmeg for cooking, hot chocolate and more  
Various fine cheese grating like parmesan  
Lemon and orange zest for sauces  
Fine vegetables gratings like carrots, celery or cucumbers

Disc Blade Part P

 
Coarse grating disc blade insert for:  

Various cheeses like parmesan, red leicester and cheddar  
Chocolate  
All harder fruits like apples, pears  
Lemon and orange zest for sauces  
Vegetables gratings like potatoes, carrots, celery, cabbage or cucumbers  
Grate frozen butter on top of sauces and dishes

Disc Blade Part Q

 
Vegetable peeler for:  
Potato, cassava, parsnips sweet potato peeling  
Spiral Cutter / Spiraliser Part E

 
Spiralizing is the art of turning vegetables into noodles/spaghetti, using a spiralizer. Spiral cutting / spiraliser tool is for:

Apple, Pears and more
Beet, Broccoli, Butternut Squash, Cabbage, Carrot, Celeriac, Chayote, Cucumber, Daikon Radish, Jicama, Kohlrabi, Onion, Parsnip, Plantain, Rutabaga, Sweet Potato, Taro Root, Turnip, White Potato, Zucchini + Summer Squash  

The Clearing Tool:
This tool has three functions:
1)	Help in the cleaning of the Rounded Onion dicing and slicing blades after use in order to clear out any onion leaves left behind or stuck in between the blades.
 2)	Acts as the base for clearing food when using the flat discs. When inserted in the Rouncer base device’s semi-circular groove and the handle is pressed down, the food cuttings clears the blades and collects in the small container thanks to the clearing tool and its spikes. 3)	 Disc blade hand guard. When using the disc blades for its mandolin functions in slicing, wavy cutting and even for grating, the hand guard allows you to latch on to the top of the vegetable or block of cheese as you get closer to the blades in order to avoid any finger cuts.  How to use the Rouncer:Take a look at our video for an easy guide on what our patented Rouncer will do for you!
Simply cut an onion into half with a knife and chop of the two ends with shoot and stem, and then place it in the semi-circular groove of the Rouncer base unit, attach the round onion blade on the top blade slot of the unit (pick one out of the 14 depending on your requirement).
Use the top base unit handle to hand press the blade through the onion in the bottom base unit. This will force the onion through the blades.
The onion will not completely go through and collect in the top compartment, about 2mm of the onion skin will stay below the blade which ensures that the scaly leaf does not get cut and go through the blades.
Remove the scaly leaf before adding the next onion to cut up. 
Lift up the top handle of the device, simply peel off the scaly skin on top of the blade.
Put the lid down and turn the device upside down to shake and allow any vegetables stuck between blades to fall through. Use the platform filler tool which also acts as a dicing/slicing clearing tool to clean blades of cuttings which are stuck in between.
To use any of the flat cutting blades, insert the blade, but place the semi-circular plastic space filler in the bottom base unit groove to cover the onion slot and make the surface flat. You can then use the device in the same way as above.
To use the disc blades, insert part to the blade slot and then turn the device upside down with the lid open and away from the base, rotating to the opposite direction. To use the disc blades, you simply slide to mandoline cut, grate, wavy slice and more on the underside of the top lid handle cover rather which is now exposed to the top. Please refer to images for more guidance.

 

 
The Rouncer Family
Rouncer comes designed in 2 cool colours! The "Autumn Lemon" and "The Old Grey".

 
We sprayed the prototypes with acrylic resin and took professional studio images to show and develop our concept, The final production results will resemble the two variations types above.
Rouncer – Form, Function and High Quality
We have designed the Rouncer with quality in mind, a uniquely designed product like nothing else available in the market, a real problem solver and one we believe that will make the world a better place!
It will be constructed of the finest materials and created with precision quality. There will also be a money-back guarantee against defects or cancellation.
Home and kitchen products have become very popular with consumers looking for new cool and useful products to add to their kitchen gadget list. The Rouncer will become a must have tool for every kitchen just as a knife would be, the ability to save you time and stop tears has been very well accepted by reviewers. 
Get perfectly sized and square cut diced onions every time! Slices are of the same thickness every time you chop onions! No more health and safety concerns whilst cutting onions, this is a common knife cut in the kitchen that you can do without, and now with the Rouncer, you can chop away safely.
We have secured retail distribution in the USA and the UK if we successfully manage to mass produce this product. Production planning has already began.

 
In the News:


Our initial prototype V1 made the news because of what it represented, the idea that could become part of everyone's life through their kitchen!
http://www.cateringinsight.com/16150-onion-slicer-maker-looking-for-investors/
What can you do with the Rouncer:
Comes with 14 Multifunctional blades included in the Rouncer including:  The Spiral Julienne strips cutter, Apple coring, Peeler, Grater, Mandoline slicer, Herb chopper, square cutter, pie cutter, rectangular cutter, wavy slicer.
Here are some meals we prepared, with the vegetables and fruits only cut using Rouncer.

 
What We Need, and Why
Newtonstein – that’s the name of our start-up company – has already spent over $18,000 of our own funds in the development of this project, which has enabled us to create a variety of prototypes, apply for our patent, pay for legal fees, set up of logistics and choose a packing operation in Europe just like all our invention approaches.
We require $2,000 to which will enable us to release a third colour option in RED, if we achieve this goal, at the end instead of 2 colour options, you will be able to pick 3 options. We have secured funding for 100% of the production order now. This is where you come in and get to grab the opportunity of becoming one of the first backers to put your hands on one at a discounted price of $40 instead of store retail price of $60! We are not setting any limits, because the more we get funded, the more we can spend on new variations and trade shows to establish this product in global markets whilst putting a team in place to drive its growth through retail distribution in other countries like India because they cook with onions everyday!
All quotations for tooling and manufacturing ready, we got our final prototypes made by the same factory to ensure they are familiar with the product long term.
Funding from our friends at Indiegogo is essential to launch the Rouncer properly. Help us bring this amazing invention to life and revolutionise onion cutting in the kitchen!
The entire process of crowd funding will inevitably help us learn a great deal more about our market, our product and our direction for the future because your critical appraisal and feedback will help us perfect our invention, after all, it is you that will make use of it the most!

 
Retail Distribution:
We have signed agreements with Davison Product Group in the US, we have a verbal agreement with YCE catering distribution company in the UK, and we are in discussions various other marketing groups in the Gulf and Europe to bring Rouncer to stores this Summer.
The Journey
We came up with sketches Prototype 1 of the Rouncer, and started looking at perfecting the design last month, reducing costs as three different blades would require three different housing blade drums and moulds. By creating a clever grooved blade housing, we managed to build this product with only one tool that allows us to interchange its assembly. Our aim was to enter the market long term in the $20 - $30 price range.

 
 Our revisions produced Prototype 2 which was cool, sleek and trendy. 3D printed using our very own Form Labs 1+ Printer. Once we got this in our hands we collectively agreed that it would need to be sleek and stackable.

 
Finally we came up with Prototype 3 as shown on all our images which put forward our vision for this product perfectly. We modified the blade housing to require a single moulding tool, the product evolved to a multi functional blade tool giving customers more value for their money!
Rewards & Goals



The Newtonstein Team

 
Priyesh is the founder of Newtonstein, and is one of the two inventors for this small business.  He has run commerce operations and designed bespoke ecommerce systems for marketplace selling. His success came from Retailing before embarking on Newtonstein.com
Snehal is the vice president of Newtonstein, and a fellow inventor. The dreamer, “we lock him away in a little cupboard and out comes the crazy invention ideas,” he wholly focuses on the next big project. He is a qualified medical professional at the University of East Anglia. His life’s ambition is to develop medical products that will save patient’s lives.
Mrs. S. Patel has a vast amount of experience in management of start up ventures with knowledge of product development, operations and distribution.
Mark Perry is our amazing genius! A wizz designer and 3D modeller. A mechanical design engineer with over 15 year’s experience, he produces 2D and 3D solutions for all areas of design and drafting - everything from concept to photo realistic renderings and manufacturing drawings.  He is a 6 Sigma, qualified to a Black-Belt level, and has experience in Lean Design including FMEA's, Quality Control Procedures and Lean Manufacturing.
We work with numerous professionals in addition to our core team to help us manage various aspects of product invention and consumerism for example Video Graphy, Graphic designers, Press and Marketing, prototype engineers, Legal advisors, Accountants and many more.
Look out for our other inventions coming soon like the world's first desalination water bottle (ability to drink sea water), a sleek blend and go device and many more amazing inventions (well we like to think so). 
Our other Work:
One we have already done is the Intelishake! See it here: bitly.com/intelishake-all
Other Ways You Can Help
Please share the news about our Rouncer Campaign on your social media pages, and with your cooking organizations, home and kitchen enthusiasts and everyone else you can think of!
Here are all the variations: bitly.com/rouncer-all
Patented:
Our utility patent application to protect our design as we think it will be a world beater, is filed at the USPTO, we are currently completing the same process in Europe and China!
Your Orders:
Please note that our prices include free standard international shipping to any location in the world, our knowledge on ecommerce gives us the advantage of having numerous fulfilment partner relationships, we intend to store our products in Europe, where we will ship out all orders worldwide a costs of less than $5 per parcel. Our fulfilment partner can ship out 8000 orders a day without pre planning.

 
 Some more images of the product:

story:
I wanted to find a solution to a problem (no matter how big or small).

  • People need to open a cat can, but it's hard to pry it open with your fingers.
  • People need a spoon to scoop cat food.
  • People have to go to the kitchen drawer to get a spoon.

This revolutionary product helps you pry open your can of cat food, scoop it, and keep it handy on your keychain. And it's nice and long, which can help you turn off a light if the light switch is too high.

Break down:

  • I need money to manufacture it.
  • The unique perks I'm offering are MP3's for ringtones and Cat Can Opener Spoon Keychains and more!
  • If we don't reach our goal, we'll still be able to purchase, but not direct from the manufacturer.

I have a passion to be retired comfortably and this will help me:

  • You can get a fun gift.
  • I can make money.

I have found a few manufacturers and have some connections, but I'm still looking for manufacturers in the USA.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
