story:
About Us

Pepper's Closet is a Benefit Corporation!

Last year, a marine biologist dad and a ladyboss mom created Pepper’s Closet as a way to share their love of the ocean with their baby Pepper. The goal of their custom branded clothing line was simple: become aware by what we wear. Soon, the PC team grew to include people from all walks of life who shared a common love of the sea: visionaries, activists, parents and beach bums alike. Together we’re reimaging possibilities, inspiring new outcomes and challenging others to live an ocean positive life.

We hope to encourage others to get involved and recognize that every small effort helps our planet’s future, even something as simple as the clothes we wear. Our custom crafted apparel features hand-drawn designs that creatively reflect the ocean, and we pair each piece of clothing with an informational tag meant to engage and educate. We donate 10% of all net profits directly to ocean conservation, research and cleanup efforts. We’re devoted to protecting not just our planet’s big blue heart, but ourselves, our children, our communities and generations to come. Our goal is to create a movement that is as limitless and unstoppable as the ocean itself. Together, we can preserve and protect one of Earth’s greatest miracles.

We’re tirelessly championing for our planet’s greatest source of sustenance as it combats severely threatening forces. This is a movement beyond this moment. It’s a tale that never ends. Young and old, large and small…we all inherently share this common thread.   

Our Designs:

What We Need

  • $25,000-$50,000 will be allocated towards education and awareness initiatives (i.e. creating informational product tags, marketing/advertising)It will also be used to bring product manufacturing in-house, enabling us to diversify our product portfolio, accelerate time to market and generate more awareness

  • Additional funding will help sponsor marine explorations designed to improve oceanic health and understanding in some of the most vulnerable marine habitats.  (i.e. travel fare, necessary supplies, research publication)

If we do not reach our goal: We will continue our education, awareness and, if possible, research efforts provided what we are given. The more we raise, the more impact we can have. Your contributions and support will go towards increasing capacity of our team. All contributions help, if you love the ocean, understand the importance and beauty, and want to get involved, we welcome you to contribute what you can. This isn’t going to happen overnight as WE are building a movement. Join us.

What Will You Get?

  • $15 donation: Enjoy a 4-pack of stickers, each with a unique Pepper's Closet design.

  • $29 donation: Get a t-shirt or tank, available in sizes XS-XL.

  • $50 donation: Double the fun! Get two t-shirts or tanks with your design of choice.

  • $99 donation: Enjoy a “Mommy and Me” tank top and Onesie set! or "Daddy and Me" T-shirt set. 

  • $149 donation: Get an original poster-sized graphic print signed by the artist.

  • $4,950 donation: Sponsor one of our scientists on a research exploration trip and receive a t-shirt of your choice, an original poster, and acknowledgment on any research publications from the venture.

  • $37,500 donation: Sponsor a scientist as well as supplies for six months! Receive a t-shirt of your choice, an original poster, and acknowledgment on any publications from their research in those six months.

Timeline:

The Impact

The magic behind Pepper’s Closet is found in those who walk alongside us. People who understand the critical state of our ocean’s health. People who are ready to do more, be more and imagine more for a better world. People like you. By contributing, you’ll help support our planet through countless imperative initiatives. By wearing, you’ll become part of a movement that seeks to inspire others to be like the ocean: strong yet peaceful, brave and pure.

Risks & Challenges

We understand that this journey is not going to be easy, short, or clear… but we are willing and ready to take on the challenge. We choose our impact through a simplistic and impactful vehicle of custom crafted apparel because the message must ring loud and clear: that we acknowledge the state of our ocean, the integral role it plays, and that we need to do something about it. We understand that there will be opposition along the way, but we are choosing to focus on the goodness and positivity of the future. That’s why we are empowering people to join the movement, spread the word, and get involved.

In the coming months, we aim to ramp up production, expand our line, and increase our internal capacity by bringing on new members to our team. We will move forward to identifying and developing partnerships with organizations focused on ocean education, advocacy, and awareness. Our greatest challenge is embracing the entirety of the work to be done, but with one step at a time, one shirt at a time, we can and will make a difference.

We will take on all challenges with love, compassion, and understanding. We aim to build a team of people who share a common purpose and mission, emanating our #bigbluelove to everyone we work with. We will build a movement, empowering people to speak up, express their appreciation for the ocean, and the need to protect it. Through resilience, commitment, and unrelenting purpose, we will overcome any and all obstacles in our path.

Our team is well equipped with scientists, business development specialists, and most importantly: do-ers. Sharing a common goal, we aim to do good and do well. Our intelligence, technical skills, and love will propel us to success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Serious changes are needed to address and reverse the challenges our oceans face. Every effort counts, so please promote Pepper’s Closet through word of mouth and by using the Indiegogo share tools! We can’t thank you enough for helping nurture our planet when it needs it most. Wear your Pepper’s Closet apparel proudly and post pictures tagging @peppers_closet_ living your life #oceanpositive.

FAQ

Where does your money go?

Your money is going to help us increase capacity so we can expand our impact. The more money we raise, the more we are able to produce. We would like to bring production in house so we can support our local economy, employ local artists, local scientists, and local ocean lovers. The stronger we are, the stronger our presences and impact can be. We look to you to help us get there. We aim to be as transparent as possible in our efforts as they are entirely genuine. This is the seed money we need to get moving in a larger way.

Can you ship to different countries?

Yes we can! The ocean is global and so are we. Just an extra tax added.

When can I select my color?

We'll send out a survey shortly after the campaign ends where we'll ask you for your color choice and design.

What next?

We plan to ramp up production and bring on new team members with the funds from this campaign. After that, we begin to expand our apparel line and would like to expand to ocean positive lifestyle clothing for all the people we hope to engage in our work: parents, kids, scientists, and beach bums. We hope to create a line of activewear to support you as you live your ocean positive life!

We are also going to begin building partnerships with organizations focused on ocean education, advocacy, and awareness as the educational component of our work is essential to building a movement and empowering the next generation of ocean stewards. As we build these partnerships we plan to travel and welcome everyone to follow us in our journey! We want to explore the wonders of this #bigblueplant and bring the voices of the ocean to the forefront

Why is there a range in funding?

We want to offer everyone an opportunity to get involved. We believe that transparency is essential because Pepper’s Closet is for the people by the people, we are in this work because we believe in a common goal, and we know you do too. We all have different circumstances and that shouldn’t determine your ability to make your voice heard. We welcome everyone from all walks of life, shapes and sizes, ages and backgrounds to join the movement. We provided tangible reasons for the range in funding so you know exactly how much we need and the incredible impact your donations have. Once again, we are only as powerful as those who walk beside us.

We understand that there will be opposition along the way, but we are choosing to focus on the goodness and positivity of the future. That’s why we are empowering people to join the movement, spread the word, and get involved.
In the coming months, we aim to ramp up production, expand our line, and increase our internal capacity by bringing on new members to our team. We will move forward to identifying and developing partnerships with organizations focused on ocean education, advocacy, and awareness. Our greatest challenge is embracing the entirety of the work to be done, but with one step at a time, one shirt at a time, we can and will make a difference.
We will take on all challenges with love, compassion, and understanding. We aim to build a team of people who share a common purpose and mission, emanating our #bigbluelove to everyone we work with. We will build a movement, empowering people to speak up, express their appreciation for the ocean, and the need to protect it. Through resilience, commitment, and unrelenting purpose, we will overcome any and all obstacles in our path.
Our team is well equipped with scientists, business development specialists, and most importantly: do-ers. Sharing a common goal, we aim to do good and do well. Our intelligence, technical skills, and love will propel us to success.

Other Ways You Can Help
Serious changes are needed to address and reverse the challenges our oceans face. Every effort counts, so please promote Pepper’s Closet through word of mouth and by using the Indiegogo share tools! We can’t thank you enough for helping nurture our planet when it needs it most. Wear your Pepper’s Closet apparel proudly and post pictures tagging @peppers_closet_ living your life #oceanpositive.
FAQ
Where does your money go?
Your money is going to help us increase capacity so we can expand our impact. The more money we raise, the more we are able to produce. We would like to bring production in house so we can support our local economy, employ local artists, local scientists, and local ocean lovers. The stronger we are, the stronger our presences and impact can be. We look to you to help us get there. We aim to be as transparent as possible in our efforts as they are entirely genuine. This is the seed money we need to get moving in a larger way.
Can you ship to different countries?
Yes we can! The ocean is global and so are we. Just an extra tax added.
When can I select my color?
We'll send out a survey shortly after the campaign ends where we'll ask you for your color choice and design.
What next?
We plan to ramp up production and bring on new team members with the funds from this campaign. After that, we begin to expand our apparel line and would like to expand to ocean positive lifestyle clothing for all the people we hope to engage in our work: parents, kids, scientists, and beach bums. We hope to create a line of activewear to support you as you live your ocean positive life!
We are also going to begin building partnerships with organizations focused on ocean education, advocacy, and awareness as the educational component of our work is essential to building a movement and empowering the next generation of ocean stewards. As we build these partnerships we plan to travel and welcome everyone to follow us in our journey! We want to explore the wonders of this #bigblueplant and bring the voices of the ocean to the forefront
Why is there a range in funding?
We want to offer everyone an opportunity to get involved. We believe that transparency is essential because Pepper’s Closet is for the people by the people, we are in this work because we believe in a common goal, and we know you do too. We all have different circumstances and that shouldn’t determine your ability to make your voice heard. We welcome everyone from all walks of life, shapes and sizes, ages and backgrounds to join the movement. We provided tangible reasons for the range in funding so you know exactly how much we need and the incredible impact your donations have. Once again, we are only as powerful as those who walk beside us.

story:
Hey y'all!

I started working on Tee & Honey about three years ago. At the time it was just a hobby. Initially, turning my thoughts into art was a form of therapy. For the first time in my life I lived alone and being creative helped me relax. As time went by, I adjusted to my new living arrangement, but I never stopped creating. On January 1, 2019 Tee & Honey (the business) was born.



How many times have you shared a thought (funny, political or insightful) or read a quote and said to yourself "that should be on a t-shirt."  That's the premise behind Tee & Honey.  We allow you to put your inner thoughts on a t-shirt.  

I love knowing that people all over the world have Tee & Honey merchandise that allows them to openly share their thoughts. Each T-shirt, face mask, mug or tank top reflects our customers' mood.

My favorite part of Tee & Honey is getting to connect with customers, creating custom merchandise for new business owners and receiving pictures of people modeling Tee & Honey apparel.

One of the great things about Tee & Honey is the SAME PRICE promise.  Every size (XS -5X) is the same price.  No one will pay extra money for purchasing a larger size.  Since launching, I've been able to give away free t-shirts to essential workers, offer one-on-one advice to other business owners and create starter kits for kid-entrepreneurs.

The Future of Tee & Honey

I am dedicated to using my business to be of service to other entrepreneurs. I want to support other t-shirt brands by providing printing services to smaller companies. I will continue to work with small businesses in other industries and assist kid-entrepreneurs to start their journey.

Within the next 3 years I will do the following:

  • Spring 2021 - Open the 1st of many Tee & Honey retail locations.
  • Fall 2021 - Launch the Tee & Honey athleisure line
  • Spring 2022 - Launch Tee & Honey Express - a POD facility that works with businesses of color to provide fast, effective and empathetic printing services.
  • Fall 2022 - Expand the Tee & Honey online experience to include original designs by black graphic artists.

I've secured an investor, but I need to come to the table with at least $20,000 to get everything started. 

Tee & Honey needs the following:  

  • A storefront - Currently, my den is my headquarters.  In order to open a retail location and printing facility, Tee & Honey needs a much bigger space.  
  • Printing equipment - Due to demand, I outsource most of my printing jobs.  Purchasing quality equipment will allow me to produce more merchandise at a faster rate. 
  • Inventory - Buying inventory can get expensive.  Buying inventory in larger amounts will tighten up productivity and reduce our shipping timelines.
  • Team of Experts - I need to keep an attorney, marketing expert, in-house designer and production assistants on stand-by. 

As you can see, I have BIG dreams for the Tee & Honey brand. But I need your help. My campaign slogan is "BET ON YOURSELF" and that's exactly what I'm doing but I'm only as strong as my support system.

You can support this campaign by making a donation of any amount.   We also appreciate any social media likes, shares and shout-outs!

Thank You,
Stephanie Penn

C.E.O. / Founder, Teeandhoney.com

story:
Two new fragrances from 4160Tuesdays:

We handmake perfume in West London; we're small, dedicated, enthusiastic about what we do, and a little bit bonkers* but practical and open.

We first crowdfunded a collection of fragrances in 2012, and each time we've needed to take a step forwards we've run a new campaign. Some of our customers have joined in every single one, for which we are more than grateful, and which probably shows that we're doing something right.

We're doing it again, and this time it's serious.

We're making two new fragrances, the dark and the light.

  • Take Me To The River - inspired by the sensual Talking Heads version of Al Green's classic
  • Wash Me In The Water - a line from the same song, but the feeling of being deeply cleansed.

You can choose both or either, and there are many other perks too. They will be very reasonably priced for handmade batches of indie scents, with a margin built in to go into the removals fund.

Why we need your help:

Why? Because we need to move buildings.

Our current building lease runs out in 2019, and that's not long when you have to move a whole small business. We've found a building by the River Thames which is so perfect we nearly cried with joy when we visited. It's slightly larger, so we'll be able to run more workshops, invite more of you over, and have a proper showroom for visitors to come and smell everything.

We're crowdfunding to bridge the gap between being in our current workshop, and setting up in the new one.

The gap where you realise that the wifi doesn't work yet, the power isn't switched on, your suppliers are still delivering your materials to the old building, you can't run your workshops because half your materials are in storage... That gap. We need to keep running smoothly while we move to the new place, and the best way we can do that is to make it happen as quickly and smoothly as possible.

Like we said, we're practical. We know this is going to be tricky and so we're preparing for that.

Why we're doing this now:

We're based in London, near the new Crossrail line which will probably open next year. For that reason property prices in this little local bubble are rocketing. Next year, when our lease runs out, we don't have the right to stay. A neighbouring company just left after being offered a new lease with a 50% rent increase and a charge of £10K to renew it, so even if we wanted to, we can't afford that. We seriously considered just selling up and shutting down, then we looked at the alternatives, and decided to aim to stay in business, go somewhere else, and do it by doing what we do best: making perfume.

This is going to be disruptive, but not as disruptive as a 50% rent increase when you;'e as tiny as we are. So:

  • We're moving! We've found a building we'd love to rent but it would all fall through and we'd need to find another, but we still need to move whatever happens. 
  • Many of you already know what we do, and will trust us to do it again. If you're new to 4160Tuesdays, well you might get a surprise when you first smell our fragrances, but we really believe you will not be disappointed.
  • As always, if we don't reach our goal you will still get your fragrances, and we'll look for another place to move to in the meantime.

We're not doing this to get noticed, or to get bought by the big guys (we're too left field for them anyway), we really just want to keep on doing what we're doing, but things change and we've got to step up. We're doing it because we're not ready to give it all up yet.

What You'll Get:

We're making two fragrances, and all our perks are based around them. 

These will be one-off special editions for everyone who joins us here, then  they're only be available at our new building.

1. Take Me To The River

Our first fragrance is based on the Talking Heads live 1980s version of Take Me To The River:

"to capture by the feeling of an irresistible attraction to someone who's very bad for you but that you don't want to give up, not yet. If you've been there, you're probably very glad to be out of it, and maybe look back with a certain fondness but much more relief." Sarah.

Do listen to the song to get the idea, but we asked our Facebook group, 4160Tuesdays News what it should smell like and we got:

"whiskey, cigarettes, money, 80s loud perfume, lipstick, salt water/tears, dirt, roses and leather"

"sex and leather and tobacco"

"cocoa with the birch tar, orange, sandalwood and vetiver"

"Oakmoss, Patchouli, Civet, Smoke, Musk"

"Petrol, chalk, damp wood and metal (bit like what guitars smell like) and sweet sweaty musks. Analog cameras and bakelite, rubber shoes and vintage aftershave. 80’s velvet upholstery"

"fag smoke, leather jackets, sticky wooden floors, face powder, lippy & massive clouds of Elnett hairspray"

We're working on it now, but you get the general idea of the inspiration behind it.

2. Wash Me In the Water

"The fragrance of a soul-cleansing wildwater swim on a hot day, drying off on warm grass. A baptismal dunking in cool fresh water; a scented intervention to save you from yourself." Sarah

And from our Facebook group:

"Grass - riverside. Climbing/wild rose, wild thyme, apple blossom, sloe and bramble berry - all growing beside our local river"

"Wilted wild flowers for innocence lost"

"Wildflowers, grass, vanilla, wood, ambergris"

"moss, patchouli and a hint of salvation and release"

"Incense and magnolia with a hint of mint julep"

If you'd like to come over to 4160Tuesdays News, and join in with all these wonderful people,  feel free.

What happens if we reach the target?

  • We make and send out all the fragrances - all being well in this unpredictable world. We've always delivered everything we've promised, and barring totally unforseen natural (or unnatural) disasters we'll get these to you this side of 2019.
  • By raising all the funds in advance, we can produce bigger batches than we usually do, deliver them in a huge all-hands-to-the-pump effort, and give ourselves a couple of weeks to move ALL the kit from one building to another, 

What happens if we don't?

  • We still make and send out ALL your fragrances.
  • We might not be able to move into the new building, but we'll have a few months to come up with plan B.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you don't wear perfume; maybe these two don't sound quite your cup of tea, but if you know some fragrance fans, please let them know what we're up to.

Please share this campaign on your Facebook page or your Twitter feed, and tell your friends.

Thanks.

story:
My Who What and Why

Hi, I'm Marcel, owner of Elements Of Style, LLC and creator of the Bona Fide New Yorker brand and the NYC Wear and Gear line of gift items, garments and accessories.

Since creating my line, I've been seeking companies willing and able to supply me with premium athleisure apparel at prices that would enable me to provide performing artists, dancers, coaches, fitness enthusiasts, athletes, active lifestyle individuals, etc., with performance wear that provides unparalleled value.

Said value to be achieved by collaborating with  a few select suppliers, one in particular that exploits the advantages of a finely tuned and totally vertically integrated operation that enables them to as an actual owner of fabric mills and dye houses, and therefore non reliant on others to satisfy their material related requirements, maintain complete control over everything. And I do mean EVERYTHING ... from the production speed, quality and costs of their 15 proprietary and unique Polyester and Poly-blend performance fabrics through the dying, cutting, sewing and subsequent steps efficiently executed inside their own Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP) approved and routinely monitored garment manufacturing factories.

The recent success of my preferred partners search resulted in the initial items of my new Practice With Purpose Perform With Passion (PWP) Collection  featured in the campaign video.

However while the pieces look great unembellished, it's clear some folks prefer to sport designs on their performance wear.

So the goal of my crowdfunding campaign is to raise funds that I will use to have professional graphic designers create for me unique artwork that I can have my printer partners apply to various pieces or do so myself using heat transfers in combination with my trusty Heat Press.

Also, as one born and bred in the Boogie Down Bronx who strongly believes dancing, or even simply viewing dance, positively affects our emotions and moods, 10% of the amount raised (minus administrative fees) up to the $1,500 target will be donated to MIT Mocha Moves -- a hip-hop dance team that promotes and celebrates urban dance culture at my alma mater and in the Greater Boston area.

So check out the PWP Collection and if you are a dancer, support dance, love athleisure wear, or see items that are ideal for you or folks you give presents to, please back my campaign and help make my proposed funding of decorative artwork a reality by selecting a perk at the support or contribution level with which you are comfortable and then sharing word of this campaign with friends, relatives, associates and anyone else you believe will be inclined to do the same.

PWP Collection Perks

In exchange for your support,  you will receive the perks of your choice at discounted pricing with Free Shipping in the United States, be among the first to wear or use them, and receive advance notice regarding NYC Wear and Gear's new products ... in particular any limited edition offerings.

Closely allied and collaborating with FIT alumni and technologists focused on fashion related innovation, look for NYC Wear and Gear to in the future introduce products that feature wearable electronics, exploit the special attributes of high tech materials or via the use of patented technology and a facilitating process provide custom tailored level, superb fit garments that require no tailor visits.

Pledged money received in excess of the $1,500 goal will be used to commission additional artwork, purchase heat transfers,  enable me to invest in a 6" x 10" heat press platen, and fund donations to a yet to be identified New York City-based, dance related  501(c)3 tax exempt non-profit organization and The Debbie Allen Dance Academy out in Los Angeles.  

Detailed information about all of the Collection products, as well as others offered as perks, is provided in the product descriptions with some also residing in the Perks Selection section.

When Perks allow for the associated items to be provided decorated with Bonus Graphics,  supporters will select the  graphics they desire from those featured in the following collage.

The Bonus graphic designs will be Direct To Garment printed or heat pressed in the center chest area as shown in some of the Perk images.  

The artwork I commission will mainly be for sublimation all over print pieces and feature much more complex, multi-colored designs similar to those often seen on Tees, hoodies & leggings.

Examples of the latter two are the tiger face zippered hoodie and combination mandala wave pattern leggings designs shown here that were done by Martin Marz (@marzgfx_)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Given the widespread appeal and acceptance of black leggings, I believe the two premium pairs I included in my PWP Collection have the potential to be its most popular pieces

Available blank, but shown below and in the introductory video bearing the leggings version of the Forever A Dancer graphic I created, the first of these “go-to” garments is primarily cotton, blended with just enough Elastane (Spandex) to provide a fantastic fit and sensational support.

Those who prefer pocket leggings will be pleased to know ours are excellent compression pieces constructed of an ultra soft luxury performance fabric that features moisture management anti-microbial technology.

Guys will be able to choose between open bottom and jogger style sweatpants, both 100% Polyester with two on seam side pockets.

The only item in the collection that features Unisex sizing is our lightweight, droptail, long sleeve hoodie.

Our regular hoodie is of the classic pullover with kangaroo pouch pocket variety and 100% Polyester.

The Men's gear pocket version is very similar to the regular hoodie, but features raglan cut shoulders and a reflective seam sealed pocket with lock down zipper.

Because they are popular with men and women, we elected to include classic look. long sleeve, ¼ zip tops. Both versions are constructed of a Polyester and Spandex blend material and feature raglan cut shoulders. The women's version has cuffed sleeves with thumb hole openings.

For guys who are only happy wearing tops that use compression technology, we included both a long and a short sleeve compression Tee. Usable as rash guard shirts, they feature raglan cut shoulders, contrast cover stitching and moisture management/anti-microbial technology,

Since on many occasions a simple Tee is more than satisfactory, we provide classic crew neck Long and short sleeve versions for men and offer ladies a short sleeve one with a more stylish V. All three feature raglan cut shoulders and moisture management/anti-microbial technology,

Wrapping things up we have for women a racerback tank top constructed of an ultra soft with stretch, luxury performance fabric and for men a 100% Polyester rice hole mesh reversible tank top with white contrast side panels.

 

Miscellaneous Perks

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Since I have already identified multiple graphic designers who possess the requisite expertise and experience as well as very good customer references/performance reviews, I believe whichever ones with whom I choose to work will be able to produce excellent designs, in a professional manner, within an agreed upon time frame.

I do not envision any challenges that will need to be overcome or risks I will have to manage.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have no interest in any of the perks or you actually  do but simply aren't in a position to back my campaign by making a pledge, you can still contribute to my cause.

Simply ask folks with whom you communicate to make those with whom they interact aware my campaign is underway in case any of them are interested in dance and/or Athleisure Wear and would like to contribute.

Indiegogo makes it easy for everyone to spread the word using their share tools.

So the goal of my crowdfunding campaign is to raise funds that I will use to have professional graphic designers create for me unique artwork that I can have my printer partners apply to various pieces or do so myself using heat transfers in combination with my trusty Heat Press.
Also, as one born and bred in the Boogie Down Bronx who strongly believes dancing, or even simply viewing dance, positively affects our emotions and moods, 10% of the amount raised (minus administrative fees) up to the $1,500 target will be donated to MIT Mocha Moves -- a hip-hop dance team that promotes and celebrates urban dance culture at my alma mater and in the Greater Boston area.

So check out the PWP Collection and if you are a dancer, support dance, love athleisure wear, or see items that are ideal for you or folks you give presents to, please back my campaign and help make my proposed funding of decorative artwork a reality by selecting a perk at the support or contribution level with which you are comfortable and then sharing word of this campaign with friends, relatives, associates and anyone else you believe will be inclined to do the same.


PWP Collection Perks
In exchange for your support,  you will receive the perks of your choice at discounted pricing with Free Shipping in the United States, be among the first to wear or use them, and receive advance notice regarding NYC Wear and Gear's new products ... in particular any limited edition offerings.
Closely allied and collaborating with FIT alumni and technologists focused on fashion related innovation, look for NYC Wear and Gear to in the future introduce products that feature wearable electronics, exploit the special attributes of high tech materials or via the use of patented technology and a facilitating process provide custom tailored level, superb fit garments that require no tailor visits.
Pledged money received in excess of the $1,500 goal will be used to commission additional artwork, purchase heat transfers,  enable me to invest in a 6" x 10" heat press platen, and fund donations to a yet to be identified New York City-based, dance related  501(c)3 tax exempt non-profit organization and The Debbie Allen Dance Academy out in Los Angeles.  
Detailed information about all of the Collection products, as well as others offered as perks, is provided in the product descriptions with some also residing in the Perks Selection section.
When Perks allow for the associated items to be provided decorated with Bonus Graphics,  supporters will select the  graphics they desire from those featured in the following collage.

The Bonus graphic designs will be Direct To Garment printed or heat pressed in the center chest area as shown in some of the Perk images.  
The artwork I commission will mainly be for sublimation all over print pieces and feature much more complex, multi-colored designs similar to those often seen on Tees, hoodies & leggings.
Examples of the latter two are the tiger face zippered hoodie and combination mandala wave pattern leggings designs shown here that were done by Martin Marz (@marzgfx_)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Given the widespread appeal and acceptance of black leggings, I believe the two premium pairs I included in my PWP Collection have the potential to be its most popular pieces
Available blank, but shown below and in the introductory video bearing the leggings version of the Forever A Dancer graphic I created, the first of these “go-to” garments is primarily cotton, blended with just enough Elastane (Spandex) to provide a fantastic fit and sensational support.

Those who prefer pocket leggings will be pleased to know ours are excellent compression pieces constructed of an ultra soft luxury performance fabric that features moisture management anti-microbial technology.

Guys will be able to choose between open bottom and jogger style sweatpants, both 100% Polyester with two on seam side pockets.

The only item in the collection that features Unisex sizing is our lightweight, droptail, long sleeve hoodie.

Our regular hoodie is of the classic pullover with kangaroo pouch pocket variety and 100% Polyester.


The Men's gear pocket version is very similar to the regular hoodie, but features raglan cut shoulders and a reflective seam sealed pocket with lock down zipper.

Because they are popular with men and women, we elected to include classic look. long sleeve, ¼ zip tops. Both versions are constructed of a Polyester and Spandex blend material and feature raglan cut shoulders. The women's version has cuffed sleeves with thumb hole openings.

For guys who are only happy wearing tops that use compression technology, we included both a long and a short sleeve compression Tee. Usable as rash guard shirts, they feature raglan cut shoulders, contrast cover stitching and moisture management/anti-microbial technology,

Since on many occasions a simple Tee is more than satisfactory, we provide classic crew neck Long and short sleeve versions for men and offer ladies a short sleeve one with a more stylish V. All three feature raglan cut shoulders and moisture management/anti-microbial technology,

Wrapping things up we have for women a racerback tank top constructed of an ultra soft with stretch, luxury performance fabric and for men a 100% Polyester rice hole mesh reversible tank top with white contrast side panels.



 
Miscellaneous Perks



 





 



 
Risks & Challenges
Since I have already identified multiple graphic designers who possess the requisite expertise and experience as well as very good customer references/performance reviews, I believe whichever ones with whom I choose to work will be able to produce excellent designs, in a professional manner, within an agreed upon time frame.
I do not envision any challenges that will need to be overcome or risks I will have to manage.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you have no interest in any of the perks or you actually  do but simply aren't in a position to back my campaign by making a pledge, you can still contribute to my cause.
Simply ask folks with whom you communicate to make those with whom they interact aware my campaign is underway in case any of them are interested in dance and/or Athleisure Wear and would like to contribute.
Indiegogo makes it easy for everyone to spread the word using their share tools.

Leather:

Genuine Italian sustainable leather
Aniline through-dyed, Chrome tanning
Corrected grain, Pigmented

 

Size:

Width and length for all modules: 105mm x 76mm

Thickness varies from module to module:
Card: 4mm
Cash: 7mm
Coin: 13mm
Key: 5mm

The hinge:
Width: 6mm
Length: 76mm

 

RFID Protection:

All modules are RFID protected except for the extra pockets of card and coin modules to allow contactless payment through the wallet. The pockets with no RFID protection are on the inside when two modules are connected, so the wallet does not lose security.

 

Colour options:

Goldenhide

Nightsky

Bordeaux

story:
MELU MONKEY: Ultra-Comfortable and Eco-Friendly Baby Nappies

Only the best for your child!

You want the best for your baby, and you already know that nappies play an important role in taking care of your child. I, Shabnam Ahmed, know that well too.

At the same time, disposable nappies represent a huge burden for the environment - by the time our baby is potty trained, the baby could use 4,000 to 6,000 disposable nappies (Source: Wrap.co.uk).

That is why I launched Melu Monkey, inspired by my daughter, Amelia (nicknamed Melu), who is now 4 years old: to address a lot of the significant issues that parents face nowadays AND to preserve the environment.

My team at Melu Monkey and I, have the ultimate answer, the unique combination: Melu Monkey ECO-Nappies!

Melu Monkey Eco-Nappies offer a seamless combination: they are ultra-comfortable for the baby and super-friendly for the environment. How?

 

Ultra-Comfortable

Our Eco nappies are predominantly made from Bamboo because of its amazing qualities and sustainability.

1) It is soft & silky to the touch, yet extremely strong & absorbent.

2) It is 100% biodegradable and is not polluting to the environment.

3) Bamboo grows extremely fast without the use of chemical fertilizers or pesticides.

4) Bamboo has moisture-wicking & thermal regulating capabilities that keep your baby’s skin dry & comfortable in both hot and cold temperatures.

5) Bamboo is naturally hypoallergenic & antibacterial, making it ideal for those with sensitive skin.

6) It is odour resistant.

 

Super-Friendly For The Environment

As well as being friendly for the baby, we wanted to ensure that our Eco nappies are friendly to mother earth. Unlike most disposable nappies on the market, we did not want our Eco nappies to sit on the landfills for the next 500 years (like most regular disposable nappies) and destroy and harm nature. So, what did we do:

1) We made biodegradable nappies. Which means the nappy breaks down in a fraction of time compared to regular disposable nappies. In fact, once disposed of, it takes about 75 days for over 60% of our Eco nappies to degrade. 

2) We ensure that the raw materials are from sustainable resources in compliance with the FSC guidelines. In fact, we are in the process of being certified by the FSC.

3) We ensure that our raw materials are ethically sourced.

4) We ensure that our labour workforce is treated with respect as far as adequate work conditions and remuneration are concerned.

5) Our nappies are wrapped in a biodegradable polybag that biodegrades within 18 months once disposed of.

6) Unlike other biodegradable nappies who only have a biodegradable filling, our nappies are over 80% biodegradable. In comparison, other leading biodegradable nappies are on average only 50% - 70% biodegradable. 

7) We also make use of Total Chlorine Free (TCF) materials, meaning that the nappies have not been subjected to dangerous chemicals in any part of the manufacturing process to ensure a safe product for your babies.

What is TCF and What Are Its Benefits?

1) TCF bleaching is a part of the bleaching process that is undertaken without the use of chlorine.

2) As a result, the process has a much lower impact on the environment

3) Lowers Energy Costs

4) Provides for easy defibering and good pad integrity through the high network strength

5) Removes toxic elements from the nappies.

6) According to Pediatrics and Dermatologists, children are extremely vulnerable to Toxic exposures given their hand to mouth behaviours, floor play, and developing nervous and reproductive systems.

 

Doing good for your baby and for mother earth? Irresistible!

Rewards

In gratitude for your support, we at Melu Monkey want to give something back to you. Below are the coupons that we have put in place based on your desired level of support:

  1. Claim your coupon for a 10% discount on all purchases from www.melumonkey.co.uk for a period of 3 months beginning anytime in 2021 for £10.00.

 

  1. Claim your coupon for a 10% discount on all purchases from www.melumonkey.co.uk for a period of 6 months beginning anytime in 2021 for £20.00.

 

  1. Claim your coupon for a 10% discount on all purchases from www.melumonkey.co.uk for a period of 12 months beginning anytime in 2021 for £40.00.

 

  1. Claim your coupon for a 10% discount on all purchases from www.melumonkey.co.uk for a period of 24 months beginning anytime in 2021 for £80.00.

 

  1. Claim your coupon for a 10% discount on all purchases from www.melumonkey.co.uk for a period of 36 months beginning anytime in 2021 for £160.00.

 

  1. Claim your coupon for a 10% discount on all purchases from melumonkey.co.uk for life beginning anytime in 2021 for £1000.00.

 

Purchase your coupon by the 13th October 2020 and receive the Super Early Bird prize of an additional 10% discount for your qualifying period (a total of 20%).

Purchase your coupon before between 14th October 2020 and 20th October 2020 and receive the Early Bird prize of an additional 5% discount for your qualifying period (a total of 15%).

On average, a standard £40.00 coupon could see you with savings of between £75.00 and £140.00 (subject to usage) over the course of 12 months.  Purchase your coupon before the 13th October 2020 and you can double your savings with the Super Early Bird Prize. There are no limitations to the use of the discount on your purchases in the qualifying periods. So the more you buy the more you save.

With our idea to add new Eco products for babies and children to www.melumonkey.co.uk over the coming years, the longer your qualifying period the greater the savings you can enjoy. Remember your discount is applicable to all of the products on www.melumonkey.co.uk.

 

Team

Shabnam is the founder of Melu Monkey. She has had a diverse portfolio having worked across various sectors including Energy, Engineering, IT and Legal within Magic Circle and FTSE 100 companies. She has previously launched her own line of fashionable silk scarves and is a proud mother of four children.

Seher is amongst the youngest in the team, with expertise in working with young children in EYFS. Her expertise of children has been invaluable throughout the process. She is young and vibrant and quite the foodie. She has a remarkable singing voice and has no reservations with sharing that with her friends and family.

 

Timeline

05/2016 – Amelia was born

08/2017 – Concept of Melu Monkey came about

03/2018 – Extensive research began into nappies and ECO living

12/2019 – Original concept was formed

08/2020 – Melu Monkey trademark registered

08/2020 – Design developed and tested

10/2020 – Indiegogo Launch

01/2021 – Intended launch of the official Melu Monkey Eco Nappies in the United Kingdom

12/2021 – Intended launch of the official Melu Monkey Eco Nappies across Europe 

The funds raised through this campaign will be used to complete the production of our amazing Eco nappies and support the marketing efforts.

 

FAQ

What sizes will the Melu Monkey Eco-nappies be made available?

Our nappies will be available from New-Born size to a UK Size 5 Nappy. We intend to have the larger sizes available in the Melu Monkey Eco-Nappy pants which we will be coming soon.

What is the purpose of the elasticated waistband?

The elasticated waistband helps with the comfortability of the Eco-nappy for your baby, especially when they are moving and bending around.

How well do Melu Monkey Eco Nappies absorb compared to other leading brands?

Our tests have shown that the Melu Monkey Eco Nappy is at the very least equivalent to but in most instances more absorbent than leading branded nappies on the market.

Have you tried the Melu Monkey Eco Nappies?

Our test batch of Melu Monkey Eco Nappies has been used by my youngest 2 daughters who loved them. In fact, they refused to wear other leading brand nappies afterwards and very quickly transitioned from Nappies to being toilet trained. Although you may think the view is biased, have a read of some of the reviews that we have received from our test group below.

Where can I buy the Melu Monkey Eco Nappies?

The Melu Monkey Eco Nappies will be available from www.melumonkey.co.uk. We will keep you updated on any further platforms/venues through our social media and newsletters.

 

Risks and Challenges

A project such as this is one that is complex and very ambitious and we at Melu Monkey recognize this fact and have for that reason spent a considerable length of time and resources invested into this to ensure that we can bring something amazing to the market for children.

We have partnered with credible suppliers from across the globe to source the raw materials and a specialist accredited manufacturer to ensure that the Melu Monkey Eco Nappy is made to the highest standards. Over the course of the next 12 months we hope to gain our accreditations with various bodies including the FSC (Forest Stewardship Council), and we will keep you updated on our progress throughout on our social media and email newsletters.

We have completed our technical testing and are now gearing up for the mass production. Whilst we are optimistic that we will be ready to start supplying the Melu Monkey Eco Nappy to you in January 2021, we are mindful of potential delays in the service chain as a result of the global pandemic that has affected the world. However, we will keep you updated on any such changes.

story:
I started selling sunglasses in a tiny store at downtown Miami in 2000. The store was as narrow as the front door! 

A few years later, I was manufacturing  eyeglasses and sunglasses in Italy! After a while, the Italians started to manufacture sunglasses in China, and so I started to manufacture over there too.

In 2007, I decided to go back to my country with an eyewear distribution. Unfortunately, that was the wrong decision. A bad partnership in the eyewear distribution left me in bad shape, and I lost almost everything.

At that moment, I said to myself: Someday, I will turn this “Bad into a Good”. And that's what I've done after 10 years with this FIX-OO! 

I came back to the USA in 2015, and in 2017 this great idea came to me, and with some good investments it became a patent grant in 2019.

But everything started in 2018, prototyping, samples molds, designing, engineers and the search for investors.

The product was so promising and with some real prototypes and some customer pre- approval orders, I found a partner!

It took me over three years of hard work and resilience to finish and deliver, nothing can stop it! We get alone, we lose about everything, we lose our minds.  But !!

The product is finally ready! It has the best workability and quality. But the quantity is not large enough for us yet. That's why I've created this campaign. We need your help to import and produce more.

“Great Design x Functional; That is the only way to goals”. 

FIX-OO   3-in-1 product, Triple purpose, 3 Novel Inventions in one package!

1- The new Magnet Clip system – place at temples to hook tight in your Shirt’s collar.  

2- The new Magnet Cord system – you may wear as a Bracelet, it is comfortable and imperceptible in your head. Attaches and detaches so easily. FIX-00 holds the glasses on the top of head as well.

 3- The new car’s Magnetic Support system. To the car’s dash or hoof. Even besides the bed. (holds 2 glasses).

Practice any Sport, with your Optical glasses or Sunglasses in the use position, go to the pool, beach without any worries of losing or dropping your glasses. Having them secure fastened in your shirt’s collar or on top of your Head, You will not leave them behind and always have them "HANDY" when you need them most. Attaches your Glasses at the hoof of the car with  the magnetic support as well. 

You may say: But I dress my Prescription Glasses in the morning and I take it out only at nigh. Oh Boy, ohh Girl. Aren't you losing great moments with Sunglasses ? We need them both very handy!

PERKS

To Eyeglasses and Sunglasses.

The Accessories PERKS – The First Kit Anti-Fall you can fix one Glass, it is a self-Install Kit and you have 6 Magnets inside the three parts.

The Last Accessory Perk Kit Anti-Fall you have 34 Magnets inside all the parts. This is huge…!(only at Indiegogo).

The Kit Anti-Fall accessories are self-installed on the eyewear’s temples with a convenient Installer Tool provided in the packages. 

Prescription Glasses or Sunglasses:  We cover all, METAL Frames, PLASTIC frames, WOOD.

Give life to your dearest glasses that you like, we don’t want to lose it and want it always by our side.

The Sun-Glasses PERKS – We have the FIX-OO KIT Installed on most sold models of Ladies, Mans, Sport and Unisex. These modern models from our collection are nicely matched with the soft silicone Kit color.

Ladies, Mans and Sport glasses to wear with your Soft cord, for radical moves. The cord allows you to wear it on top of your head as well, be cool and have it securely held.

These 3 solutions are real and work perfectly!

Is anyone out there getting tired of solutions that bring us more problems? Check the secret  Perk to gift someone.

Extra soft cords, if your glasses slips from the right position, the transparent cord is your color just wear all day long, it does not feels and are imperceptible. I promise you,  you're going to miss it if you don’t have plenty; they're so comfortable!  Six different colors to wear in your wrists as bracelets , to have it anywhere you need. Do you want to jump? Go ahead and jump!

We got a Magnet Strap style coming soon, for more radical needs. check on add on.

Glasses always “HANDY” no Fall, no misplacing Headache. We will change the world… We are going to revolutionize the way of Eyewear use (just about time). We, meaning me and you with your support. Even if we "change the world just a little bit", and you will give my life a new purpose too, to others too. I will not be able to thank you enough.

 

FIX-OO is ready and after assembling in boxes will be ready to import. FIX-OO will be shipped in March if I have the money to pay for the 10,000 kits, freight and duties.

We have in the USA 800 kits to deliver for Indiegogo. It is just about assembling inside the boxes too, The first supporters and shared viewers will have  FIX-OO sent right the way, 

I am short at $9,000.00 USD. 

Transportation and taxes duties are already calculated, with a Freight forwarder company. I have invested the last three years full time and only God knows how I got here.

We got to change the old way, it is just about time, actually we are way behind on Eyewear evolution.

The product has been self-proven efficiency and 100% likely approval. It will not be stopped; they tried stepping in my neck before, it happens, but I will not stop to breathe this work.  The novel product is bigger than it, with resiliency we will have the FIX-OO product launch, with your kind help.

This is a big improvement in glasses lifestyle, and everybody’s life. “The Real Solution''.

Resilience spirit, kindness and belief. We fall, we try again, right?

People says:

“Why didn’t you came up with this solution 20 years ago”

“This is so simple and clever”

“I remember an expensive nice glass that I lost”

The most picky people are saying: “Yeh good power and strong grip”. 

“It feels so good. One less problem to worry”

“My kids love it”

Let’s make some noise getting it before everybody else, such a nice feeling of “Secure Freedom” and sharing the campaign, this is a simple not expensive very innovative gift to give.  To show and share, I need your Help. And everybody needs FIX-OO in their  Eyeglasses or Sunglasses

Don’t you want it in your hands? Only here we will do this kind of deal.

Would it be that crazy to get on board?

All angel supporters of FIX-OO Project get first dibs.  Two new patents are pending on top of it. We won’t stop, You going to be proud.  Be a part of it around the world, and talk about distribution. If you believe in people and in a better world.

FIX-OO Project has a social cause. We want to give special kids jobs, We will train them to Install  the kits on the Glasses. Please be a part of it. The social cause is described in the packages. So me and you, we will not stop here !! We will never stop.

Some day a special kid will stop you and ask: Sir or Lady, may I install a FIX-OO in your glasses? Friends, angels we will not be able to thank God enough.

You don't want miss it and  "change the world just a little bit"  

 

Thank You very much

God Bless
story_txt:
I started selling sunglasses in a tiny store at downtown Miami in 2000. The store was as narrow as the front door! 
A few years later, I was manufacturing  eyeglasses and sunglasses in Italy! After a while, the Italians started to manufacture sunglasses in China, and so I started to manufacture over there too.
In 2007, I decided to go back to my country with an eyewear distribution. Unfortunately, that was the wrong decision. A bad partnership in the eyewear distribution left me in bad shape, and I lost almost everything.
At that moment, I said to myself: Someday, I will turn this “Bad into a Good”. And that's what I've done after 10 years with this FIX-OO! 
I came back to the USA in 2015, and in 2017 this great idea came to me, and with some good investments it became a patent grant in 2019.
But everything started in 2018, prototyping, samples molds, designing, engineers and the search for investors.
The product was so promising and with some real prototypes and some customer pre- approval orders, I found a partner!
It took me over three years of hard work and resilience to finish and deliver, nothing can stop it! We get alone, we lose about everything, we lose our minds.  But !!
The product is finally ready! It has the best workability and quality. But the quantity is not large enough for us yet. That's why I've created this campaign. We need your help to import and produce more.


“Great Design x Functional; That is the only way to goals”. 
FIX-OO   3-in-1 product, Triple purpose, 3 Novel Inventions in one package!
1- The new Magnet Clip system – place at temples to hook tight in your Shirt’s collar.  
2- The new Magnet Cord system – you may wear as a Bracelet, it is comfortable and imperceptible in your head. Attaches and detaches so easily. FIX-00 holds the glasses on the top of head as well.
 3- The new car’s Magnetic Support system. To the car’s dash or hoof. Even besides the bed. (holds 2 glasses).
Practice any Sport, with your Optical glasses or Sunglasses in the use position, go to the pool, beach without any worries of losing or dropping your glasses. Having them secure fastened in your shirt’s collar or on top of your Head, You will not leave them behind and always have them "HANDY" when you need them most. Attaches your Glasses at the hoof of the car with  the magnetic support as well. 
You may say: But I dress my Prescription Glasses in the morning and I take it out only at nigh. Oh Boy, ohh Girl. Aren't you losing great moments with Sunglasses ? We need them both very handy!


PERKS
To Eyeglasses and Sunglasses.
The Accessories PERKS – The First Kit Anti-Fall you can fix one Glass, it is a self-Install Kit and you have 6 Magnets inside the three parts.
The Last Accessory Perk Kit Anti-Fall you have 34 Magnets inside all the parts. This is huge…!(only at Indiegogo).
The Kit Anti-Fall accessories are self-installed on the eyewear’s temples with a convenient Installer Tool provided in the packages. 
Prescription Glasses or Sunglasses:  We cover all, METAL Frames, PLASTIC frames, WOOD.
Give life to your dearest glasses that you like, we don’t want to lose it and want it always by our side.
The Sun-Glasses PERKS – We have the FIX-OO KIT Installed on most sold models of Ladies, Mans, Sport and Unisex. These modern models from our collection are nicely matched with the soft silicone Kit color.
Ladies, Mans and Sport glasses to wear with your Soft cord, for radical moves. The cord allows you to wear it on top of your head as well, be cool and have it securely held.
These 3 solutions are real and work perfectly!
Is anyone out there getting tired of solutions that bring us more problems? Check the secret  Perk to gift someone.
Extra soft cords, if your glasses slips from the right position, the transparent cord is your color just wear all day long, it does not feels and are imperceptible. I promise you,  you're going to miss it if you don’t have plenty; they're so comfortable!  Six different colors to wear in your wrists as bracelets , to have it anywhere you need. Do you want to jump? Go ahead and jump!
We got a Magnet Strap style coming soon, for more radical needs. check on add on.
Glasses always “HANDY” no Fall, no misplacing Headache. We will change the world… We are going to revolutionize the way of Eyewear use (just about time). We, meaning me and you with your support. Even if we "change the world just a little bit", and you will give my life a new purpose too, to others too. I will not be able to thank you enough.

 
FIX-OO is ready and after assembling in boxes will be ready to import. FIX-OO will be shipped in March if I have the money to pay for the 10,000 kits, freight and duties.
We have in the USA 800 kits to deliver for Indiegogo. It is just about assembling inside the boxes too, The first supporters and shared viewers will have  FIX-OO sent right the way, 
I am short at $9,000.00 USD. 
Transportation and taxes duties are already calculated, with a Freight forwarder company. I have invested the last three years full time and only God knows how I got here.
We got to change the old way, it is just about time, actually we are way behind on Eyewear evolution.
The product has been self-proven efficiency and 100% likely approval. It will not be stopped; they tried stepping in my neck before, it happens, but I will not stop to breathe this work.  The novel product is bigger than it, with resiliency we will have the FIX-OO product launch, with your kind help.
This is a big improvement in glasses lifestyle, and everybody’s life. “The Real Solution''.
Resilience spirit, kindness and belief. We fall, we try again, right?
People says:
“Why didn’t you came up with this solution 20 years ago”
“This is so simple and clever”
“I remember an expensive nice glass that I lost”
The most picky people are saying: “Yeh good power and strong grip”. 
“It feels so good. One less problem to worry”
“My kids love it”

Let’s make some noise getting it before everybody else, such a nice feeling of “Secure Freedom” and sharing the campaign, this is a simple not expensive very innovative gift to give.  To show and share, I need your Help. And everybody needs FIX-OO in their  Eyeglasses or Sunglasses
Don’t you want it in your hands? Only here we will do this kind of deal.
Would it be that crazy to get on board?
All angel supporters of FIX-OO Project get first dibs.  Two new patents are pending on top of it. We won’t stop, You going to be proud.  Be a part of it around the world, and talk about distribution. If you believe in people and in a better world.
FIX-OO Project has a social cause. We want to give special kids jobs, We will train them to Install  the kits on the Glasses. Please be a part of it. The social cause is described in the packages. So me and you, we will not stop here !! We will never stop.
Some day a special kid will stop you and ask: Sir or Lady, may I install a FIX-OO in your glasses? Friends, angels we will not be able to thank God enough.
You don't want miss it and  "change the world just a little bit"  
 
Thank You very much
God Bless

story:
FARADAYGIRL™ BAGS: Your Bespoke Protection on the Go. Imagine a purse that keeps you safe, charges your phone AND is deliciously chic.





Background of the invention

Today’s world is full of cyber threats, advisories and potential dangers. The stealing of information in the name of cyber crime is not only restricted to computers, but also subject to other communication element, such mobile phones, contactless cards, bank cards, credit cards, passport and the like.

Information that can be easily fetched or read by an outside reader, such as radio frequency identification (RFID) reader.

This is why the team of Hacker House Ltd is launching a bespoke Faraday line as part of our committed passion to raising awareness of ethical hacking and cyber crime.

I am a professional woman in tech. I also work in cyber security. I shouldn't be having these problems?!!

Why am I constantly being hacked?

[Welcome to my world this past year.]

Thus, FaradayGirl™: 

Our first product, FaradayGirl™, is for all professional (and all) women out there, typically carrying their lives in their purses and constantly on the go.

If you are:

  • Tired of running out of battery, and
  • Worried about protecting their data, personal and financial information

Then check out our next generation purse.

Imagine a purse that keeps you safe AND charges your phone, on the go.

Imagine a vibrating strap to alert you with calls and emails.

And... is deliciously chic. 


What is Faraday?

A Faraday cage or Faraday shield is an enclosure formed by conductive material or by a mesh of such material, used to block electric fields. Faraday cages are named after the English scientist Michael Faraday, who invented them in 1836. More information on the science can be found here: Faraday Cage (Wikipedia)

The metallic lining of inserted within the bag blocks radio frequency (RF) signals between the communication element and the outside reader, such as an RFID reader, a global positioning system (GPS) tracking, an electromotive force (EMF) reader and the like. 'Unwanted communication'.


What are the benefits to me?

  • Safety - Interior electromagnetic lining (red) keep your possessions RFID safe
  • Connectivity - Integrated charging device for all phone types i.e. iOS, Android (*current prototype sports a removable rechargeable phone charger)
  • Innovation - A vibrating strap to alert you when phone rings, texts or notifications received, etc. (in production)


First prototype built (UK IPO/patent pending)


Finished prototype, Early Nov. 2015


n production, Oct 2015

Produced in partnership with SmallFry, award-winning industrial design consultancy 


But what about the boys?

FaradayGirl is the first of many Hacker House Faraday products. We are developing computer cases, tablet sleeves for both males and females and more. 

Our amazing team has put together a product that will be sure to WOW you.

To find out more about how you can get in on this early new piece of innovation please pledge for our campaign--- meet the team and find out about how you get your very own Faraday Girl purse. Contact us with questions, comments or feedback - we'd love to hear from you.



To find out more about how you can get in on this early new piece of innovation please pledge for our campaign--- meet the team and find out about how you get your very own Faraday Girl purse. Contact: luciana@myhackerhouse.com


Be part of the solution. Protect your assets on and offline.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Allow me to tell ya what i'm scheming.....

My name is Avery. I'm crafty and I like doing things with my hands.

Lets get to it. I wanna make plugs and tunnels out of stone for people with stretched ears. 

What I Need:

  • A 14"-18" inch Rock Slab Saw. New or used.

    This machine will really help me get this off the ground. I've already had great response to the few i've made by hand. THANK YOU. You are helping me get this thing going. 

Secondary priorities if I can raise enough money:

  • Professional Rock Tumbler.
  • Wet Sanding/Grinding apparatus.
  • Other tools and bits for the drill press.


Perks and stuff!

I want to offer a few things to my friends, family and supporters. 
  • Handmade plugs from yours truly for those of you that have stretched ears. If you donate you can preorder a set of plugs in your size.

       

    All of the above are ones that I made with ghetto rigged tools but handmade none the less.

  • Signed art prints for those of you that do not have the stretched ears. 

      

  • Paintings i've done:

     

     

     

  • My handmade custom sterling silver chainmaille jewelry. 

    •     

    and finally:

    • Rock scraps! 
    • Thank you cards!



If I somehow can't make my goal the plan is the use the money and add it to my own to get the tool I need. This has to happen. I have a pile of rocks I want to turn into slabs and then into plugs!

Risks & Challenges

  • Yes, there are risks. I might be forced to move at some point and I will have to find a space to work on stone. 
  • A machine might break. 
  • I lose a finger. 
  • I somehow can't figure out how to sell what i've made. etc.
I should be able to overcome most challenges.

  • If I have to move at any point from my house with garage the plan will be to find a shared studio space to do my rather messy and loud art at.
  • If the machines break I know plenty of people that are good with stuff like that. Im also not half bad at repairing a number of things on my own... YOUTUBE people. YOUTUBE.
  • If I lose a finger well..... I have 9 more. 

  • I have experience with selling my goods. I seem to do pretty good selling goods to people I know or come in contact with. I think with Etsy, and various other places on the internet and perhaps being able to get my stuff into local shops I think i'm SET as for as my plan to get my stuff sold. The key is to make enough product to be able to draw people in and be able to have their size available when they want it as well as custom orders.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
    Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
About This Campaign

Imagine if your workout clothes were fun and beautiful pieces of wearable art, featuring hand painted designs by batik artists from Southeast Asia.
Research has shown that having fun and beautiful active wear inspires women to enjoy their workouts and train more often. We want to encourage more women to lead active and healthy lifestyles, so we set out on a mission to create beautiful and awe-inspiring active wear.

Taking influence from our Malaysian roots, we turned towards batik, a traditional and versatile textile art and created 5 beautiful, nature inspired designs to be featured on high performance leggings.

The designs were hand drawn using traditional batik tools, the tjanting and hot wax. The color is then filled in using fabric dye.

Once the artwork is complete, it is transferred onto spandex fabric via sublimation printing, so that the leggings are machine washable, the colors will never fade and the leggings will continue to display the hand painted designs for over the length of it's lifetime.

We believe that beautiful, high quality items can and should be affordable and accessible to everyone. The average retail price of high performance, printed leggings start from USD75.00 We are offering these leggings to you at much more affordable prices, as we want everyone to experience and enjoy these beautiful and awe-inspiring pieces.

Batik in Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore and other countries in Southeast Asia is typically featured on formal wear, but uncommon in the active wear domain. We wanted to take this traditional art form and give it a fun and modern twist by featuring it on trendy leggings. The goal is for art form to be embraced by new audiences around the world, some whom may be unfamiliar with it otherwise.

Part of the funds raised through this campaign will go to the artists to benefit and preserve their craft. The balance will go to costs of production of these leggings, which include costs of materials and costs of workmanship.


**Want to support SENI?**

To place your order. It's a an easy two-step process!

1) Make your pledge by selecting your perk level and purchase by providing your payment information on Indiegogo.

2) Sit tight, It takes up to 24 hours for your payment to be processed. Once your payment is processed you will receive a follow up email. At this stage you'll have the opportunity to select your size and design.

*If you do not receive this link after 48 hours please email us at hello@fitrebel.com*


Introducing Our Leggings & The Ladies They Were Named After


The Zai Leggings

Our Phoenix themed leggings are named after Zai. Zai is a beauty junky and a bendy yogi who loves beach holidays. She is featured in our shoot doing modern dance poses, which she totally nailed.

A Phoenix is a bird of Greek mythology which symbolizes rebirth. It embodies the spirit of the brand, which is to keep evolving, growing and trying new things.

The Alya Leggings

Alya is a self proclaimed cat whisperer who also loves to dance. She is an avid practitioner of pole dancing, aerial hoops and aerial silks. She is featured in our shoot as our lovely and captivating aerial hoop angel.

We named our Japanese koi leggings after Alya. In Japanese, 'koi' (simply meaning 'carp') is derived from a word that means 'affection' or 'love'; koi are therefore symbols of love and friendship in Japan.


The Feiticeira Leggings (Right, in green)

Christine, also known as Feiticeira (meaning 'Sorceress' in Brazilian Portuguese) is a capoeira instructor who runs strict training sessions, especially with her kids class, but doing so with the best of intentions and love. She is the epitome of a strong, independent woman protecting and supporting friends and loved ones.
Our hummingbird themed leggings are named after Christine, nimble and fast creatures that are able to get through life’s obstacles with grace and style.

The Bonnie Leggings (Left, in white)

Don't mess with Bonnie! This petite lady may look unassumingly harmless but she has years of capoeira and most recently, Brazillian jujitsu training under her belt. Bonnie is also a talented singer who participated in her first open mike session recently.

Our peacock themed leggings are named after Bonnie. Why do we think this is perfect? She embodies the spirit so well, as she, just like a peacock, is confident and beautiful, inside and outside.

The Selina Leggings (Base - bottom yogi)

Selina is a Malaysian yoga instructor, based in Singapore and part of the YogaMovement team. She has a serious addiction towards arm balances, inversion, and all things crazy which makes her energetic classes super fun to attend. Follow her beautiful & witty yoga journey on instagram @senoritayogini. 

Our dragonfly themed leggings are named after Selina. Dragonflies are powerful and agile fliers, capable of migrating across oceans, moving in any direction, and changing direction suddenly. For Fit Rebel, this represents the modern women, who are strong, adventurous and flexible. 

Product Features


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise a minimum of USD15,000 to meet our first minimum order quantity. By pledging, here is what you will help us achieve:

  • The creation of the world's VERY FIRST high-performance leggings, featuring hand painted, batik inspired designs by traditional artists based in South East Asia. These leggings are intended to be gorgeous pieces to encourage you to lead more active and healthier lifestyles.
  • Your pledges will go to the costs necessary for the manufacturing process, which include materials and workmanship. Because of your generosity, we are will be able to offer these leggings at a much lower retail price, so your investment will benefit you directly.
  • Part of the funds raised through this campaign will go to the artists, benefiting and preserving their craft.


The Impact

The difference your contribution will make:

  • There will be a lot more happy and healthier women as they can't wait to wear these leggings, get out of the house and do something active.
  • This project will breathe new life into the traditional batik artwork, which is typically featured on formal wear. By featuring batik on trendy leggings, we aspire for this art form to be embraced by new audiences around the world, some whom may be unfamiliar with it otherwise.
  • Supporting and encouraging local artistic communities!


Perks

Get the art!


Or get the leggings from as low at USD39.00 per pair! View 'Select A Perk' section for more details.


Sizes:


Timelines & Delivery:

Estimated delivery of the greeting card, handkerchief & Japanese Koi painting is expected to be July 2016. Painting of the art works will take 1 month.

Estimated delivery for the leggings is September 2016. Manufacturing will take approximately 2-3 months and we are also giving ourselves allowance for any unforeseeable delays. In the event if there are no delays and we complete manufacturing within 2 months, the leggings will be ready for delivery by August 2016.


Risks & Challenges

Risks for this campaign is low. If for some reason we do not meet our target funding goal, we will still fulfill all perks to our pledgers. We are committed to the goal of creating beautiful active wear to encourage women to lead more active and healthier lives. 


How You Can Help

  • Please pledge
  • Please share!

Thank you for your support!
