in the active wear domain. We wanted to take this traditional art form and give it a fun and modern twist by featuring it on trendy leggings. The goal is for art form to
be embraced by new audiences around the world, some whom may be unfamiliar with it otherwise.
Part of the funds raised through this campaign will go to the artists to benefit and preserve their craft. The balance will go to costs of production of these leggings, which include costs of materials and costs of workmanship. 
**Want to support SENI?**
To place your order. It's a an easy two-step process!
1) Make your pledge by selecting your perk level and purchase by providing your payment information on Indiegogo.
2)
 Sit tight, It takes up to 24 hours for your payment to be processed. 
Once your payment is processed you will receive a follow up email. At this stage 
you'll have the opportunity to select your size and design.

*If you do not receive this link after 48 hours please email us at hello@fitrebel.com*

Introducing Our Leggings & The Ladies They Were Named After

The Zai Leggings



Our Phoenix themed leggings are named after Zai. Zai is a beauty junky and a bendy yogi who loves beach holidays. She is featured in our shoot doing modern dance poses, which she totally nailed. A Phoenix is a bird of Greek mythology which symbolizes rebirth. It embodies the spirit of the brand, which is to keep evolving, growing and trying new things.

The Alya Leggings



Alya is a self proclaimed cat whisperer who also loves to dance. She is an 
avid practitioner of pole dancing, aerial hoops and aerial silks. She is 
featured in our shoot as our lovely and captivating aerial hoop angel.



We named our Japanese koi leggings after Alya. In Japanese, 'koi' (simply meaning 'carp') is derived from a word that
means 'affection' or 'love'; koi are therefore symbols of
love and friendship in Japan.
The Feiticeira Leggings (Right, in green)
Christine, also known as Feiticeira (meaning 'Sorceress' in Brazilian 
Portuguese) is a capoeira instructor who runs strict training sessions, 
especially with her kids class, but doing so with the best of intentions
 and love. She is the epitome of a strong, independent woman protecting 
and supporting friends and loved ones.

Our hummingbird themed 
leggings are named after Christine, nimble and fast creatures that are 
able to get through life’s obstacles
with grace and style.

The Bonnie Leggings (Left, in white)

Don't mess with Bonnie! This petite lady may look unassumingly harmless but she has years of capoeira and most recently, Brazillian jujitsu training
 under her belt. Bonnie is also a talented singer
 who participated in her first open mike session recently.




Our peacock themed leggings are named after Bonnie. Why do we think this
 is perfect? She embodies the spirit so well, as she, just like a 
peacock, is confident and beautiful, inside and outside.

The Selina Leggings (Base - bottom yogi)


Selina is a Malaysian yoga instructor, based in Singapore and part of 
the YogaMovement team. She has a serious addiction towards arm balances,
 inversion, and all things crazy which makes her energetic classes super
 fun to attend. Follow her beautiful & witty yoga journey on 
instagram @senoritayogini. 


Our dragonfly themed leggings are named after Selina. Dragonflies are powerful and agile fliers, capable of migrating
across oceans, moving in any direction, and changing direction suddenly.
 For Fit Rebel, this represents the modern women, who are strong, 
adventurous and
flexible. 


Product Features


 
  
What We Need & What You Get We need to raise a minimum of USD15,000 to meet our first minimum order quantity. By pledging, here is what you will help us achieve:  The creation of the world's VERY FIRST high-performance leggings, featuring hand painted, batik inspired designs by traditional artists based in South East Asia. These leggings are intended to be gorgeous pieces to encourage you to lead more active and healthier lifestyles. 
 Your pledges will go to the costs necessary for the manufacturing process, which include materials and workmanship. Because of your generosity, we are will be able to offer these leggings at a much lower retail price, so your investment will benefit you directly. 
 Part of the funds raised through this campaign will go to the artists, benefiting and preserving their craft. 




The Impact The difference your contribution will make: 
There
 will be a lot more happy and healthier women as they can't wait to wear
 these leggings, get out of the house and do something active. 
This project will breathe new life into the traditional batik 
artwork, which is typically featured on formal wear. By featuring batik 
on trendy leggings, we aspire for this art form to be embraced by new 
audiences around the world, some whom may be
unfamiliar with it otherwise. 
Supporting and encouraging local artistic communities!









Perks

    
Get the art!




Or get the leggings from as low at USD39.00 per pair! View 'Select A Perk' section for more details.



Sizes:




Timelines & Delivery: 
Estimated delivery of the greeting card, handkerchief & 
Japanese Koi painting is expected to be July 2016. Painting of the art 
works will take 1 month. 

Estimated delivery for the leggings is September 2016. Manufacturing 
will take approximately 2-3 months and we are also giving ourselves 
allowance for any unforeseeable delays. In the event if there are no 
delays and we complete manufacturing within 2 months, the leggings will 
be ready for delivery by August 2016. 

  Risks & Challenges  Risks for this campaign is low. If for some reason we do not meet our target funding goal, we will still fulfill all perks to our pledgers. We are committed to the goal of creating beautiful active wear to encourage women to lead more active and healthier lives.  
  
How You Can Help  Please pledge
 Please share!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Hello!

My name is Josh, I'm 22 and from the South of England! Ive spent the last few years travelling and working my way around the world, looking for problems to solve through product design. I am here today to introduce you to a project I'm really excited about - I call it, ClipZip.


ClipZip is the first 3d printed replacement zipper. The system I have designed will currently fit on any size 5 zip, regardless of length, age or type - without the use of tools, scissors or a sewing kit! 

NOW WITH FREE POSTAGE ON ALL ORDERS!
For anyone struggling to process their perk - you can also head to my ETSY page! - https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/TheJSDesignStore

This means that whether you've broken the zipper on your trusty old backpack, the fly on your favourite jeans or simply want to make your jacket stand out from the crowd - ClipZip has you covered anytime, anyplace, in seconds. 


So how does it work? 


Ive been tweaking and revising the design more times than I can recall to get it as tough as possible for such a small size. The zipper comes in two sections - a BASE and a TOP. 

The TOP is the colourful part - it keeps the zip in check, sandwiches everything together and looks nice from the outside. The BASE is the part that does all the work. Printed in an ultra-strong nylon-based clear filament, it provides the channel for the zip to join together, the anchor point for the TOP to pass through and the eyelet for the toggle to be attached.




ClipZip comes in a gazillion colours! 


Mix, match and personalise your boring old raincoat, breathe new life into a vintage leather jacket, jazz up your backpack or go for something a little more subtle on the fly of your jeans...

For each order, you'll get a random mix of colours, shades and transparencies - what you use them on is down to you! Send me your creative snaps and I promise I'll feature them on the Facebook, Twitter and Instagram pages for all to see!


The Plan


3D Printing has come on leaps and bounds in recent years, with desktop machines ever growing in popularity - but the vast majority of people have never seen, owned or used 3D printed parts. I hope that this is about to change!

Phase1 of ClipZip is the 3D printed zips. A low cost, small volume, research exercise to discover any limitations, perfect the design and get feedback from the people that matter most - you glorious backers! While the printed ClipZip is robust and strong for a 3D printed part, it needs to be considered more of an 'emergency zip' in comparison to the final version.

From here, the plan is a 2nd, bigger round of funding for the full strength, injection moulded, mass produced final units. Get in at the ground level, and your feedback will go straight into developing the ultimate tool-less replacement zipper for all to use!



Easy to install, easy to remove. Want to try ClipZip on something else, or give to a friend to try? Just remove the toggle clip, push down on the top of the peg and feel the TOP pop off. Simples! 




A great use for ClipZip is to resurrect those forgotten and damaged items from the past. Old meets new for a truly unique look... 



Risks & Challenges:


Fortunately, I am in the position where I already own the perfect 3D printer for the job, along with a healthy supply of filament in a huge range of colours. I plan to continue buying bulk sample filaments in as many colours as I can find - as I'm sure you can imagine, 10m goes a long way when printing these small parts! In terms of production, I'm not remotely concerned!


This is my 2nd crowdfunded project (the other being on that popular platform with the green logo!). My first campaign ended successfully and I learned a huge amount. This is very different however, this time I have complete control over the manufacture, as well as everything else - no 3rd parties to communicate with, or be on the receiving end of their delays. In short, I cannot wait to get started producing your orders!!


Q&A:


1) How do I remove the old/snapped/damaged/boring zipper from my jacket before putting a super awesome ClipZip on there?

Welllll - The best way I've found could not be easier. Simply slide the old zipper to the top (on a jacket, this is the collar end) and pull really hard! It'll pop right off into your hand, job done!

2) How strong is ClipZip compared to a regular zipper?

ClipZip is 3D Printed. For those unaware, this means that it's made up of lots and lots of layers. While the parts have been designed and printed in super robust, strong filaments so it will survive the everyday, they do not have the long-term resilience of injection moulded parts. This is mainly the reason why we don't have 3D printed products readily available on the high-street. Printed parts are primarily for prototyping, development and testing for fit and function - not years of abuse. With this in mind, I want you to test ClipZip on as many things as you can, let me know areas it struggles and places it excels. All of this will feedback into perfecting the design of the full-strength, mass produced final product!

3) Will ClipZip be available in any other sizes?

For the 3D printed ClipZip, I can't realistically go any smaller - this rules out the size 3 found on many dresses, fleeces, cushions and wallets. However, I am able to make size 8 and size 12 an option. Size 12 are the chunkiest zips - the kind found on duffel bags and wetsuits, whereas size 8 are found on some suitcases and heavier duty jackets. Sz3, 5, 8 and 12 represent the four most common size of zipper, and will be the aim for the mass produced final versions. For now though, I am happy to make different sizes available if there is a popular demand to do so. 

4) I don't know if size 5 is right for me, or if I need something bigger/smaller. How do I figure out which one I need?

If the zipper you want to replace is still on your jacket/bag, then take a look at the back of it - the size should be displayed here. If your zipper doesn't have this, or it has come off completely, you just need to measure the width of the zip - generally speaking, if it's 5mm across, you need a size 5 zipper. If you're struggling, send me a message and I'll be more than happy to help you out!

-----

HAVE A QUESTION? 


Send me a message, or post a comment and I'll get back to you ASAP!

story:
Michael Lo Sordo is a fashion designer based in Sydney with a successful label by the name of Michael Lo Sordo. Caught in the fast lane of Sydney's fashion world, Lo Sordo has built a small empire in this world – one that has landed him several international magazine covers – with his iconic silk trench coat for women.

PPS helps link up Australian Fashion Designers and Brands with overseas manufacturers. We charge the Australian brands for this service and then let the manufacturer and the brand deal directly with each other in terms of production and financial arrangement.

One of the manufacturers we have connected with Michael Lo Sordo is Ms Lina Miao. She recently left her job as a sample maker to start up her own business, a small clothing factory based in Humen Town, Donggguan City in the Guangdong Province of China. Together, with her husband as a cutter, she employs between 5 – 10 local sewers depending on how busy they are at any given time.

As of January 2015, Lo Sordo still owes Miss Miao ¥72958.17 ($AUD 14749.14) for producing luxury silk trench coats. 

(According to CNN’s online global wage calculator, which uses data from the International Labor Organization, the average annual salary of a worker in China’s private sector was 28,752 yuan (about $4,755) in 2012, or 38% of the global average)

Michael has refused to pay the balance of the cost of the trench coats. 

Normal fashion production protocol is that the fashion company pays the manufacturer a % of the production cost to buy all of the fabric and materials and start production. Then once the production is finished the balance is paid and the production is released for shipping to Australia. In the past Michael has repeatedly tried to break these rules, pressuring Ms Miao to release the production before making the final payment. This is effectively asking Ms Miao to cashflow his business. 

This time Ms Miao has refused to ship the stock until payment is made. Payment was due before Christmas. Michael did not pay and then as the goods were not released, the orders were cancelled. Now he is refusing to make the payment even though the goods have been completed and are sitting in a factory waiting for payment.

You can help save Miss Miao from financial ruin, and receive the stunning silk satin trench coat currently selling on Net A Porter for over USD$850 http://www.net-a-porter.com/product/503283/Michael_Lo_Sordo/washed-silk-satin-trench-coat

By Donating:

1. Every Dollar counts no matter how big or small. All donators will have their names put up on the PPS website as a THANK YOU!

2. For AUD$300 you will receive 1 x silk trench coat which includes shipping. Available in 5 different colours - Black, White, Blue, Pink & Yellow.

This will also send a message to people who think they can take advantage of people on the other side of the world and think there will be no repercussions in their world.  

Lo Sordo has repeatedly told Miss Miao that he does not have the money to pay her, despite earning a high income while still living with his parents in their Leichhardt home.  

In March 2014, Lo Sordo was awarded the BT Emerging Designer Award, worth AUD$40 000 to “assist the designer’s growth”.

In August 2014, Lo Sordo was also awarded the DHL Express Fashion Export Scholarship, worth AUD$ 10 000 to “supercharge his export strategy”.                            

Lo Sordo was flown to New York for Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week where he met with prestigious international buyers including Net-A-Porter, Harvey Nichols, Avenue 32, Moda Operandi, Surrenderous Singapore, Al Othman Kuwait and Intermix.

On Wednesday the 4th of February, Lo Sordo will be headlining the David Jones Parade while Lina Miao faces potential bankruptcy – her financial hardship means her son has been withdrawn from school.

In order of priority funding goes to :

Repay Ms Lina Miao for loss of income for the production

The sorting, packing and shipping of the trench coats from china to your door as a reward for supporting

4% Indiegogo Fees

Recovering the $3000 in fees incurred by PPS (if we reach the target)

#SAVEMISSMIAO

story:
My name is Joseph and if you're like me, you buy and collect older Air Jordan sneakers but the problem is a lot of times is that they need to be sole swapped but before that you need new midsoles. And the only way to get new midsoles is to hunt down another pair of shoes to use and that is time consuming and tedious. And when sending your pairs of shoes to a restoration company they always ask you to provide the midsoles which can get annoying. So I have come up with an idea to create a site that will offer a one stop shop where you can go to buy midsoles that are sole swapped ready. I will not be doing the swaps myself, only providing the new midsoles for it. I will have a selection of different Air Jordan model midsoles to choose from. I will start with the Air Jordan 3 and Air Jordan 4 midsoles. I will then continue to add more models such as the Air Jordan 5,6,7, and 8s being the most common to need midsole swaps. And I have confidence that by pouring all my energy into this I can supply the sneaker community with a service that no one has yet to provide but is very needed.

The Business: 

I will be providing you with a one stop shop for midsoles to be used for sole swaps. I will not be doing the swaps, only selling the midsoles which will make your life easier because there will no longer be a need to tract them down. I will be providing 2 kinds of midsoles. One set will be sole swap ready meaning they will be stripped of the original paint and separated from the shoe for your convince. The second set available will be same with one major difference. They will be pre-painted for you so that once you receive them you will be able to just glue them together yourself or send them to your favorite restoration company for them to do it for you. Also just want to add that the midsoles will not be shipping with the rest of the shoe they are from as a standard. That means no uppers or outsoles.

Midsoles Being Used:

I will using Air Jordan Spizike and Air Jordan 3s for the Air Jordan 3 midsole replacements as they are the best option for sole swaps. And for the Air Jordan 4 midsoles I will be using Air Jordan 4s and Air Jordan Dub-Zeros. And I will not use any soles older than 2008 to avoid the need for another swap within the next 6 years. I can not guarentee the correct air unit color but will be offering a variety of clear and colored air units on the site if available. 

Pricing:

The first set of midsoles(swap ready but non-painted) will be priced at about $65 shipped.

The second set of midsoles(swap ready and pre-painted) will be priced at about $85 shipped. You will be able to select which colorway you want to buy and the colors will be accurate to that of the original paint. 

All Air Jordan model midsole are priced the same, only difference is if you want the soles painted or not.

The pricing might sound a little high to some but you have to take into account the amount of time you will be saving with this service in looking for your own midsoles. Also, the average price for midsoles is anywhere from $40-$60 if you're lucky enough to find one for that price because most people don't sell their shoes as just donors. And then you have to through the hassle of separating them from the shoes and repainting them. Why do that when I can do it for you?

Where can I buy them?:

I will be creating a site where you will be able to go and purchase the midsoles. You will be able to choose sizing, Jordan model, and color way(if you pick the pre-painted midsoles)

The site will have multiple sizes to choose from starting from size 8-11 in mens. (More sizes will be added in the future)

Guarantee:

I will be using Angelus paints which are the most known and most commonly used paints used in repainting Air Jordan midsoles. They will be painted professionally. I am guaranteeing 100% color accuracy. Midsoles will not ship unless I am confident they are the right color. 100% refund if they do not match or will provide a replacement. 

I cannot guarantee the midsoles to fit 100% all the time because of the way Air Jordans are made and the molds varied slightly over the years. However, the site will have a sizing guide to help choose the best midsole to use for your needs.

Obstacles: 

The are a few obstacles in the way of my goal. 

-Finding enough shoes to use as midsoles to meet the demand and the numbers I'm promising. 

-Getting all the correct colors for the pre-painted midsoles.

-Keeping up with orders once it takes off.

How I Will Get Over These Obstacles:

-I will be using the experience I have gained through sneaker collecting to find midsoles to meet the demand of the community. 

-I will be using professional level paint and equipment to mix the exact color needed for the colorway of your choice.

-I will be enlisting the help of friends who share the same view of being successful and they will be helping be fill the orders.

Why Use Crowd Funding?:

Being a college student I can't afford to invest all the money I need to start up this business. I could start by doing one pair of midsoles at a time but my goals are big and it's go big or go home so I am hoping to raise the money so I can grow this business. I am confident in my ability to make this successful and supply a demand that isn't being met.

Where's Your Money Going?:

I will be using the start up money to invest in picking up to 50 pairs of shoes that I will use the midsoles from. I will buying midsoles for Air Jordan 3s and 4s, varying in sizes. I will be using the rest of the money to invest in the paint supplies needed to repaint your new midsoles. Such as new Angelus Paints, a new spray gun and other supplies necessary. 

Show Support:

Please share this on any social media site you wish and any sneaker sites because it will really help a lot. 

You can also follow me on Instagram @josephsole where I will be posting updates of the progress. 

Thank you for your time and support.
story_txt: My name is Joseph and if you're like me, you buy and collect older Air Jordan sneakers but the problem is a lot of times is that they need to be sole swapped but before that you need new midsoles. And the only way to get new midsoles is to hunt down another pair of shoes to use and that is time consuming and tedious. And when sending your pairs of shoes to a restoration company they always ask you to provide the midsoles which can get annoying. So I have come up with an idea to create a site that will offer a one stop shop where you can go to buy midsoles that are sole swapped ready. I will not be doing the swaps myself, only providing the new midsoles for it. I will have a selection of different Air Jordan model midsoles to choose from. I will start with the Air Jordan 3 and Air Jordan 4 midsoles. I will then continue to add more models such as the Air Jordan 5,6,7, and 8s being the most common to need midsole swaps. And I have confidence that by pouring all my energy into this I can supply the sneaker community with a service that no one has yet to provide but is very needed.The Business: I will be providing you with a one stop shop for midsoles to be used for sole swaps. I will not be doing the swaps, only selling the midsoles which will make your life easier because there will no longer be a need to tract them down. I will be providing 2 kinds of midsoles. One set will be sole swap ready meaning they will be stripped of the original paint and separated from the shoe for your convince. The second set available will be same with one major difference. They will be pre-painted for you so that once you receive them you will be able to just glue them together yourself or send them to your favorite restoration company for them to do it for you. Also just want to add that the midsoles will not be shipping with the rest of the shoe they are from as a standard. That means no uppers or outsoles.Midsoles Being Used:I will using Air Jordan Spizike and Air Jordan 3s for the Air Jordan 3 midsole replacements as they are the best option for sole swaps. And for the Air Jordan 4 midsoles I will be using Air Jordan 4s and Air Jordan Dub-Zeros. And I will not use any soles older than 2008 to avoid the need for another swap within the next 6 years. I can not guarentee the correct air unit color but will be offering a variety of clear and colored air units on the site if available. Pricing:The first set of midsoles(swap ready but non-painted) will be priced at about $65 shipped.The second set of midsoles(swap ready and pre-painted) will be priced at about $85 shipped. You will be able to select which colorway you want to buy and the colors will be accurate to that of the original paint. All Air Jordan model midsole are priced the same, only difference is if you want the soles painted or not.The pricing might sound a little high to some but you have to take into account the amount of time you will be saving with this service in looking for your own midsoles. Also, the average price for midsoles is anywhere from $40-$60 if you're lucky enough to find one for that price because most people don't sell their shoes as just donors. And then you have to through the hassle of separating them from the shoes and repainting them. Why do that when I can do it for you?Where can I buy them?:I will be creating a site where you will be able to go and purchase the midsoles. You will be able to choose sizing, Jordan model, and color way(if you pick the pre-painted midsoles)The site will have multiple sizes to choose from starting from size 8-11 in mens. (More sizes will be added in the future)Guarantee:I will be using Angelus paints which are the most known and most commonly used paints used in repainting Air Jordan midsoles. They will be painted professionally. I am guaranteeing 100% color accuracy. Midsoles will not ship unless I am confident they are the right color. 100% refund if they do not match or will provide a replacement. I cannot guarantee the midsoles to fit 100% all the time because of the way Air Jordans are made and the molds varied slightly over the years. However, the site will have a sizing guide to help choose the best midsole to use for your needs.Obstacles: The are a few obstacles in the way of my goal. -Finding enough shoes to use as midsoles to meet the demand and the numbers I'm promising. -Getting all the correct colors for the pre-painted midsoles.-Keeping up with orders once it takes off.How I Will Get Over These Obstacles:-I will be using the experience I have gained through sneaker collecting to find midsoles to meet the demand of the community. -I will be using professional level paint and equipment to mix the exact color needed for the colorway of your choice.-I will be enlisting the help of friends who share the same view of being successful and they will be helping be fill the orders.Why Use Crowd Funding?:Being a college student I can't afford to invest all the money I need to start up this business. I could start by doing one pair of midsoles at a time but my goals are big and it's go big or go home so I am hoping to raise the money so I can grow this business. I am confident in my ability to make this successful and supply a demand that isn't being met.Where's Your Money Going?:I will be using the start up money to invest in picking up to 50 pairs of shoes that I will use the midsoles from. I will buying midsoles for Air Jordan 3s and 4s, varying in sizes. I will be using the rest of the money to invest in the paint supplies needed to repaint your new midsoles. Such as new Angelus Paints, a new spray gun and other supplies necessary. Show Support:Please share this on any social media site you wish and any sneaker sites because it will really help a lot. You can also follow me on Instagram @josephsole where I will be posting updates of the progress. Thank you for your time and support.

story:
Support using our planet’s resources wisely by drinking gin with us

We are a joint venture between AusBioDiesel/SPP and the Scottish Association of Marine Science based in Barcaldine, West of Scotland.

Together we’ve been working on a biofuel plant to convert kelp to bioethanol fuel.


We’re currently building a tank that will serve two purposes, finally it will become part of the biofuel plant in Scotland. But its first job will be to distil a fantastic gin infused with a salty, fresh, sea essence made from kelp. The gin will be called Kelpman Gin.

This Indiegogo campaign is to complete the biofuel tank build. Once the tank is complete it will go to Scotland and begin the limited edition Kelpman Gin distillation - it will then become part of the biofuel plant. We'll continue to distil Kelpman Gin though, and the ongoing cash flow from sales will help with continued funding of equipment for the biofuel plant.

You can support us by trying our limited edition first distil of Kelpman Gin, joining our Gin Club and buying our Kelpman merchandise - like this T-Shirt featuring Kelpman himself.

Where we are at and what we plan to do.

We need $20,000 and three months to complete a 600L distillation unit. The unit will then be transported to Scotland.

The first special edition batch of 60 Kelpman Gin bottles will take another month to perfect and will then be shipped to our Indiegogo campaign supporters.

Next the distiller will begin its life as part of the biofuel tank.

Our team

Jaimy Tucker – Kelpman Gin flavour master

Our friend Jaimey Tucker is our gin maker, he will be in charge of blending the unique Kelpman Gin.

“Hi I’m Jaimey Tucker and I live on a boat. I’ve always been interested in the health of the seas and want to bring a unique coastal flavour to Kelpman Gin that reflects my love of the Western Isles of Scotland. I will use my high end marine researcher skills to unlock unique flavours so I can share the experience of my World”.

William Horton – CEO of AusBiodiesel and Group Chairman

Six out of the last eleven years the world has consumed more food than it has produced. I am passionate about making sustainable fuel, food and living happen.

I’ve worked in senior management roles, research and development in multinational companies, start-ups and gained valuable biotech experience in some of the major players on the market. After all of this I felt the need to join forces with some of my colleagues and break away to explore important questions like how can we stop the massive waste of our precious resources. From here AusBiodiesel (AB) was founded.

The future

As AusBiodiesel’s technology and capabilities become greater, new projects and technologies will be applied.

We aim to utilise the process across a wide range of raw materials including, weeds, grass, algae, kelp and waste from households, restaurants, supermarkets, gardens, agricultural and food production.

Some future projects are:

•to turn waste and green stuff that's not food, into fuels and materials we use everyday such as building material

•to grow super food algae to a large scale

•to turn carbon dioxide (CO2) into carbon and oxygen

•to produce power packs for electric and hybrid vehicles, and the grid.

The biofuel process

[img src="https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/...">

Whether it's a drink for you or a gift for someone else, reserve your bottle now.


Other information

http://www.marineresourcecentre.co.uk

http://www.ausbiodiesel.com.au/

Kelpman Song Samples in Gallery.

story:
Epic Fanny is a small jewellery making business, which is more popular than I ever imagined it would be. I am launching a new range of Eco-conscious, vegan, handmade, bespoke jewellery, accessories (including bags and shoes), and a male/unisex jewellery range.

Each pound invested in Epic Fanny's Red Furore project will be spent on vital tools and materials, and vegan friendly glue and dyes.
story_txt: Epic Fanny is a small jewellery making business, which is more popular than I ever imagined it would be. I am launching a new range of Eco-conscious, vegan, handmade, bespoke jewellery, accessories (including bags and shoes), and a male/unisex jewellery range. Each pound invested in Epic Fanny's Red Furore project will be spent on vital tools and materials, and vegan friendly glue and dyes.

story:
Welcome to YouPrint 3D, we are looking to become the number one in highest quality and lowest price for the custom 3D printing scene. We want to have the highest quality materials, and customer service to become the best 3d print manufacturers. We are pledging the highest price for one product will be 50 bucks, no matter how large the print, and in any color. We want to make it so when you are in need for a 3D model, we have you covered. So all you will need is about ten bucks to get a amazing 3D print for decoration, class assignments, and much more.

With the 25 thousand we are going to get top of the line 3D printers, filaments, computers to design and print the 3D prints, and rent for the YouPrint 3D store, which the first store will be located in Bonita California, and you can order customs online too WITH FREE SHIPPING. If we are successful we will expand to different cities.

Here are the exact expenses:

$12,997.00, 3D Printers and enough filament for a long time.

$1000.00, Computers.

$5000.00, store rent for 3 months.

Since we are using flexible funding, if we raise 6000+ we will still be able to basic print items and do customs, but it will give us a slower start.

What makes us different from the rest? We  have the cheapest rates, we noticed sites like Shapeways start at 90+ dollars, we want to start at 10 for a 2x2 print. 

Help us today make this dream come true!

story:
INTRODUCING: Lightning Armor


Hello to your charging cable. How is it doing?

Because of the extensive usage of the charging cable after 5 to 9 months since purchase you notice that it starts to tear open at the base of the connector and unless you take some protection measures, you will simply have to throw it away and get a new one.

A new cable means more money, that you will have to spend and time, that you will need to find in your busy schedule, in order to purchase one.

Of course there are some cheap cables available, however, they don't last long, so after one month you'll be back to where we were. It can really give you a headache and stress you out.

What is more, every new purchase does not have a good impact on the environment and definitely does not support the GREEN ENERGY campaign.


THAT IS WHY,

before it brakes and becomes unusable, dress your charging cable up in beautiful,   protective and eye catching clothes.

( 5 color option: gray, blue, green, yellow, red)

 

2. What does your cable stand for?

- As you use your charging cable intensively day by day, in different environments, it becomes more and more worn out at the base of the connector and brakes eventually.

- When purchasing a new cable you, again, spend some money and waste your precious time

- many Chinese charging cables with no certificates serve for less than 2 months. They don't do their job properly, don't charge well and simply break.

- think about Mother Earth and the environment


               Charging 3 times during one day   Wasting time to get a new cable

                                          Stress                                          Saving Earth

 

3. Problem statement of the Lightning Armor

The area exposed to frequent usage.

Charging cables are exposed to constant pulling, that is why as the time passes by they deform and brake eventually.

4. How most of the consumers approach the problem of a broken cable?

Various methods of dealing with this problem such as taping, banding and others are only temporary.

Taping - can help temporarily but definitely not forever. It won't last long, there will be some glue stains which don't look nice.

Spring - this method is not very easy for common users as it may require some instruments to assemble. Even though we may succeed and manage to assemble it durability is not that good and protection not perfect.

Hard type protection device - your cable is protected at the base of the connector, but it's only temporary and the breakage will appear soon. It's not a permanent solution.

 

5. TWO-STEP SOLUTION OF THE LIGHTNING ARMOR

Our lightning armor offers 2-step protection solution and is very convenient to use. What's more, the grip and usability are heightened by the ergonomic design.

 

The strong point of this product is the flexible silicone isolation that extends durability of the cable and gives the best protection from breakage. 

Consisting of the two parts engineered structure of the PC housing strengthens this protection even more.



ASSEMBLING IS EASY AND TAKES NO TIME






PRICE OPTIONS AND SHIPPING



We offer several options depending on your needs. You can protect your own charging cable, but you can also give it to your family members or friends. One lightning armor may be small, but definitely protects what's important to us.


About TELEWIDE & Team



TELEWIDE is a DESIGN-DRIVEN COMPANY.

We are a professional design group which continuously researches on user-centered design of products, services and environments. Also, we maintain keen connection with our customers, creating designs while providing a chance to become more competitive in the market. We provide various products in depth from customer-oriented market research, design, to engineering.

Designers who have various experience as their foundation are participating in design sectors such as human element research, industrial design  and interaction design. Furthermore, we are working on various areas such as communication, medical devices, industrial equipment, toys, transportation, food and beverage, sports equipment and a lot more. 

Last year we have successfully launched our Any Shock Air smartphones protective, shock absorbing cases line and received good feedback from customers. 


Just recently we have introduced our new brand

Design Philosophy

Anyone can come up with a beautiful design that will please other people's eyes. We want to create something more than just designs soon to be forgotten, designs that will most likely vaporize after some short time. We'd like to be responsible for creating products that not only please one's eyes, but also bring back good memories, stay deep in one's heart and despite the passing time bring smile to one's face.

Mission statement

  - creating daily necessity products for customers

  - creating innovative World's first and high quality World's best products

  - only original designs; following the concept of comparative advantage

Cord of conduct

 - flexibility (functionality, usability, aesthetic beauty; instead of focusing on one characteristic we should aim at creating products combining all of these features)

 - adaptation (as the technology and trends all over the world change with the speed of light we need to keep up the pace and reflect these constant changes in our products)

 - quick instinct (we need to keep eyes open and respond quickly to the newest and popular trends)


How will we use crowd Funding

The funds that we will hopefully receive from all those interested in our project will help us to improve the quality of our product, cover some of the production costs. The funds will also be an undeniable help and serve as a great encouragement in creating our new designs and bringing to life our new ideas and visions. We hope that our products will make your life easier,  give it a spice and make it colorful.

SCHEDULE

We will be able to send first orders at the beginning of June.
Hope you will have interest in our newest design!

Thank you all in advance for your support!


[ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS]

Q1. How to choose the color I want?

After ordering please send us your request on sales2@telewide.co.kr.
Let us know the colors you'd like to receive, as well as you name.

Q2. What if I want to change shipping address?

Please send us your new shipping address on sales2@telewide.co.kr.
Please use the same email you use when logging on the Indiegogo website. We will confirm and send your order to the requested address.

Q3. What cables can I use the Lightning Armor with?

Our Lightning Armor can be used with 8 pin lightning cables.


FIND US HERE:

www.telewide.co.kr

www.pinpointdesign.co.kr

story:
Short Summary

The promoter is in the fragrance industry since 1988 and since 2005 has launched global lines such as Cadillac Perfumes, Madonna MN79 perfumes, Indian Cricket Captain M S Dhonis perfume, Kim Kardashian perfumes, One Direction Perfumes and many other top celebrity and designer perfumes over the years. 

Pierre Precieuse is an in-house brand and is being launched worldwide in March 2017. Each investor will receive the first production that rolls out from the factory and before consumers get to buy them in stores. 

By you investing with us and purchasing a Collectors limited edition 5 pcs set you will help us spread the word around the world to build this brand to a level where in the brand will be bought by a large fragrance house in 36 to 60 months and from the proceeds of this sale we will share 10% of the total sale amount among all investors who purchased a Collectors Edition. This Collectors Edition if sold out will not be reproduced again which means you will be the only ones to own a box of this treasure. 

  • We need to raise US$ 1.5 million in total for this project which is already in its final phase. Tooling, molds and pre production samples are ready. Final components are produced and ready in the factory which will now move to the filling factory in France. By end February production will be complete and shipping will be by mid March 2017.

In order to help us with our funding goal we are producing just 10,000 units of our Collectors Edition 5 pc gift set which will be 5 bottles of 20ml each with a retail price of US$ 249. You pay only US$ 110 per box inclusive of worldwide shipping. There are a total of 5 unique fragrances and all of them carefully blended oils and can be worn by both men and women. More details on the collection can be viewed on www.pierreprecieuseparfum.com  

Not only do you get a Collectors edition for US$ 110 instead of US$ 249, each investor will be entitled to an equal share of 10% of the total value of the brand at the end of 36 months.

If we dont reach our goal of US$ 1.5 million, whatever amount we achieve will go towards final filling and production of the 10,000 Collectors Edition which will be shipped by end March 2017. Final production is ongoing so every dollar collected will go towards production. The first 2000 investors who back this project will also receive a Trial Pack of 3 x 5 ml Edp spray FREE which are packed in a beautiful gift box with a retail value of US$ 29.99. This free gift will ship along with the 5pc pack.

  • The Impact

Our track record can be seen by just googling Cadillac perfumes, launch of 7 by MS Dhoni perfumes, Kim Kardashian perfume launch in Dubai, Pierre Precieuse Cannes 2016, Alwyn Stephen, Beauty Contact where you can see plenty of information on our success in the industr

Risks & Challenges

There is absolutely no risk as whatever you pay you can be rest assured you will get your Collectors Edition perfume gift set even if we dont reach our target. By reaching our target the advantage is that each investor will be entitled to a share of 10% of the total sale value of the brand but otherwise you are saving US$ 138 on each box as you pay only  US$ 110 instead of US$248. Theres no limit, you can purchase as many as you want and you can even trade them later as these will not be produced again.

The promoter is in the fragrance industry since 1988 and since 2005 has launched global lines such as Cadillac Perfumes, Madonna MN79 perfumes, Indian Cricket Captain M S Dhonis perfume, Kim Kardashian perfumes, One Direction Perfumes and many other top celebrity and designer perfumes over the years. 
Pierre Precieuse is an in-house brand and is being launched worldwide in March 2017. Each investor will receive the first production that rolls out from the factory and before consumers get to buy them in stores. 
By you investing with us and purchasing a Collectors limited edition 5 pcs set you will help us spread the word around the world to build this brand to a level where in the brand will be bought by a large fragrance house in 36 to 60 months and from the proceeds of this sale we will share 10% of the total sale amount among all investors who purchased a Collectors Edition. This Collectors Edition if sold out will not be reproduced again which means you will be the only ones to own a box of this treasure. 
We need to raise US$ 1.5 million in total for this project which is already in its final phase. Tooling, molds and pre production samples are ready. Final components are produced and ready in the factory which will now move to the filling factory in France. By end February production will be complete and shipping will be by mid March 2017.

In order to help us with our funding goal we are producing just 10,000 units of our Collectors Edition 5 pc gift set which will be 5 bottles of 20ml each with a retail price of US$ 249. You pay only US$ 110 per box inclusive of worldwide shipping. There are a total of 5 unique fragrances and all of them carefully blended oils and can be worn by both men and women. More details on the collection can be viewed on www.pierreprecieuseparfum.com  
Not only do you get a Collectors edition for US$ 110 instead of US$ 249, each investor will be entitled to an equal share of 10% of the total value of the brand at the end of 36 months.
If we dont reach our goal of US$ 1.5 million, whatever amount we achieve will go towards final filling and production of the 10,000 Collectors Edition which will be shipped by end March 2017. Final production is ongoing so every dollar collected will go towards production. The first 2000 investors who back this project will also receive a Trial Pack of 3 x 5 ml Edp spray FREE which are packed in a beautiful gift box with a retail value of US$ 29.99. This free gift will ship along with the 5pc pack.
The Impact
Our track record can be seen by just googling Cadillac perfumes, launch of 7 by MS Dhoni perfumes, Kim Kardashian perfume launch in Dubai, Pierre Precieuse Cannes 2016, Alwyn Stephen, Beauty Contact where you can see plenty of information on our success in the industr
Risks & Challenges
There is absolutely no risk as whatever you pay you can be rest assured you will get your Collectors Edition perfume gift set even if we dont reach our target. By reaching our target the advantage is that each investor will be entitled to a share of 10% of the total sale value of the brand but otherwise you are saving US$ 138 on each box as you pay only  US$ 110 instead of US$248. Theres no limit, you can purchase as many as you want and you can even trade them later as these will not be produced again.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Alessandra Hajaj and I'm from Brazil. After a lot of obstacles I came to Los Angeles to follow my dream on being an artist. With help I'm putting myself back up and getting closer and closer to my dream.

  • I've always had the artistic blood. I've painted since I was a kid and with time I acquired a lot of other artistic abilities like, sculpting, drawing, sewing, woodwork, paper sculpting, ballet, jazz,  tap, singing and the most recent acting.
  • This project is important to me because it's my chance to show a few of my abilities and show my vision and style to the professional market.
  • All those who contribute will not only be helping me to achieve my biggest work yet, but also will help me to grow as an artist and most important of all, give me a fighting chance on the entertainment business.

What We Need & What You Get

Specifics about the campaign :

  • My goal for this campaign is to obtain $5.000 that will go for the studio rental, equipment rental, transportation, crew, food for the crew, and post-production. My project is very ambitious and it will be very expensive.
  • Any contribution is super important, there are no small numbers when the budget is so high.
  • If I don't reach my goal, the funds will still go to my film and I'll find another way to find the rest of the budget. That is why any amount is important. No matter how much I receive, it will still be helping me a lot with the costs of the production.

The Impact

  • Your contribution will not only go to my film, but also to a bigger cause. This film is about sexual abuse and how to escape from it. This film will go to film festivals and it might win an award. This is a very serious theme and it needs to be addressed and shared with the world to create awareness. 
  • I'm planning to send my film to 5 film festivals: LA Film Festival, LAIFFA, LABRFF, The Saint John's International Woman's Film Festival and Festival Internacional de Curtas Metragens de Sao Paulo.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can't contribute with money, please contribute by spreading the word. Tell your friends and family.
  • Please share my campaign on facebook and other social media websites. Tell your friends and family to do the same.

Thank you very much to all,

story:
Short Summary

Hello Prospective Backer,

Let me start by saying that I understand this is different from other projects on this site but hear me out. I have always wanted to own a business and upon further research, I've found that there is still space for new makeup companies as long as proper marketing is done.

A problem that plagues the beauty world is that extreme skin shades are usually ignored or have wrong undertones. My brand is all about being affordably inclusive. I do not want a single soul feeling left out so I want my products to cover a very large range of people and to also be suitable for every skin type. I also plan to provide high quality makeup and beautiful packaging without the high prices and sell them in a lot of countries including developing countries.

What We Need & What You Get

So far, I have started researching ingredients, suppliers and cosmetic labs. In the next few weeks, I plan to start working on mixing different formulas. Note that the initial launch will only contain a few products and overtime, more products will be added.

The money goes to help me pay for the trademark, product tests, manufacturing, packaging, legal consultation, marketing, and website programming. Even if I do not reach my entire goal, I plan to figure out a way to make everything happen.

If you've ever bought makeup online, you know that most shades look the same and it is very difficult to buy the correct one. I would  like to offer shade matching depending on previous foundations the customer has used (only if legal).

Risks & Challenges

  • To prevent my brand from being obscure, I plan to take my time with marketing and also get professional help.
  • I also plan to ensure a great formula by testing each one on my skin and that of others for feedback. No animals will be used for testing.
  • To prevent any bad attention from contamination, I would like to take my time choosing a cosmetic lab to manufacture my brand and ensure that each production batch is tested for stability and purity.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help financially, all you have to do is share the news with your friends and watch out for our launch.

Disclaimer: The picture above does not belong to me.

story:
143 consists of three main parts - front side, main body, and straps. All of these features are made of 100% real leather, to achieve its function and practicality. Our manufacturing process starts from procuring the finest leather in South Korea, and then it goes to the production line managed by experienced craft experts. That is why we can only produce small amounts. We do the work from start to finish. We do not use overseas outsourcing to reduce costs.

JOHNGYU LEATHER BAG 

- 3 colors of limited edition just for Indiegogo

 

1. CHARCOAL GRAY 

 

2. RED OCHRE 

 

3. DARK BEIGE

 

* NEW UPDATED- JOHNGYU SYNTHETIC LEATHER

We made the product more affordable by using synthetic leather that retains the similar quality to real leather. As you will realize in person, the synthetic leather that will use is very similar to real leather in terms of look and feel, but with more reasonable price. 

 

          3-in-1 customized for your business trips 

The straight rectangular form of 143 retains the simple, balanced shape of a bag, whether used as a formal briefcase or carried as a casual backpack.

        Specification                                   

Size: 38.5cm (W) * 10.5cm (L) * 28.5cm (H)

Weight: 2.2kg / 5.5lbs 

Materials: full grain calf leather, YKK excella zips, nickel parts, nylon  

Features

The front part consists of compartments for daily use accessories, and you can also use the partition as temporary work station. The main body which unfolds 180 degrees lets you put all your stuff easily just like a suitcase, with smart details of inner space that offers an easy storage solution.

These features that are essential for your business activities will help you achieve success in your career.

 

Leather luggage tag & gift box  

All products are enclosed with a special gift for Indiegogo contributors - leather luggage tag that matches well with the product. And they are wrapped in gift box of three colors that provides luxurious touch.  

 

No shipment price, commission & markup fee

We guarantee you the price with no-added fees - shipment fare, buyer commission, or markup fee (which takes up to 60% of the cost, or even 1500% for luxury brands). We are proud of our process line and quality of the product, and many worldwide buyers have recognized it. You can get all of these benefits of exclusive price and personal express service just by choosing our perk. 

 

  

Shipping schedule & Custom tax info 

Our fright service partner DHL has the delivery time depending on the territory: 

USA shipments : 3~5 days  

Other countries: 5~7 days 

* We guarantee 100% free shipping service, but there's  possibilites of indispensable policies - Some contributors would be subject to their local customs, which is a common issue of B2C system. Regarding this case, it would be contributor's responsibility, and import duties and taxes will be not covered by Johngyu. 

SEP 25 - Production Complete!! 

Our Story

In 2014, Johngyu had a spectacular debut in South Korea with its signature customizing bag - Pill & Pilly. Since its launch, our inspiration has always been to forward the products that fulfill people's versatile lifestyle. 143 is the one of the goods came from that desire - focused especially on 'business.'  Many people in the world spend quite some time working, and we wanted to help them to complete tasks more efficiently and effectively. We made 143 to satisfy those needs, by adding sophisticated design and affordable price as well. 
As a South Korean independent design company, finding an international sales platform to promote our brand quality & philosophy is the first step to becoming a global brand. We appreciate your contribution in helping us realizing our dream furthermore.

story:
Friling bags - set your mind free

 » Our Story

This is the bag that everybody wishes they had. with all bags available are in plain colors and useless , all you need is a bag that is practical and also looks good and makes you feel happy.

 


Easy to carry everything with you


For all your everyday needs


For work, fun, and everything else

 Sometimes you just need a bag to put your personal items, and your laptop/tablet, and do your everyday tasks but it's hard to find a bag that also keeps your personal style . the purpose for creating this bag really is that simple. practicality and style with the freedom to do everything you want with ease.

» Design


Five style option - WAVE, RIO, RETRO, SUMMER, ONYX.


Interior view


Soft Laptop sleeve with room for more


Outer compartment for pens, phone, and more.

At home or out on the road, walking , running , cycling , skateboarding or even surfing our bags will be with you with a great style and feeling of freedom - Friling bags - set your mind free !


Traveling


Time to relax

» Production

I chose to make this bag with a manufacturer I personally know and trust to ensure that these bags are made of the highest quality and materials .

 » About me

I am an industrial engineer and a product designer with experience as an entrepreneur with supply chain management and production in various continents. 
this project has been in the making for a while as the design formed and came to life. it started with a passion to change the bags field and add some colorful choices that let people keep their individual style even at work and while traveling or doing various hobbies and activities.

story:
What Mother Doesn't Need an Extra Hand?

 

 

 

Make Every Shirt a Nursing Shirt

  • Spend $25 and make every shirt a nursing shirt
  • Protect your neck muscles and remove that shirt from under your chin​
  • Reclaim Your Identity by Breastfeeding in Your Own Wardrobe
  • Ideal For Back to Work Moms 
  • Save Money on Expensive Breastfeeding Attire
  • Secures and Protects Your Clothing
  • Safe for All Fabrics-Never Snagging or Crimping
  • Strong Enough to Hold Through Thicker Fabrics 
  • The Silicone Casing is Durable and Gently Grips the Fabric​ 
  • Millybutton has been issued its US Utility Patent 

 

Multi-Function Breastfeeding Accessory

  • Use it as a Bracelet Side reminder  

 

  • Attach it to your Refrigerator, Diaper or Pump Bag

 

  • Black & White (high contrasting colors) promote infant development

           

 

  • Silicone is non toxic, medical grade, & BPA free
  • Millybutton is dishwasher safe and can be sterilized 
  • Durable, no detachable parts, to meet the standards of the Juvenile Manufacturing Industry

          

 

Never Lose Sight of What's Important 

 

What Mother Doesn't Need an Extra Hand?

 

The Pittsburgh Women That Made This Possible

        Millybutton was made using local & woman-owned manufacturing and we proudly support mother-entrepreneurs. These women have inspired and empowered us with their talents, enthusiasm, and commitment to helping others. Millybutton—and our lives in general—have been made better because they are a part of it! 

Made with love-worn with pride.

Brigette Davitt (Graphic Designer), Jack Davitt (Mascot), Clareanne Best (Co-founder & Manager), Elizabeth Best (Co-founder & CEO), Dana DePasquale (Marketing Intern), Laura Petrilla (Photographer) Those not pictured: Mia Bencivenga (Communications Specialist), Marie Pocasangre (Web Design), Angela Carr (Pittsburgh Plastics Manufacturer), Kaitlin Augustine (Social Media & Marketing Intern), Helena Trent (IT Advertising Support)                             

Mother/Daughter Co-Founders

Elizabeth Best & Clareanne Best 

How did you come up with the idea for this?

I was a new mother who struggled to breastfeed, especially when I went back to work in a corporate architecture office.  I could not afford breastfeeding attire and most of it was not work appropriate. I wore my pre pregnancy clothes and tucked my shirt under my chin, or removed my clothing. I was stressed and overwhelmed as pumping took a lot of time from my job responsibilities. My mother & co founder (a retired nurse) saw me struggling and suggested using a clip to hold up my top. It worked but crimped my top. That was an aha moment!

What makes your product special?

It expands the nursing wardrobe with one simple product, making every shirt a nursing shirt. It is also a symbol of a breastfeeding mother’s journey & commitment to provide the best nourishment for her baby. It is a simple solution to empower mothers to reach their breastfeeding goals, breastfeed successfully and have a cool & calm (supermom) look while doing it. 

We believe all mothers are supermoms and more importantly heroes!

        

 

Here's What Moms Are Saying about Millybutton

       
     

 

  • "The Millybutton worked amazing throughout my whole breastfeeding experience. I was able to pump or nurse, in any shirt in my wardrobe, because the Millybutton held and protected it. I will continue using it in the future and will be gifting it to every new mother I know. It really is an amazing and useful product!" by Alexis Anderson, Millybutton mom
  • "To all my nursing mum friends, Millybutton is a life saver. I've had a chance to try the beta version and it's one of the reasons I've hit my goal of nursing Regan for her first year. I'm a working mum so I often nurse or pump in my work clothes right before running out the door. This has given me an extra hand and eliminated anxiety from wrestling clothes that I hadn't even been aware of. This is going to be my go-to new baby gift, cant wait for the fall product release!"  by Amanda Yarger, Millybutton mom
  • "While working full time, I need to pump often to provide milk for my baby, and to maintain my supply. Millybutton allows me to focus on expressing milk for my baby, and not on juggling my wardrobe with my pump parts." by Trisha Kerstetter, Millybutton mom

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the skinny! We need to raise $20,000 to recoup some of our production costs. We have taken the leap into entrepreneurship but we need your donation to sprout wings and fly! We are self funded and heavily invested, so we need backers. 

  • Our local manufacturer has gone into production, we need the money to pay for the products and cash flow. 
  • Your purchase matters! It is difficult for women owned small businesses to get a loan from the bank. If we have your purchase orders and show the product is in demand, that will help our application. 
  • We have been working on Millybutton for 7 years, it took us 4 years to secure our US Utility Patent and we will not be giving up anytime soon! Your contribution will help us keep our small business going. We have future Millybutton designs and another use for our patent in the works, with your help we can meet our full potential. You will be inspired by what we come up with next!
  • Your perk is that you get the Millybutton- a new to the market product. We have some promotional deals available and the more you buy the cheaper they are. 

 

Millybutton Time Line

            

The Impact

Millybutton llc. is striving to create a, "mother company"  one that is empathetic and nurturing.   We are committed to the idea that Millybutton can create a social impact as both a product and company. Empowering breastfeeding mothers and supporting local woman owned businesses is very important to us. By reaching out to provide Millybuttons to low income mothers through Genesis of Pittsburgh we are able to make an impact in our community. 

Robert Ingersoll said, "We rise by lifting others!" 
Millybutton says, "What mother doesn't need an extra hand!"

 The difference your contribution will make:

  • By contributing you are participating in the normalizing breastfeeding movement! Someday it will make a great story for your grand kids that you were apart of a movement to provide the best possible nutrition for infants and support for their mothers. 
  • You will be supporting local manufacturing! Go Pittsburgh!

Risks and Challenges

Millybutton is a magnetic device and magnets require warnings: 

  • *Magnet Warning: NO PACEMAKERS, ADULT USE ONLY, NO CHEWING! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the Millybutton word out and generate some buzz about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page, they look like this:
  • Contact us for our media and press release kit!

 Thank you for your support!

Sincerely & Forever Grateful,

Team Millybutton

I was a new mother who struggled to breastfeed, especially when I went back to work in a corporate architecture office.  I could not afford breastfeeding attire and most of it was not work appropriate. I wore my pre pregnancy clothes and tucked my shirt under my chin, or removed my clothing. I was stressed and overwhelmed as pumping took a lot of time from my job responsibilities. My mother & co founder (a retired nurse) saw me struggling and suggested using a clip to hold up my top. It worked but crimped my top. That was an aha moment!
What makes your product special?
It expands the nursing wardrobe with one simple product, making every shirt a nursing shirt. It is also a symbol of a breastfeeding mother’s journey & commitment to provide the best nourishment for her baby. It is a simple solution to empower mothers to reach their breastfeeding goals, breastfeed successfully and have a cool & calm (supermom) look while doing it. 
We believe all mothers are supermoms and more importantly heroes!
        
 
Here's What Moms Are Saying about Millybutton
             


"The Millybutton worked amazing throughout my whole breastfeeding experience. I was able to pump or nurse, in any shirt in my wardrobe, because the Millybutton held and protected it. I will continue using it in the future and will be gifting it to every new mother I know. It really is an amazing and useful product!" by Alexis Anderson, Millybutton mom
"To all my nursing mum friends, Millybutton is a life saver. I've had a chance to try the beta version and it's one of the reasons I've hit my goal of nursing Regan for her first year. I'm a working mum so I often nurse or pump in my work clothes right before running out the door. This has given me an extra hand and eliminated anxiety from wrestling clothes that I hadn't even been aware of. This is going to be my go-to new baby gift, cant wait for the fall product release!"  by Amanda Yarger, Millybutton mom
"While working full time, I need to pump often to provide milk for my baby, and to maintain my supply. Millybutton allows me to focus on expressing milk for my baby, and not on juggling my wardrobe with my pump parts." by Trisha Kerstetter, Millybutton mom


 
What We Need & What You Get
Here's the skinny! We need to raise $20,000 to recoup some of our production costs. We have taken the leap into entrepreneurship but we need your donation to sprout wings and fly! We are self funded and heavily invested, so we need backers. 

Our local manufacturer has gone into production, we need the money to pay for the products and cash flow. 
Your purchase matters! It is difficult for women owned small businesses to get a loan from the bank. If we have your purchase orders and show the product is in demand, that will help our application. 
We have been working on Millybutton for 7 years, it took us 4 years to secure our US Utility Patent and we will not be giving up anytime soon! Your contribution will help us keep our small business going. We have future Millybutton designs and another use for our patent in the works, with your help we can meet our full potential. You will be inspired by what we come up with next!
Your perk is that you get the Millybutton- a new to the market product. We have some promotional deals available and the more you buy the cheaper they are. 

 
Millybutton Time Line
            

The Impact
Millybutton llc. is striving to create a, "mother company"  one that is empathetic and nurturing.   We are committed to the idea that Millybutton can create a social impact as both a product and company. Empowering breastfeeding mothers and supporting local woman owned businesses is very important to us. By reaching out to provide Millybuttons to low income mothers through Genesis of Pittsburgh we are able to make an impact in our community. 
Robert Ingersoll said, "We rise by lifting others!" Millybutton says, "What mother doesn't need an extra hand!"
 The difference your contribution will make:

By contributing you are participating in the normalizing breastfeeding movement! Someday it will make a great story for your grand kids that you were apart of a movement to provide the best possible nutrition for infants and support for their mothers. 
You will be supporting local manufacturing! Go Pittsburgh!

Risks and Challenges
Millybutton is a magnetic device and magnets require warnings: 

*Magnet Warning: NO PACEMAKERS, ADULT USE ONLY, NO CHEWING! 

Other Ways You Can Help
Maybe you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Help us get the Millybutton word out and generate some buzz about our campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page, they look like this:

Contact us for our media and press release kit!

 Thank you for your support!Sincerely & Forever Grateful,Team Millybutton

story:
Infinity Fitness Bracelet

Look and Feel Great with the Infinity Fitness Bracelet. We know we have designed a bracelet that will be introduced to the market, and dynamic enough to allow for future enhancements such as medical records, ect......The potential is truly endless!! We need your help and support to see this through.  

As a new and health enhancing innovation in the sports industry, the water proof Infinity Fitness Bracelet has everything the fitness enthusiast needs to measure their workout. Hailed as an absolutely new innovation in the sports industry, this state of the art bracelet is more than just an accessory; it boasts a number of features that can take an exercise regime to the next level by allowing the user to measure the details of an exercise routine and how it is affecting their body. 

There are several other fitness trackers in the market, but none look as good as the Infinity Fitness Bracelet. Designed to be as versatile as possible on the wrist, it is perceived as a welcome accessory whether you’re working out or out on a night out on the town. The curved display sits comfortably on the wrist and will not slip off regardless of the jostling it receives.

Display Features  

 • Approximate measurements regarding calories burned

 • Check dynamic blood pressure

 • Blood oxygen levels

 • Skin temperature in Fahrenheit and Celsius

 • Built-in GPS tracker for the wayward trekker 

 • A solar radiation check to eliminate chances of sunburn

 • Check blood sugar levels anytime, anywhere

 • Heart rate monitoring with state of the art sensors

 • Display size: 2.5 inches 

 • Micro adjustable wrist size from 15cm up to 24cm 

That’s not all. The Infinity Fitness Bracelet has been designed to be the whole package and thus also allows users to:

• Check email on the go  

• Take pictures and share them via built-in Wi-Fi  

• Check text messages without the need of a phone  

• Use Bluetooth 4.0 Data sync to connect the bracelet to their phone

story:
www.afrikapresents.com

Are you TIRED of the negative portrayal of Africa in the media and in our schools? Are you FRUSTRATED at the lack of diversity in childrens books? Do you want your children to grow up with a more COMPLETE UNDERSTANDING of the world around them? SO DO WE! 

 My name is Mara Menzies, storyteller and founder of 'Afrika Presents' alongside my colleague Chimezie Umeh. We believe firmly in the magic of Africa, in the wonder and the wealth of culture so vibrant it is impossible to describe.         

                             CHIMEZIE                                               MARA     

'Afrika Presents' has come together through the efforts of a whole host of wonderful people. Our guiding principles are to:

a) instil a greater sense of self pride among children of African heritage 

b) enable children regardless of origin, to share in this rich cultural heritage. 

c) do this through fun, engaging, interactive play.

These principles are at the core of what we do. 


CHANGING THE NARRATIVE!

In this increasingly multicultural world, it is vital to challenge ignorance and negative stereotyping by providing opportunities for children to experience the world from different perspectives. And the most effective way to do this BY FAR, is through exploring, creating and imagining!

And we have created the AFRICAN FASHION DESIGN SKETCHBOOK

                           

We are proud that this is the first EVER activity book that uniquely celebrates African fashion and its incredible history! The African Fashion Design Sketchbook will inform, entertain and inspire for hours. It is packed with a ton of features:

  • 40 design pages
  • Beautiful hand drawn illustrations
  • 2 sticker sheets
  • 3 stencil sheets
  • Stories 
  • Fun facts
  • Links to an AUGMENTED REALITY APP (AR) to discover more! (This link is not ours but is just to show you what AR can do)

   

          HOW IT WORKS                        SWATCHES                     AMAZING HAIR

We have a 'first version' African Fashion Design Sketchbook that is a THRILLING interactive adventure through the world of kente, bogolan, kanga and more! 

However, it was quite big, which made it expensive to post, so that was no good!  We also wanted to provide an even better user experience! 

  • We have re-designed it so the pages look and feel even better!
  • We have improved our stencils so they are really child friendly!
  • We've added STICKERS! We have been working with INCREDIBLE designers such as Kiki Loves London www.kikiloveslondon.com and http://zanjoo.com/ and Ufuoma Egbede https://www.etsy.com/uk/people/uflomage who have kindly given us permission to use their designs in the sketchbook and we have developed a range of beautiful STICKER SHEETS so even the tiniest fingers can enjoy the book. We are grateful for their support and in future hope to collaborate with other exciting artists and creators!
  • We are also developing an AUGMENTED REALITY APP, allowing kids to go on a deeper voyage of discovery by scanning images in the book that will take them on an interactive journey through videos, games and quizzes. 

WE NEED HELP TO:

A) PRINT the book itself.

B) DEVELOP our AUGMENTED REALITY APP so that kids can discover even more excitement. e.g. Scan the picture of bogolan mudcloth and see a video of how it is traditionally made. (We think it's fantastically exciting and the opportunities are endless!) 

Once we've hit our target and the costs of production are met, then we aim to spend any additional monies we receive on further development of the content for our augmented reality app e.g. using 3D models, live texturing, etc. We would also work on the development of future products and importantly for us, to work closer with schools. 

African fashion is bright, bold, beautiful and rich in history and creativity. The book features kente, bogolan mudcloth, kanga and many more. There are pages to colour in, some with backgrounds to inspire but plenty of opportunities to get creative yourself.

- Fulani woman from Guinea with intricate hairstyle (with SCAN ME button) 

- Addition of  a few backgrounds (Do you recognise the skyline?) Also see new dimension as compared to the old.

- A few of our stickers, but there are plenty of others!


ABOUT THE GIRLS!

We are all amazing and each one of us has something unique to offer! The  sketchbook showcases many interests including racing cars, music, literature, nature and sport. 

        

While most of the mannequins are of a similar shape, this is just because it is difficult to create stickers and stencils to accommodate too wide a variety. However, at the back of the book, we have several pages where there is no body and the designers are free to imagine whoever they want and design outfits/costumes/anything to adapt to ANY body size and shape.


 

The book was inspired by the amazing children around us and so at this stage is quite female focused but we believe that boys with a passion for fashion can enjoy the creative element as much as the girls. We have bigger plans and other inclusive products in the pipeline. 

SOME OF OUR BIGGEST SUPPORTERS

                                      

Whether you are able to support us by sharing the campaign, by pre-ordering the sketchbook or whether you would like a live storytelling experience by one of the UK's best performance storytellers alongside a box full of books, your contribution is hugely appreciated as the tiniest support is very welcome and necessary.

HERE ARE THE PERKS!!!

THANK YOU FROM THE HEART

An enormous heartfelt thank you from the team for your support on our social media telling everyone just how amazing you are!
3 spectacular black and white pdf images for you to colour in.

THE EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT (20% SAVING!!!)

A MAHOOSIVE thank you on our website and social media. 

One of the first limited Edition Afrika Presents Sketchbook FOR A LOVELY DISCOUNTED PRICE. 

THE NOT TO BE MISSED ONE

An enormous thank you and 1 copy of the sketchbook

DOUBLE AMAZINGNESS

All of the above PLUS another book so your kids don't squabble:)

PARTY OF 5

5 beautiful books plus all of the above and a pack of 5 postcards featuring some of our stunning illustrations

10 COPIES AND DESIGN YOUR OWN

10 beautiful books, an enormous thank you, a full pack of 10 postcards featuring our stunning illustrations. PLUS send us your very own design, any style - photos, drawings, mash up of styles, hair, accessories everything and we will create a hi res illustration in our style and send you a glossy poster and the digital image too!

STORIES COME TO LIFE

30 beautiful books, an enormous thank you, 3 packs of postcards, and a visit from Mara to share stories from across the African continent with you at your school or event within the next 12 months! Hard to reach places or outwith the UK would incur additional expense for travel and accommodation. An unmissable opportunity to hear one of the UK's TOP performance storytellers! Engaging, interactive and immense fun!

 WE HOPE TO HAVE YOUR SUPPORT

We believe this is something really special and hope that you feel that way too. We also hope to hear your thoughts about the book. If you can't afford to support financially at the moment, then you can still help hugely, by sharing this on your social media and letting as many people know as possible. 

Thank you and we truly appreciate your help. Let's change the narrative together!

Mara, Chimezie and the team at Afrika Presents
