story:
Your efforts of yesterday are your successes tomorrow. Don't forget it!


What is MEDALdisplay?

MEDALdisplay is a display for medals; an object designed for archiving your dreams, your struggles, your personal achievements.  

It is the way to relive your most intimate emotions, to remember every day your achievements!  


How MEDALdisplay was born

I am Roberto, an Italian entrepreneur who has always been passionate about sports.  Anyone who has won a medal knows the effort and sacrifices made to reach out and touch their dream.  

In my athletic career I have achieved many important goals... but one day I realized that all the medals I had won with so much sacrifice were left quickly forgotten in a dusty drawer!  

Those medals, won with sweat and effort, are of great value to every sportsman and are not worthy of such an un-heroic end.  All our achievements should not be forgotten and deserve to be displayed and admired in time to relive each day the emotion of "that" race, "that" moment. 

I needed a medal display case! 

That's why there is MEDALdisplay: this new wall display made of AISI304 stainless steel was designed, manufactured, assembled, and finished completely in Italy, thanks to a collaboration between local professionals and a meticulous production process.  Made in Italy with Italian style at the service of your success.


How it works

MEDALdisplay, is an object of furniture design

It is fixed to a wall using the screws provided with the mounting kit:

1) Place MEDALdisplay on the wall where you wish to hang it and drill the anchor holes. 

2) Fasten MEDALdisplay to the wall by tightening the three screws, covering them with the screw covers. Then insert, one at a time, your medal ribbons to hang them. 

3) Admire your medals, finally displayed with the elegance that they deserve!  (pictured below: an example of a Triathlon display)


Details make the difference

To showcase your medals, do you prefer an object of poor quality, made with inferior materials, or a display made with care and with fine materials? 

If you are demanding and want the best for you and your achievements, you'll love this design object, handled with care in even the smallest details.  The stainless steel is of the highest quality and ensures a solid and robust structure.

The exterior finish, one of a kind, is a fitting backdrop to your medals.
 The kit assembly is complete with screw covers of nickel-plated brass, which serve to mask the mounting screws and ensure the elegance of Italian design... 

Does that seem insignificant? For us, no! But then no one had ever thought of it before.  

And because we attach great importance to "personalization" we make every display in a male version or female version.


Production process

The graphic sketch is born from a sketch that becomes a computerized model thanks to the support of the graphics department. 

Each MEDALdisplay is then successively redesigned to CAD where even the smallest details are defined before starting production.

For production of the pieces, strictly made in Italy, we use state of the art laser cutting machines, which guarantee very high levels of quality, with a cutting dimension tolerance of 0.1 mm. 

The finishing is a critical step in the production process. Every product is cleaned and hand polished by craftsmen in the industry, guaranteeing the best quality. The satin effect gives MEDALdispay a unique elegance.  

Finally, we perform on all MEDALdisplay products a manual check before packaging, to ensure that each product is free of defects and exceeds even the highest quality standards.

For this reason, we offer on all our products a 10 year warranty against corrosion.

Distribution and sale

It is already available through our online store www.MEDALdisplay.it where you can buy the versions of MEDALdisplay produced to date. We are expanding our presence in the most important markets in order to advertise the brand and disclose as much as possible about this interesting product.

We are very flexible and can supply large quantities to sports clubs and distributors, or we can simply send a single piece if requested.

Each MEDALdisplay comes with a scratch proof case, installation instructions, and a kit with screws for wall mounting.



Are you wondering if MEDALdisplay is for you?

If you are an athlete, then the answer is "YES!"   

Why is MEDALdisplay meant for ALL athletes who want to proudly display with pride their hard work and accomplishments? That’s why it exists (... or will exist in the future, thanks to your help!), a display for each sport. 

Are you NOT an athlete? The answer is always "YES!" 

It's never too late to start practicing sports, and this display could be the motivation that drives you to achieve an ambitious dream.  

Do you have friends who are sports fans? 

Get an item made in Italy, one of a kind, and he or she can only be grateful! A high quality gift that will make them happy and grateful for life.

Are you a distributor? Do you want to be one?

A product with the design "Made in Italy" can only enhance your business. In us you will find care, competence, and professionalism.

Those who have worked with us have found us to be a serious and reliable partner. We are ready.  Are you?

These are the variants of the product that we are able to produce today:

We also manufacture displays that include "Motivational" emotional phrases, which can then be used independently of the type of sport. 


Available sizes

Each MEDALdisplay is available in three different sizes, to meet the demands of space or accommodate different quantities of medals.

MEDALdisplay dimensions  N° medals
750 mm / 30"

suitable for 20-30 medals
600 mm / 24"
 suitable for 16-20 medals
450 mm / 18" suitable for 12-16 medals


Order your MEDALdisplay now and share your successes with us.  We are ready to provide you with a unique, stylish, and high quality product.


Made in Italy will come into your home! 

Here are the models we have already designed and that, thanks to your support, will be able to produce:


Go to gallery and discover all our options and choose your favorite MEDALdisplay!




What We Need & What You Get

At the moment we produce every MEDALdisplay in small quantities: For us right now, mass production is not sustainable (the high quality materials and meticulous process are very costly). 

We have set a goal of 80,000 euro in order to start a mass production of MEDALdisplay that satisfies the full range of sports and every type of sport.

With this amount, we will also be capable of meeting the demands of eventual customizations ensuring a minimum supply, even without significantly raising our standard prices. 

Wouldn't it be great to have your own custom display?

Here is our story and what we propose to do with your help:


What happens if we do not reach this target?

For our supporters, nothing changes.
We will always protect your orders, even if we do not reach the target. 

Our first goal is to please the customer at any cost. Always!


Other Ways You Can Help

Choose a "Perk" if you desire and start thinking about your successes; we will do everything to highlight your medals and we are proud to work with you in creating your new MEDALdisplay.

If you cannot help us financially, do not worry! You can support us by publicizing our product among your sports friends or by using the Indiegogo sharing tools

Grazie!! Ciao, Roberto
story_txt:
Your efforts of yesterday are your successes tomorrow. Don't forget it!What is MEDALdisplay?
MEDALdisplay is a display for medals; an object designed for archiving your dreams, your struggles, your personal achievements.  It is the way to relive your most intimate emotions, to remember every day your achievements!  
How MEDALdisplay was bornI am Roberto, an Italian entrepreneur who has always been passionate about sports.  Anyone who has won a medal knows the effort and sacrifices made to reach out and touch their dream.  In my athletic career I have achieved many important goals... but one day I realized that all the medals I had won with so much sacrifice were left quickly forgotten in a dusty drawer!  Those medals, won with sweat and effort, are of great value to every sportsman and are not worthy of such an un-heroic end.  All our achievements should not be forgotten and deserve to be displayed and admired in time to relive each day the emotion of "that" race, "that" moment. I needed a medal display case! That's why there is MEDALdisplay: this new wall display made of AISI304 stainless steel was designed, manufactured, assembled, and finished completely in Italy, thanks to a collaboration between local professionals and a meticulous production process.  Made in Italy with Italian style at the service of your success.How it worksMEDALdisplay, is an object of furniture designIt is fixed to a wall using the screws provided with the mounting kit:1) Place MEDALdisplay on the wall where you wish to hang it and drill the anchor holes. 

2) Fasten MEDALdisplay to the wall by tightening the three screws, covering them with the screw covers. Then insert, one at a time, your medal ribbons to hang them. 3) Admire your medals, finally displayed with the elegance that they deserve!  (pictured below: an example of a Triathlon display)Details make the difference
To showcase your medals, do you prefer an object of poor quality, made with inferior materials, or a display made with care and with fine materials? 
If you are demanding and want the best for you and your achievements, you'll love this design object, handled with care in even the smallest details.  The stainless steel is of the highest quality and ensures a solid and robust structure.
The exterior finish, one of a kind, is a fitting backdrop to your medals.  The kit assembly is complete with screw covers of nickel-plated brass, which serve to mask the mounting screws and ensure the elegance of Italian design... 
Does that seem insignificant? For us, no! But then no one had ever thought of it before.  




And because we attach great importance to "personalization" we make every display in a male version or female version.




Production process
The graphic sketch is born from a sketch that becomes a computerized model thanks to the support of the graphics department. 
Each MEDALdisplay is then successively redesigned to CAD where even the smallest details are defined before starting production.





For production of the pieces, strictly made in Italy, we use state of the art laser cutting machines, which guarantee very high levels of quality, with a cutting dimension tolerance of 0.1 mm. 

The finishing is a critical step in the production process. Every product is cleaned and hand polished by craftsmen in the industry, guaranteeing the best quality. The satin effect gives MEDALdispay a unique elegance.  
Finally, we perform on all MEDALdisplay products a manual check before packaging, to ensure that each product is free of defects and exceeds even the highest quality standards.



For this reason, we offer on all our products a 10 year warranty against corrosion.








Distribution and sale


It is already available through our online store www.MEDALdisplay.it where you can buy the versions of MEDALdisplay produced to date. We are expanding our presence in the most important markets in order to advertise the brand and disclose as much as possible about this interesting product.


We are very flexible and can supply large quantities to sports clubs and distributors, or we can simply send a single piece if requested.
Each MEDALdisplay comes with a scratch proof case, installation instructions, and a kit with screws for wall mounting.






Are you wondering if MEDALdisplay is for you?
If you are an athlete, then the answer is "YES!"   
Why is MEDALdisplay meant for ALL athletes who want to proudly display with pride their hard work and accomplishments? That’s why it exists (... or will exist in the future, thanks to your help!), a display for each sport. 


Are you NOT an athlete? The answer is always "YES!" 
It's never too late to start practicing sports, and this display could be the motivation that drives you to achieve an ambitious dream.  
Do you have friends who are sports fans? 
Get an item made in Italy, one of a kind, and he or she can only be grateful! A high quality gift that will make them happy and grateful for life.

Are you a distributor? Do you want to be one?
 A product with the design "Made in Italy" can only enhance your business. In us you will find care, competence, and professionalism.
Those who have worked with us have found us to be a serious and reliable partner. We are ready.  Are you?
These are the variants of the product that we are able to produce today:


We also manufacture displays that include "Motivational" emotional phrases, which can then be used independently of the type of sport. 



Available sizes


Each MEDALdisplay is available in three different sizes, to meet the demands of space or accommodate different quantities of medals.


MEDALdisplay dimensions 
N° medals


750 mm / 30"

suitable for 20-30 medals



600 mm / 24"

suitable for 16-20 medals


450 mm / 18"
suitable for 12-16 medals




Order your MEDALdisplay now and share your successes with us.  We are ready to provide you with a unique, stylish, and high quality product.


Made in Italy will come into your home! 
Here are the models we have already designed and that, thanks to your support, will be able to produce:






Go to gallery and discover all our options and choose your favorite MEDALdisplay!




What We Need & What You Get

At the moment we produce every MEDALdisplay in small quantities: For us right now, mass production is not sustainable (the high quality materials and meticulous process are very costly). 
We have set a goal of 80,000 euro in order to start a mass production of MEDALdisplay that satisfies the full range of sports and every type of sport.
With this amount, we will also be capable of meeting the demands of eventual customizations ensuring a minimum supply, even without significantly raising our standard prices. 
Wouldn't it be great to have your own custom display?

Here is our story and what we propose to do with your help:



What happens if we do not reach this target?
For our supporters, nothing changes.We will always protect your orders, even if we do not reach the target. 
Our first goal is to please the customer at any cost. Always!
Other Ways You Can Help
Choose a "Perk" if you desire and start thinking about your successes; we will do everything to highlight your medals and we are proud to work with you in creating your new MEDALdisplay.
If you cannot help us financially, do not worry! You can support us by publicizing our product among your sports friends or by using the Indiegogo sharing tools

Grazie!! Ciao, Roberto

story:
Short Summary

SkinTie is a new fashion concept, representing a different way of wearing a short tie, directly on your skin. SkinTie is made of silk and clips on the back of your neck.

This elegantly playful SkinTie can be worn by women, men or kids. 

SkinTie is a fashion statement identifying individuals in modern and fashionable establishments, like tech companies, fashion designer boutiques and  trendy hospitality venues and events.

SkinTie is creating disruption in the fashion space, re-inventing neckties and how to dress your neck and cleavage.



Founder

Christophe Schuhmann, French-American, 53, living in San Francisco since 1999. 2 daughters and 2 grand-daughters.

Christophe, born in Paris, moved when he was  nine months to Cameroon and Congo, following the steps of his Dad, a Crédit Lyonnais banker. After studying political sciences in Paris and business in Bordeaux , Christophe created his first company Microgolf in 1986 at age 25 and 3 years later, added a tech software company PanoramaTechnologies, who achieved to modelize in 3 D any landscape including golf courses.

He moved to California in May 1999 and created a wine import company "Les Petits Châteaux".

After various positions in software companies, including Google, as quality assurance engineer, Christophe re-oriented his career onto the business side and is currently holding a position at Swit­chfly, SasS company in travel and hospitality space,  as lead implementation manager.



Beginnings

On November 29th, 2014, Christophe, invited to a Junior Prom theme house-warming party, while dres­sing for the party, instinctively ties his tie around his neck directly on his skin, inside the collar.

SkinTie was born.

Receiving a lot of positive feedback since then, Christophe decided in December to go for it and launched SKINTIE, INC, reserved the domain name skintie.com, registered Skintie (TEAS#86467135), defined and setup an online store ( http://skintie.com/), hired fashion designers to create prototypes and organized Skintie first photo shoot in Los Angeles in January 2015. Rapidly followed by a video shoot on August 8 in Laguna Beach. Video directed by Thierry Brouard and showcased on our Indiegogo campaign.


Product

Designed and crafted with extreme care and flare, using the best silks or soft fabrics like satin, taffeta, linen with or without jewelry, each skintie is hand-made and customized, thanks to the silk printing technology. Manufacturing will stay local in San Francisco and Los Angeles.

When you wear a skintie for the first time, you immediately feel different. You feel elegant and moving in style.  You are breaking codes, softly, with fun and joy.

The boring conventional, outdated traditional tie, around your collar, pinching your neck should just vanish :)

Be cool, wear a SkinTie!

You can wear a SkinTie for any occasions at work, cocktails and soirees, or even when practi­cing sports like golf, horse riding, tennis, polo, sailing...

SkinTie is already offe­ring custom made corporate option for tech companies. high-end restaurants, hair-salons, fashion boutiques, airlines...

SkinTie lawyers are currently defining the bases for licensing contract to allow any recognized fashion brand to design and sell skinties of their own. 

3% of all profits and licensing fees will fund non-profit programs.




What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $50K split into online branding boost, production line set-ups, legal and research.

Silk and original prints sourced through local business and  artists.

"Ateliers de couture" based in Los Angeles and San Francisco.

Marketing materials, photo and video shoots directed by Thierry Brouard, Founder of Prémium Magazine, a new edgy fashion and art magazine based in Newport Beach.

SkinTie will be on the cover of the second Premium edition.

The Impact

Be part of a movement poised to become a new fashion breakout, bringing happiness and class to the people that are wearing it. Try it for yourself. 

Untie your Life!

Wear a SkinTie!

With your contribution, you'll not only receive awesome perks, but be proud to endorse and support the birth of a something new in the fashion communities.


Risks & Challenges

San Francisco tech communities for social media penetration and fashion in LOs Angeles for adoption seem like a perfect combination. Skintie "Made in California" label clearly make a statement!

Ultimately our goal is to raise more capital to establish progressively the brand in as many countries as possible.

Your contributions will create buzz, raise attention and validate everything we have lined-up just for you.


Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your world about our project. It is a cool one! Use your favorite social media outlets to promote and create the buzz we need to be successful! Thank you! Merci !

story:
"THIS IS MY GOLDEN CHANCE', says Storai Stanizai, age 22, "PLEASE HELP ME TO CATCH MY DREAMS".

Help bring the extraordinary talents of a young Afghan woman to the world.

Born under the oppressive rule of the Taliban and growing up during the instability of war, odds were stacked against Storai Stanizai. Through relentless effort she made the most of her uncommon abilities, realizing her creative and leadership potential through the creation of unique jewelry. Now Storai needs your support to advance her journey. We are raising $18,000 to make this happen.

In 2001, when she was just 8-years-old, Storai won a mural painting competition at her school, and at 10 created a small workshop in her home to master the craft of jewelry making. In 2013 Storai founded ZYB Designs, and with the support of Sophie Swire from Future Brilliance, Storai was able to grow her craft into a business, bringing in young jewelers and gem-cutters to realize the dream of setting up an Afghanistan-based co-operative and providing employment for other talented women jewelers. 

Storai gained valuable training and support in Jaipur, India, from acclaimed designers Jon Harwood, Michael Boys and Elisabeth Pfahl (a short video of Storai's trip to Jaipur below). Through Future Brilliance and its social enterprise Aayenda Jewelry, Storai designed the annual Kellogg Innovation Network (KIN) commemorative coin for Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University. Storai was invited to Chicago to attend the KIN Global conference in May 2015, by Kellogg School of Management Professor of Innovation and Entrepreneurship, Robert C. Wolcott, where she exhibited her designs and spoke passionately about her ambitions for the Aayenda Jewelry Co-Operative, the lives of Afghan women artisans and her own hopes for the future.

Storai is ready to further her training in leadership, marketing and creative design. She has been awarded a partial scholarship by the prestigious Gemological Institute of America (GIA) to study jewelry design in London this Fall, 2015. Proceeds from our campaign will fund the balance, including travel, accommodation, supplies, media and bookkeeping work.

USE OF PROCEEDS:

GIA Training Course (balance costs)

$1600

Books, stationary and other study materials

$1000

Air travel

$2000

Other travel and accommodation

$5000

Health and travel insurance

$1500

Logistics, cost of goods & shipping for perks

$2500

Bookkeeping

$1400

Public relations support inc campaign video

$3000

TOTAL

$18,000

If we exceed $18,000, the additional proceeds will be used to help Storai launch her first collection. The collection will be marketed through AAYENDA JEWELRY, the social enterprise subsidiary of 501 c 3, Future Brilliance.

FOR DONORS:
Those making contributions will receive discount certificates for the www.aayendajewelry.com website, hand-made Aayenda jewelry pieces, comprising beautiful Afghan gemstones and beads set in 18 karat gold, or gold plated base metals and sterling silver. Aayenda Jewelry collections are designed by Afghan artisans in collaboration with award-winning international designers.

Contributors will also be listed on the Future Brilliance site, in thanks. Future Brilliance US is a registered 501 c 3, so donations from US tax payers are tax deductible (to the extent allowable by law). 

MORE INFORMATION ON STORAI STANIZAI
https://vimeo.com/129701649
http://www.kinglobal2015.org/storai-stanizai.htm

INFORMATION ON FUTURE BRILLIANCE
The nongovernmental organization (NGO) FUTURE BRILLIANCE, is working to bring Afghan women into mainstream society through entrepreneurism. The 501 c 3 registered non-profit trains semi-skilled Afghan artisans in jewelry design, manufacturing, business, social media, blogging and e-commerce and helps them reach and develop international markets through enterprise development. 
http://www.futurebrilliance.net
Future Brilliance works with graduates of other Afghan training programs (such as those delivered by Turquoise Mountain Institute, Rupani Foundation and GiZNW), and gives them the extra skills and on-the-job work experience they need to design, produce and deliver to the international market, working towards self-sufficiency. 

In 2012,  Future Brilliance Afghanistan set up a lapidary training project for Afghan artisans to develop jewelry created by local craftspersons using stones that are native to the country. 36 artisans received advanced skills training in jewelry manufacture, design and business skills and workplace experience during a 6 months' training course in Jaipur. The result was a significant increase in their skills, increase in employment and the launch of the Afghan brand, Aayenda Jewelry, comprised of jewelry by the Afghan students and artisans in collaboration with award winning U.K. designer Paul Spurgeon and U.S. designers Anna Ruth Henriques and Annie Fensterstock.

300 war widows (among 1200 bead-makers) from the Balkh Province in the northern region of Afghanistan hand-carve lapis beads for Aayenda, and a 12 Afghan women are involved in the design and production of the line, in addition to the graduates of the Turquoise Mountain and Future Brilliance training programs.

Led by Storai Stanizai and supported by Future Brilliance, the graduates have now collaborated to form the Aayenda Jewelry Co-Operative. This is a big accomplishment in a war-torn country that is, according to a June 2011 global survey by the U.K. newspaper, The Guardian, “the world’s most dangerous country in which to be born a woman.” 

INFORMATION ON SOPHIA SWIRE
In 2012, Sophia founded the non-profit Future Brilliance Afghanistan Organization (FBAO) to foster stability and prosperity through enterprise and workforce development with a special focus on developing access to the gemstone and jewelry value chain for Afghan women. 
http://www.kinglobal2015.org/sophia-swire.html
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sophia_Swire

story:
Avion Accelerator – Entrepreneurial Latinas Creating Globally Scalable Ventures

Avion Accelerator is the first startup pre-accelerator focused specifically on launching Latina-led startups from around the world by bringing them to Silicon Valley and providing the resources these women entrepreneurs need to bring their commercially viable business models up to investment grade.

And we’re off to a great start! Avion has already aligned well-regarded partners, experienced mentors, and a location in the heart of Silicon Valley's vibrant startup community – all the resources and connections Latina founders need to introduce their scalable businesses into the global marketplace.  

What’s needed next is $100,000 which we need to support six Latina-led startups through our comprehensive eight-week regimen. To assure your contribution is well-spent, all those chosen must meet at minimum a non-negotiable  criteria: business models capable of commercially viability on a global scale, as that level of success is the best way to reach parity.

Three Explicit Reasons Why Avion Ventures Deserves Your Participation

(1) Unique opportunity for you to double your impact – by simultaneously assisting two prominent, yet under-represented, groups in the startup ecosystem – women entrepreneurs and the Latin community.

(2) Latinas are a commercially significant population. Consider the following not commonly known facts supporting why it makes sense for you to encourage entrepreneurial activity amongst Latin women:

Latinas are the growth engine of the U.S. female population, expected to represent 30 percent of the total female population by 2060. (Nielsen)

  • Latinas in the upcoming generation are increasingly more educated, tech savvy and connected. (Nielsen)
  • Between 2002 and 2007, Hispanic-owned businesses increased at double the national rate (U.S. Census Bureau)
(3) Avion finds and curates the best and the brightest from the Latina community, delivering to you frontline exposure and premium deal flow. The likelihood you'll get a remarkable ROI is realistic because of the headstart you'll gain from meeting committed founders early in their careers. For example, you'll be given the opportunity to meet these talented founders therefore providing you ample opportunity to strengthen promising relationships.

Latinas in the upcoming generation are increasingly more educated, tech savvy and connected. (Nielsen)
Between 2002 and 2007, Hispanic-owned businesses increased at double the national rate (U.S. Census Bureau)

(3) Avion finds and curates the best and the brightest from the Latina community, delivering to you frontline exposure and premium deal flow. The likelihood you'll get a remarkable ROI is realistic because of the headstart you'll gain from meeting committed founders early in their careers. For example, you'll be given the opportunity to meet these talented founders therefore providing you ample opportunity to strengthen promising relationships.

story:
The mission of the Georgia Track Club is supporting Georgia’s elite athletes and the communities that help them reach their dreams. Most people don’t realize that Olympians live below the poverty line and face financial hardships due to sacrifices they make for their dreams. Dr. Josh Glass felt compelled to create this nonprofit after many years working with the world’s most accomplished Olympic track and field athletes. The work ethic, resilience and character that they displayed was admirable. He was also impressed with their ability to accomplish great athletic feats despite a lack of resources.

In our first years, the Georgia Track Club has already begun fulfilling our commitment to serve the great communities of Georgia under the direction of executive director, and three-time Olympian, Hazel Clark. Our athletes have made numerous appearances, presented our Champions Don’t Bully program at local schools, given motivational talks to aspiring students, launched our Sportswear from Stars Donation program and most recently held our first annual Family Fit Fun Run Day, which was a great success.

These programs and events have given our athletes a platform to reach out and give back to the communities that have molded them into the people they are today.  Now it is time for us to focus on another important reason for the existence of the club: financial support for our athletes as they embark on their journey to the world’s biggest stage:the Olympic games.

Training and competing for a spot on the Olympic team is a very expensive endeavor and requires laser focus on the task at hand. Many Olympic dreams end because of a lack of resources. For every Olympic Gold medalist like Dwight Phillips, Chris Brown, Christian Taylor or Angelo Taylor, there are many athletes that missed their golden opportunity because they simply could not afford to continue.  

Please consider supporting our GTC athletes during our GoBold4Gold fundraising campaign. Your support will be used to assist our Olympians and Olympic hopefuls with medical care, travel costs, coaching fees and daily basic living expenses - all necessary for any athlete to thrive. Your donation means that you are joining the team behind the team and sending the message to our athletes that they have a community of support behind them. Each donation level will be associated with a personalized gift from the GTC as a token of our thanks for your vital support. The thank you packages include merchandise signed by Olympic Gold medalists, GTC apparel and a dream trip to the Olympic trials.

Feel free to share this information with your family, friends and your social media followers. Be bold and help us bring back more Gold to the USA and the great state of Georgia! #GoBold4Gold

story:
Who We Are
_____________

Cole Still & Laney Ronske are Co-founders of Rags  (and are also siblings). Despite a tumultuous and often traumatic childhood, they have chosen to find humility & growth in those struggles to heal + band together to tackle the disparities around them that our communities face. Because the greatest asset in life is to recognize one's own privilege and use it to bridge gaps & benefit others.

 

THE "WHY"

_____________

The goal of Rags is to benefit those members of our community who have been left behind or wrote off as "a statistic". But YET are still are being used as a funding source for nonprofit ventures, charities, and treatment centers in your area.

When we say benefit, we mean making sure their basic needs are met, then once they are safe and stable- providing employment, career development pathways & working to create leaders that will in return help more individuals.

In business, our goal is to battle textile waste, how we approach & look at fashion + how we appreciate and care for one another.

Rags is important to our team because it was an idea created by combining our passions together to provide aid to these people who have become a part of a cycle of funding for psychiatric facilities, addiction treatment centers & for large-scale nonprofits.While fighting the "fast fashion" industry, battling clothing waste and supporting sustainable solutions for our environment.

A person in need isn't a funding source, and while that's at the root of our mission- it isn't why we're asking for your help.

 

What We Need & What You Get

As a grassroots start-up, with no donors or corporate giving. We aren't pleading with you to support our cause.

We aren't asking for your money. We are seeing if you to want to become a consumer. 

As a contributor to Rags you will have helped us create a pop-up shop to spread our message, hire & train individuals who are in need to come & work with us, give the public a sample of our product (beautiful, vintage & second-hand, one-of-a-kind clothing items).

Using the pop-up-shop we can have visitors subscribe to our monthly subscription box made of recyclable materials & filled with curated/ thrifted clothing items. However, for being a early supporter of us today on Indiegogo we are offering you (Our VIP'S) our endgame product today. We want to launch our subscription box today FOR YOU for supporting us to launch this venture! 

____________

 

The big goal for Rags is to open it's own thrift shop in Columbus, OH which will have a community center space for those in need, host public FREE events, offer FREE clothing, FREE food & connect those in need with shelter, medical care and not just focus on getting people off the streets but to overcome a lifetime of struggles in order to thrive. In addition, as a for-profit social enterprise we will fund other local grassroots initiatives from housing, to healthcare, all the way to providing career + workforce development opportunities.

 

_____________

Welcome to 2019, where we don't have to be greedy and do business in a way that lifts some people up while pushing others down.

Here at Rags, this a team effort. We believe that we all deserve being able to live a quality standard of life. We believe that if our employees aren't thriving we shouldn't be either.

That's why we're going to grow in a ethical way that supports our employees just as much as our senior leadership. What does that mean? You're not going to see our CEO making 100's of thousands of dollars meanwhile someone who is going through our development program struggling to eat.  Rags believes that people should come before profit, always. 

COSTS
______

For the Pop-Up Store, Rags will need $3500 This will cover inventory, supplies, leasing costs, employees, and marketing for the events.

The Subscription Box would cost us $3000. This money would be used for building the website, design, recycled packaging, inventory & employment costs for the community.

The thrift store would realistically cost close to $60,000. This will allow us to start-up , lease a space, remodel & revamp, inventory, supplies, labor, and employment.

______

BECAUSE OF YOU

If we meet our goal we'll be able to launch our pop-up shops, build-out our subscription box &  begin a venture that will give those in need something to stand on, build out, and support them. With Rags we'll put the responsibility back on the individual, while challenging a system created to keep people needing help instead of bridging them to a higher quality of life.We will create a larger impact on our environment by looking at how we're doing business on two fronts. So we ask you this.

Â 1) Are you giving to charities & nonprofits to fund their lifestyles or are you creating impact? 

2) The clothing that you are buying based on brand value that's being sold to you through advertising- is it worth the damage that you are doing to our environment?

 

You will find different perk levels some that include gifts, handwritten messages, provide direct aid to those in need & make you a part of our venture.

 

So, will you become one of our VIP's and make RAGS a reality?

story:
What We Do

We design and produce natural and biodegradable clothing, with a romantic and sophisticated feel, that simply feels great on your skin. Our clothing line is all about laid-back elegance. - "Classic Caribbean for modern living".

We are known as much for natural clothing, as for the flattering fit of our trousers, dresses and menswear.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $6000 to pay for raw material and manufacturing of the sample collection that will be produced with local and regional manufacturers.

We have some amazing perks that include branded T-shirts, tote bags, coupons, meetups and travel, and  more!

 

 

If I don't meet my goals, the funds will still be invested into the project, but in a smaller way

 

The Impact

As a brand, our main objective is to make well-made, durable, classic pieces, for the discerning customer, looking for affordable luxury, that looks amazing and lasts, creating a longer life-cycle, keeping fashion items out of landfills and synthetic microfibres out of the ocean.

Our customers want breathable fabrics that are better for them and better for fragile ecosystems like our Caribbean islands.  

Our motto is “Look Good, Feel Good, Do Good”

Sophisticated, durable, and  natural fibre products. 

 

We think that it is just good karma to “think green”, to help create a better environment for all, now and in the future.

Support a more beautiful and green future with access to socially-conscious Caribbean fashion.

As an ethical brand, we are careful about choosing manufacturing partners, many of whom are female-owned, who create economic opportunities for women, creating sustainable livelihoods for all involved, promoting wealth creation and community development.

 

With over 20 years of experience in the fashion industry, one of our greatest challenges has been responding to growing demands. We have solved this by completely changing how we produce our garments and get them to the customer, from buying bulk natural and eco-friendly raw material to partnering with ethical manufacturers and engaging a fulfillment centre to control deliveries to effectively scale the business 

Help us make this possible by making a contribution to our campaign.

You can also help to spread this message by clicking to Share our campaign.

Thank you for your kind support!

story:
OVERVIEW

An undismissable part of your next journey - regardless the scale, is here to stay. Sacoche Yvette 12.5: a water-resistant chest bag with minimal design, fancy remark of classy strap and eco-tech material. 

FEATURES

Secure: Be with you side-by-side. 

Aqua friendly: Water resistant (technology).

Classic ergonomic shaped: Find the beauty in versatility. 

On-the-go fashion styled: Minimalism design with strong capacity. 

Customed to yours: A chest bag with your name on it, why not? Contact us to have your name or beloved’s engraved on the Sacoche Yvette 125. 

Haute-couture craftsmanship: Expert handicraft which is hard to find from mass production from selective artisans.

Eco material: infused high-technology into our trademark fabric. 

 

SUBLIMELY SLIM DESIGN THAT CAN CARRY ALL YOU NEED

Sacoche Yvette 125 must come to rescue all minimalist souls out there. The design came with ergonomic shapes and elegant well-tailored lines. Swinging this timeless fashion piece across the chest is not only aesthetically pleasing, but also undeniably functional. 

Despite having a slim design that fits perfectly on your body, Sacoche Yvette 125 also does an excellent job of holding your stuff to you. 

SMART LOCKS - CAST IT HOW YOU SEE FIT

No need to throw it overhead just to take off, Sacoche Yvette 125 comes with a smart hook that allows you to connect or unlink your chest bag easily. The seamless design also manifests through its flexible choice of wearable positions. The smart stainless strap also “clicks” elegantly to complete your going-out ritual. 

Choose your own preference on casting Sacoche Yvette 125 and travel around with comfort and versatility. 

INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY INFUSED IN WATERPROOFED ECO-MATERIAL

Manufactured with high-tech functional fabric with superlight weight (108 gsm), Sacoche Yvette 12.5 allows Breathability, Water Vapour Permeability, Water Pressure Resistance and Bonding Strength - proven by ISO5077-1984/ ISO6330-2000. 

Our Yvette textile contains 3 layers:

- 1st layer: 50D Elastic fabric - Protects textile and fabric surfaces from stain and water.

- 2nd layer: White Polyurethane Membrane – or breathable membrane, is water resistant but vapour permeable. ... The membrane is located on the cold side of insulation and prevents moisture (as well as snow, wind, and contaminants such as dust) that may have been driven through the external cladding, from penetrating further into the structure.

- 3rd layer: 20D Interlock, exclusively printed. Feels soft and smooth on the skin - can be worn for extended periods and will remain comfortable. No form changed and no shrinkage after repeated cleaning. Can be used for a long time. 

With our unique technology usage of material, the Sacoche Yvette 125 are water-proof and breathable, natural sun protection, easy-to-care, long lasting and definitely in style. 

FIND YOUR OWN SACOCHE-MATE 

Sacoche Yvette 12.5 is available in 5 trendy colors. Pick the color wave that reflects yourself the most and ready to go out with this soul-mate, feeling loved, from now on. 

 

WALK OUTSIDE IN STYLE WITH YVETTE SACOCHE

Who says on-the-go clothes can be fashion? Don’t let people decide your wardrobe! Just pick Sacoche Yvette 12.5 and walk outside with your head held high, knowing you speak your own fashion language. While dismissing the bulky pockets carrying phones, keys, or hand sanitizers, Sacoche Yvette 12.5 keeps all your belongings safe and sound. The minimal form fits right into your body, barely making any hefty feeling to dull your outfit. 

ANTI LOST 

Pick-pocket has been stressing you out? Since Sacoche Yvette 12.5 leaves no obvious trace as it closely fits your body, feel free to layer the bag under your jacket. Your necessities are now safely guaranteed with us. The diagonal position is also the best pick to dearly keep your stuff around. Your beloved things rest comfortably across your body, just like how your heart is kept calm with Sacoche Yvette 12.5. 

 

EARLY BIRD REWARDS 

1. 20% discount for this chest bag #Sacoche Yvette125. Pick your favorite color! 

2. Limited Editions: (Exclusive-Yours) Engrave your name or your beloved ones on the chest bag #Sacoche Yvette 125.

Please message us “the one” you would like to put on. This is all about craftsmanship and greatness that you could offer to your beloved. 

3. Free 1 novel “The Trench Coat” by this link: https://yvettelibby.com/collections/yvette-radio

Wait, that’s not the end of the story, you will have the book author autographs in real person and give you a wish.

The novel will be delivered together with the #Sacoche Yvette125. Available languages of the novel: English, French, Vietnamese. 

4. Gift code of 20% discount in 1 year of all products from the designer Yvette LIBBY N’guyen Paris. Please kindly subscribe the website: www.yvettelibby.com so that we will send the gift code personally to your email. 

5. Testimonial Contest: Take 1 picture while you using the #Sacoche Yvette 125, with your testimonial.

We would pick out the best submissions and post publicly on our official website/social media as an appreciation.

REWARDS 

 

FOR REFFERAL  

 

PRODUCT PARAMETER

 

INSPIRATION: THE FINE AND ELEGANT FRENCH SACOCHE

Bags. The story

Dating back to the 14s when the bag was firstly carried across the waist as its most primitive form and served functional purpose only: storing daily miscellaneous items. From the 16s, bags became popular as a convenient accessory with more eye-catching designs. The weekly Imperial once differentiated men & women by their bag: "While men put their hands in their pocket bag, women carry their bag on their hands."

It was not until the 18s that the bag exploded as a fashion item from various status and concepts like handbag, cross-body or shoulder bag were invented.

Amour. The epic

Yvette Sacoche is a living inspiration of "The Trench-coat" novel series - which tells the love story between 2 female mains, which took place in the 1920s, Paris. Our 1 minute film finely wraps up their passionate feelings towards each other, as well as the appearance of Yvette Sacoche throughout the touching journey. Their love might have been forbidden, wistful, remarkable and everything, but ordinary. They were drawn together, completed one another and connected to each other - just like you and your Sacoche.

Bio. The idea

Sacoche Yvette 12.5 is not an incident idea, yet a steaming story from close observation of our users' practical needs. As life continuously evolves, the demand of a convenient - yet style-distinctive on-the-go bag emerged. How can I walk outside neatly with just the thing I need? How can I survive this sudden rain without ruining my belongings? How can I exactly locate the thing I need in the bag without finding somewhere to lean on and run a check? 

Captured the request with a twist of French retro, Yvette LIBBY N'guyen team brought Sacoche Yvette to life, turning all the "How"s with question marks to "Wow"s with exclamation!

12.5. The Inspiration

Sacoche Yvette 12.5 came to your daily runway with the only 12.5cm version - the perfect size to define your body lines better with a delicate aesthetic vibe, while keeping all your necessities secure. It was also a sweet surprise as our concept was finalized on the very same date: 12th May. With Yvette LIBBY N'guyen team, 12.5 is not only just the mere length of a product, but also a mile stone where our French fashion heartbeat was born to life.  

HEAD ON CHALLENGES WITH EXCITEMENT

Yvette LIBBY N’guyen Paris proudly presents Sacoche Yvette 125 - the bag made of passion and delicacy. We decided to leverage a Parisian elegance to secure Sacoche Yvette 125 quality: from the finest fabric to the well-tailored lines.

 

 

 

We also develop our logistic ability with around-the-globe shipping service, while maintaining great care towards our delicate product. 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Ecology is our top priority to mention about. This year has been a challenging year for so many people, but 2020 also gives us a chance to make real change to how we live our lives and treat the planet. One thing we as the fashion brand Yvette LIBBY N’guyen Paris can change is to create fashion artwork as a voice to be heard for a greener, healthier and safer future lifestyle.

Free 1 novel “The Trench Coat” by this link: https://yvettelibby.com/collections/yvette-radioWait, that’s not the end of the story, you will have the book author autographs in real person and give you a wish.The novel will be delivered together with the #Sacoche Yvette125. Available languages of the novel: English, French, Vietnamese. 4. Gift code of 20% discount in 1 year of all products from the designer Yvette LIBBY N’guyen Paris. Please kindly subscribe the website: www.yvettelibby.com so that we will send the gift code personally to your email. 5. Testimonial Contest: Take 1 picture while you using the #Sacoche Yvette 125, with your testimonial.We would pick out the best submissions and post publicly on our official website/social media as an appreciation.
REWARDS  FOR REFFERAL   PRODUCT PARAMETER INSPIRATION: THE FINE AND ELEGANT FRENCH SACOCHEBags. The storyDating back to the 14s when the bag was firstly carried across the waist as its most primitive form and served functional purpose only: storing daily miscellaneous items. From the 16s, bags became popular as a convenient accessory with more eye-catching designs. The weekly Imperial once differentiated men & women by their bag: "While men put their hands in their pocket bag, women carry their bag on their hands."It was not until the 18s that the bag exploded as a fashion item from various status and concepts like handbag, cross-body or shoulder bag were invented.Amour. The epicYvette Sacoche is a living inspiration of "The Trench-coat" novel series - which tells the love story between 2 female mains, which took place in the 1920s, Paris. Our 1 minute film finely wraps up their passionate feelings towards each other, as well as the appearance of Yvette Sacoche throughout the touching journey. Their love might have been forbidden, wistful, remarkable and everything, but ordinary. They were drawn together, completed one another and connected to each other - just like you and your Sacoche.Bio. The ideaSacoche Yvette 12.5 is not an incident idea, yet a steaming story from close observation of our users' practical needs. As life continuously evolves, the demand of a convenient - yet style-distinctive on-the-go bag emerged. How can I walk outside neatly with just the thing I need? How can I survive this sudden rain without ruining my belongings? How can I exactly locate the thing I need in the bag without finding somewhere to lean on and run a check? Captured the request with a twist of French retro, Yvette LIBBY N'guyen team brought Sacoche Yvette to life, turning all the "How"s with question marks to "Wow"s with exclamation!12.5. The InspirationSacoche Yvette 12.5 came to your daily runway with the only 12.5cm version - the perfect size to define your body lines better with a delicate aesthetic vibe, while keeping all your necessities secure. It was also a sweet surprise as our concept was finalized on the very same date: 12th May. With Yvette LIBBY N'guyen team, 12.5 is not only just the mere length of a product, but also a mile stone where our French fashion heartbeat was born to life.  HEAD ON CHALLENGES WITH EXCITEMENTYvette LIBBY N’guyen Paris proudly presents Sacoche Yvette 125 - the bag made of passion and delicacy. We decided to leverage a Parisian elegance to secure Sacoche Yvette 125 quality: from the finest fabric to the well-tailored lines. 
 


  

We also develop our logistic ability with around-the-globe shipping service, while maintaining great care towards our delicate product. 
IMPORTANT NOTE: Ecology is our top priority to mention about. This year has been a challenging year for so many people, but 2020 also gives us a chance to make real change to how we live our lives and treat the planet. One thing we as the fashion brand Yvette LIBBY N’guyen Paris can change is to create fashion artwork as a voice to be heard for a greener, healthier and safer future lifestyle.

story:
Our mission is to inspire people to LoveNow. This begins with a thoughtful gifting experience designed to connect you with those that matter most.

 

 

The Healing Benefits Of Crystals

Crystals have been worn by Kings, Queens, and Sages throughout history. They are naturally grown gemstones within the Earth, and carry the unique healing frequencies of nature. Each crystal has different properties that compliment your aura with positive healing benefits.

*The microscope images above are courtesy of the Vitajuwel scientific survey by HadoLife Lab, which demonstrates that crystals improve water structure.

Dr. Masaru Emoto conducted water experiments, which show the healing effects that crystals have on water. Since we are primarily made of water, the results are amazing! The photo to the left, shows the molecular structure of regular tap water. However, after a 7-minute exposure to crystals, that same tap water completely transformed its shape to become the beautiful image on the right. Imagine how wearing crystals will positively affect the water in your body?

*You should never substitute crystals for professional medical treatment when indicated for any condition.

 

What Do The LoveNow Crystals Mean?


Our vision was not just to create a product, but to spark a shift in consciousness that will bring love to a world that so desperately needs it. Each crystal is a reminder that you can make a meaningful difference with small acts of love and presence. As we all join together to LoveNow, we will change the world.
 

Rose Quartz is the essential love crystal. It attunes your vibration to the life force energy of self love and acceptance. Rose Quartz brings peace to relationships, and helps you manifest love with a soulmate connection. Rose Quartz dissolves judgement, resentment, and fear. It heals your heart of old wounds, and reawakens your faith through the frequency of kindness and compassion. It gently reminds you to forgive anything that is weighing you down from unconditionally loving all that is.
 

Amethyst is a crystal that guides your attention into the now moment. It stimulates your intuition and connection to higher states of consciousness. Amethyst is perfect to use during meditation for opening your psychic abilities, and receiving clarity from within. It is a purification aid for giving up bad habits. Amethyst protects and clears your energy field from negative attachments. It symbolizes freedom and being true to yourself. Amethyst will remind you of your powerful presence and self worth.
 

What's Included In Each LoveNow Bracelet Set?


Join The LoveNow Movement!

There are a few ways you can help:

1. Buy a LoveNow bracelet set!
With your purchase, you'll be making a lasting impact in people's lives.

2. Tell your friends about the LoveNow bracelets!
Share the link to this site on all your social media platforms. LoveNow is the movement!
Tag @ourpresence #lovenowbracelets

           

https://ourpresence.com

story:
My Story

I believe that every woman deserves comfortable, affordable, and chic clothing to wear to work. 925 Babe’s Summer Friday Collection features casual pieces that are comfortable commuting to work in the morning and stylish after work hours. The pieces transition perfectly to a night out on the town with your friends.

I design for women like me -- ambitious, hard working, and professional in fast-paced cities and casual work environments.

Last year, I began dedicating all of my time into developing my brand 925 Babe and creating my first capsule collection of casual work clothing for women. 

My vision for the the brand is to revamp workplace fashion from the stiff double pleated pant suit, to a more smart casual dress code. The brand’s casual chic look, pushes the boundaries on ready-wear fashion by steering away from being “on-trend,” and going toward authentic and classic pieces that carry women from their first first day on the job to their promotion as Vice President of the company.

I noticed a need for this type of women's fashion brand while working for Viacom in NY and Netflix in Los Angeles.

 

My journey has been rewarding, risky, and full of sacrifices. If you like the idea please make a contribution and share this post with your friends. If you like the collection please place a pre-order. I'm extremely grateful for everyone who's made contributions to the campaign so far.

How It Works

925 Babe is a capsule collection featuring 4 pieces. Each item can be dressed up with heels or dressed down with a pair of sneakers. You can even pair the garments with pieces already in your closet. You decide! Click on a perk or “back this campaign” to support 925 Babe and to receive your very own piece from the Summer Friday’s Collection.

About My Products


The Eve Shift Dress, Sarah Duster Jacket, and Esther Trouser Shorts are made with Italian fabric that is 100% cotton and lightweight.  The Rita Jogger Pants are made of fabric that is 97% cotton. The Rita Jogger Pants can be machine washed. 

925 Babe is striving to be a company that is sustainable and up-cycled. I am proud of my decision to not use polyester for this collection or any future collections.  As the brand grows, I hope to use materials like tencel, cupro, bemberg, r-pet.

Esther Trouser Shorts and Sarah Duster Jacket

                             

Model is 6'2 and wearing a size S

Eve Shift Dress and Sarah Duster Jacket
                      

Model is 5'4 and wearing a size S

Rita Jogger Pants

Model is 6'2 and wearing a size S


                                           

Model is 5'4 and wearing a size S

Sizing

Please email Contact@925Babe.com if you have an questions about sizing.

Your Contribution

With the help of IndieGoGo and people like you, I’ll be able to produce the Summer Friday’s Collection in Los Angeles, CA. Your support means that together we can turn 925 Babe into the go-to destination for women’s casual work clothing. With your contribution, I will be able to start selling on my website and ship my designs to women around the country.

  

 

My Guarantee To You

Thank you for viewing my campaign. This is an investment that you will not regret. I look forward to sending you your products.If you have any questions or concerns you can reach out to me via email Contact@925Babe.com. Please follow us on Instagram @925Babe and like us on Facebook. Thanks for your support!

story:
Chanier is a vision for the future of Fine Jewelry, embracing total transparency and honest pricing. We believe that beauty, quality and sustainability should go hand in hand.  That’s why each C Bracelet purchased will help fund Kitechild (http://www.kitechild.org). It’s an organization dear to our hearts because, like us, they support “Change, not charity.”

Each purchase of the C Bracelet supports women & children fleeing child marriage.

Through the collaboration with Kitechild, profits from the C Bracelet will directly fund the Mother Esther Home. This remarkable site offers shelter to girls at risk of, or already victim to, being submitted to FGM and early childhood marriage. In addition to providing a safe haven for these young girls and their mothers, it also provides counseling, therapy for victims and reunification services.

Join us in bringing our vision of Fine Jewelry

for a great cause to life.

Join us in wearing

The C Bracelet

 

140 ways to customize your bracelet

 
 
Select from one of the 7 C’s, available in 18-karat white, yellow, rose gold, or .925 sterling silver.

Customize your piece either with or without a .10 carat round, brilliant, white diamond.

 

 
Select from the 20 bright, playful hues of beautiful silk cord, directly sourced from the Montmartre textile district of Paris.
 

 


 

Every bracelet has two adjustable sliding knots on each side to ensure the perfect fit.

 

Check out our Instagram @chanierparis (https://www.instagram.com/chanierparis/) to view all of the possible color combinations.

 

Each Chanier bracelet will come in a customized, innovative, and never-before-seen video box to preciously protect your jewelry for years to come.

Depending on the bracelet color you choose, your bracelet box will include a beautiful music video of the C bracelet being dramatically featured in your chosen color's Parisian location.


The packaging includes a USB cable to recharge the video box and/or to change the video it comes with.

 

Founders of Chanier: Stephanie Javier and Antoine Leroux

 

We believe that today's luxury retailers are wasting millions of dollars. Their money is spent on unsustainable stressors to the environment: stores, renovations, visual merchandising displays, etc. The salespeople that work in some luxury brands are commissioned and encouraged to use aggressive sales techniques, none of which add any heart or value to the product itself. And let's not forget the expensive celebrity marketing campaigns (we once heard that a certain singer was paid $5 million to be in a 60 second commercial for a well-known jewelry brand).

We became frustrated working for big-company vision and values that were not in line with our own.

We work with real diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals. Paris is the place to be for inspiration, design, and jewelry production. We found a way to create beautiful, ethically-sourced, accessibly-priced Fine Jewelry made with real diamonds and gemstones. Our creations are designed and fabricated with the same partners that work for the world's biggest luxury brands. Our jewelry will play a part in your legacy, your very own precious family heirlooms to be handed down for generations to come.

 

We wanted to create something original, modern, comfortable, and fashionable at the same time. When we decided on creating a C for Chanier, we knew we wanted it to be different.

It all started with an idea! Initial renderings and sketches of the C.

We were looking for specific ways to help reduce production costs, and we also wanted to speed up the jewelry manufacturing process, so that we could set up jewelry-making on demand within a period of about three weeks. Which is why we've decided to look towards the future of jewelry by working with 3-D printing.

The excitement begins! 1st prototype of the C.

As we know, 3D printing applies to all areas of our lives, and of course it can be very useful for jewelry as well! Some sectors are more impacted than others, and this type of technology is more applicable for the moment to advanced industries such as aeronautics or even for automobiles. 

2nd prototype: 3-D renderings and resin printed C.

The use of 3D printing in jewelry brings us many valuable benefits:

Speed

The long and expensive work of the jewelry work-smith is avoided and the cracking of the resin is possible without going through a silicone mold. Without 3D, it would not be possible to create a custom piece of jewelry from A to Z within 2 weeks as we are able to.

Cost

We avoid holding stock. Jewelry in today's retail industry traditionally remains about 646 days in stock before being sold. We'll let you imagine the impact on the final price for the customer.

Precision

Almost anything is possible. The use of a CAD tool makes it possible to release a resin in all sizes without having to remake a model every time.

"Third time's a charm!" 3rd and final prototype of the C

We believe that wearing The C Bracelet is a movement to represent the future of Fine Jewelry.

Chanier is very different from traditional jewelry because 3D printing is at the heart of our business model. The factors that differentiate us mainly concern the technical part. The latter has indeed changed a lot, especially in terms of 3D imaging and design. Unlike traditional jewelry, we do not work in series but piece by piece, which has serious implications in terms of organization for our production chain. In fact, to use a somewhat technical term, we simply adapt lean manufacturing to the jewelry sector. It is a piece-by-piece production of different models, all in less than 10 working days and can be used with a very wide variety of stones. It is radically different from the traditional jeweler's profession that proceeds by making and keeping stock in stores.

The final C

Thanks to the help of many different experts in the jewelry production industry who share the same values as us and Kitechild, we were able to produce a beautiful and innovative product, entirely fabricated in Paris, with values and beliefs that look towards changing the future for the better.

We are incredibly thankful to everyone that was involved in making this project come to life. We all truly hope that you will be proud to wear your C Bracelet wherever you go.

 

We strongly support Kitechild's mission against child marriage and FGM.

Hashtag #theCbracelet on Instagram or Facebook and enter the contest to win a free silver C bracelet and video box by participating in one of two categories:

1) Photo or video of the Chanier X arm symbol 

2) Drawing/Sketch of the C bracelet

Be original and creative! 

Deadline: October 23, 2018

1 winner of each category will be selected and announced on Instagram at the end of the Indiegogo campaign.

We really need your help to get us off the ground.

 

 

1 - Purchase materials and gemstones

2 - Execute our first production run

3 - Securely ship your beautifully customized C Bracelet and video box straight to your home

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

Stephanie Javier, Founder, @stephjojavi

Stephanie earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Sociology from the University of Texas at San Antonio. Her international management experience working for Forbes 1000 companies such as Abercrombie & Fitch and Tiffany & Co. has provided her with useful brand-strategy knowledge of the retail industry. In 2011, at 26 years old, Stephanie was hand-selected to lead and open retail stores in Sweden, Belgium, Germany, Austria, Canada, and France, allowing her to be challenged and to develop her leadership skills through working with a wide variety of people coming from different cultures and backgrounds. Stephanie's expertise is in finding and utilizing the strengths of gifted people to their maximum potential. With her vast array of contacts in a broad variety of industries, Stephanie is dedicated to successfully branding Chanier to the globally conscious and digitally-connected consumer.

Antoine Leroux, Co-Founder, @lxantoine

With a substantial background in jewelry, Antoine began to study the subject at the age of 17 years old in Paris. In 2006, at 23 years old, he worked at the heart of ateliers by participating in the production of incredible creations for internationally prestigious French jewelry houses such as Van Cleef & Arpels, Chanel, and Chaumet. He further developed his passion and knowledge for gemstones and jewelry creations through his travels and work within several industrially-renowned cities such as Ramat Gan (Israel) and Antwerp (Belgium). Most recently, Antoine acquired significant experience representing international houses as a Brand Ambassador for Tiffany & Co. and De Beers.

Now in 2018, Antoine strongly believes in the change and values that his experiences can bring to the world, making Chanier a dream combination of passion and purpose.

 

Social Responsibility is our motivator. We know that our generation appreciates great products and ideas, but also brands that share in their values. Which is why we've decided to carefully partner with organizations and people that share the same values as Chanier.

Kitechild wins Silver at the 2017 Deauville Green Awards for their Sustainable Mission and Message

Kitechild operates in developing countries under a sustainable empowerment model, partnering with communities and families in order to empower at-risk children and enable them to thrive. Funding and donor support is channeled directly into distinct projects that can include greenhouses, farms, renewable energy and similar efforts that encourage self-sufficiency and enrich the community at large. We meet our goal of helping each at-risk child reach his/her full potential and lead a dignified life, by providing access to education, quality nutrition, social support, and re-integration with family when possible.

Learn more about Kitechild by clicking here: http://www.kitechild.org
 

 

Our partner in precious stones: Mediam Suisse is a committed diamond dealer. Based in Switzerland and Paris, the "Mediam Suisse" team is composed of a gemologist and a diamond dealer. With more than 20 years of experience in the diamond business, Mediam Switzerland gives us access to wholesale prices and fully shares our philosophy with its social, humanitarian and environmental commitment and its desire to give everyone access to the highest standards in the jewelry industry.

Learn more about Mediam Suisse by clicking here: http://mediamsuisse.ch

 

2018 participant in "The Social Entrepreneurs" category.

For entrepreneurs under the age of 35 that engage in creating a more fair and sustainable world.

https://www.instagram.com/chanierparis/

https://www.facebook.com/chanierparis/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_gAGDRzzAFWwV1kegbFOLg

https://twitter.com/chanierparis

https://www.linkedin.com/company/chanierparis/

We all truly hope that you will be proud to wear your C Bracelet wherever you go. We strongly support Kitechild's mission against child marriage and FGM.Hashtag #theCbracelet on Instagram or Facebook and enter the contest to win a free silver C bracelet and video box by participating in one of two categories:1) Photo or video of the Chanier X arm symbol 2) Drawing/Sketch of the C braceletBe original and creative! Deadline: October 23, 20181 winner of each category will be selected and announced on Instagram at the end of the Indiegogo campaign.We really need your help to get us off the ground.  1 - Purchase materials and gemstones2 - Execute our first production run3 - Securely ship your beautifully customized C Bracelet and video box straight to your home     

 


 


 
Stephanie Javier, Founder, @stephjojaviStephanie earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Sociology from the University of Texas at San Antonio. Her international management experience working for Forbes 1000 companies such as Abercrombie & Fitch and Tiffany & Co. has provided her with useful brand-strategy knowledge of the retail industry. In 2011, at 26 years old, Stephanie was hand-selected to lead and open retail stores in Sweden, Belgium, Germany, Austria, Canada, and France, allowing her to be challenged and to develop her leadership skills through working with a wide variety of people coming from different cultures and backgrounds. Stephanie's expertise is in finding and utilizing the strengths of gifted people to their maximum potential. With her vast array of contacts in a broad variety of industries, Stephanie is dedicated to successfully branding Chanier to the globally conscious and digitally-connected consumer.Antoine Leroux, Co-Founder, @lxantoineWith a substantial background in jewelry, Antoine began to study the subject at the age of 17 years old in Paris. In 2006, at 23 years old, he worked at the heart of ateliers by participating in the production of incredible creations for internationally prestigious French jewelry houses such as Van Cleef & Arpels, Chanel, and Chaumet. He further developed his passion and knowledge for gemstones and jewelry creations through his travels and work within several industrially-renowned cities such as Ramat Gan (Israel) and Antwerp (Belgium). Most recently, Antoine acquired significant experience representing international houses as a Brand Ambassador for Tiffany & Co. and De Beers.Now in 2018, Antoine strongly believes in the change and values that his experiences can bring to the world, making Chanier a dream combination of passion and purpose. Social Responsibility is our motivator. We know that our generation appreciates great products and ideas, but also brands that share in their values. Which is why we've decided to carefully partner with organizations and people that share the same values as Chanier.Kitechild wins Silver at the 2017 Deauville Green Awards for their Sustainable Mission and MessageKitechild operates in developing countries under a sustainable empowerment model, partnering with communities and families in order to empower at-risk children and enable them to thrive. Funding and donor support is channeled directly into distinct projects that can include greenhouses, farms, renewable energy and similar efforts that encourage self-sufficiency and enrich the community at large. We meet our goal of helping each at-risk child reach his/her full potential and lead a dignified life, by providing access to education, quality nutrition, social support, and re-integration with family when possible.Learn more about Kitechild by clicking here: http://www.kitechild.org  Our partner in precious stones: Mediam Suisse is a committed diamond dealer. Based in Switzerland and Paris, the "Mediam Suisse" team is composed of a gemologist and a diamond dealer. With more than 20 years of experience in the diamond business, Mediam Switzerland gives us access to wholesale prices and fully shares our philosophy with its social, humanitarian and environmental commitment and its desire to give everyone access to the highest standards in the jewelry industry.Learn more about Mediam Suisse by clicking here: http://mediamsuisse.ch 2018 participant in "The Social Entrepreneurs" category.For entrepreneurs under the age of 35 that engage in creating a more fair and sustainable world.https://www.instagram.com/chanierparis/https://www.facebook.com/chanierparis/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_gAGDRzzAFWwV1kegbFOLghttps://twitter.com/chanierparishttps://www.linkedin.com/company/chanierparis/

story:
THE  ONLY  WAY  TO  BUY  NOW: 

 

 

 

 

Imagine a wallet so functional, intuitive and elegant 

it puts a smile on your face every time you use it, 

for years to come... 

 

CASH MANAGEMENT SYSTEM YOU HAVEN’T SEEN BEFORE

  • MiniMAX 2+’s unique design lets you to insert cash as fast as with no other wallet.
  • Count your cash without taking it out of the wallet!! Just hold the MM2+’s cash-pocket & cash together with one hand and count it with the other.
  • Open it to unfold your bills & when closing MiniMAX 2+ folds the money for you. 

QUICK & EASY ACCESS TO THE HIDDEN COIN POCKET

Why compromise on a cards/very-folded-cash only wallet, when MM2+ can securely hold your coins, keys and other small items such as sim/memory cards. 

I mean… what are you suppose to do? Never carry coins again?? Just a no-no!! 

ACCESS 4 CARD POCKETS WITHOUT OPENING YOUR MM2+ WALLET

  • YES, unlike in any other wallet..., cards in MM2+ stick out a tiny bit above the top, so you can pull out the exact card out ultra fast. 
  • MM2+ has got 4 card pockets including 2 easy-access front and back pockets for the most used cards. Each of those 4 pockets can hold multiple cards.

ATTACH YOUR MOST USED KEY FOR SUPER QUICK ACCESS

  • You can access the key with the same hand you’re holding the wallet with while holding your shopping in the other hand, pull it out with a single finger, open your door and then as easily push the key back inside.
  • Pssst... If you don’t need the key you can just detach it at any moment. 

***

FULL VIDEO TESTIMONIALS:

 

 

***

SCAN TRAVEL AND BANK CARDS WITHOUT TAKING THEM OUT

  • Save time while travelling by bus or underground metro, get easily through security doors at work or library or simply pay at shops just by touching card-readers with your MM2+ wallet.
  • No More "CARD-CLASH" - you can also pay for travel with your travel card or for shopping with your debit card while your other credit card is inaccessible and safe in the RFID protected pocket on the other side of the wallet - this way both cards do not interrupt each other and the card-reader can read the one you want to use!!

BUILT-IN RFID POCKET USED  =  COMPLETE PROTECTION

  • MiniMAX 2+ protects you from having your card’s details stolen with its RFID pocket.
  • Only you can use the cards in the RFID protected pocket by manually taking them out. 

REAL LEATHER VERSION:

  • MiniMAX+ Wallet Sets are made of genuine beautiful Italian leather – looks great & lasts ages. 
  • Sustainable and environmentally friendly: all the real leather of our manufacturer is a byproduct of the meat industry. 

ECO-LEATHER VEGAN VERSION:

  • MiniMAX+ Wallet Sets are also available in Eco-leather made of “Bio-D” material that is almost 100% bio-degradable (95% in 180 days). 
  • This absolutely revolutionary material developed by an Italian corporation Synth3 is not only environmentally friendly but also extremely durable. It looks and feels astonishingly like real leather!! 
  • More "VEGAN" info in the chart below: 

MiniMAX Wallet Sets will be available in 2 LEATHER VERSIONS: 

-->  ECO–LEATHER COLOURS : BLACK / BROWN / GINGER / NAVY BLUE 

-->  REAL LEATHER COLOURS : BLACK / BROWN 

  • The colour of elastic-band & stitching matches the leather.

MiniMAX WALLET SET WILL SERVE YOU WELL FOR YEARS TO COME

  • Every MM+ wallet is made of a single piece of leather cut out by a laser and then stitched by a person, not just a machine. This makes them very durable, as we want the proud owners of our wallets to be friends with them for a long time. 

UNI-SEX MiniMAX+ WALLET SETS - THE PERFECT PRESENT

  • For: Him OR Her - Birthdays - Anniversaries - Graduations - "Me presents" - & more
  • MMs are uni-sex so you can gift them to anybody. 
  • Impressive set of 3 in a pretty box, everybody will love a gift like that!!

MADE BY LEATHER INDUSTRY PRO WITH YEARS OF EXPERIENCE

  • Many other brands outsource manufacturing, but it wouldn’t feel right to us. Maybe it would be quicker, maybe it would be cheaper, but it wouldn't be the same without the same MiniMAX dizain TEAM!!
  • We design and then we create. Throughout the whole process of developing MiniMAX wallets 1 & 2 and now the MM2+ sets, she has worked hard with us creating countless prototypes and she is an invaluable member of our team. Thank you Beata!! 

THE RUBBER-BAND SECURES THE CARDS INSIDE OF THE MM2+ & MAKES SURE THE WALLET STAYS CLOSED

  • True story: Simon hasn't lost a single card since creating elastic-protected MM1
  • The rubber band falls of automatically when you open the wallet - super easy!!
  • The elastic material used in MM2+ is extremely strong and will last years of everyday use. You could see Simon hanging on the red rubber band in the video – and he’s more of a Viking rather than a small princess  ;-) 

PERSONALISE YOUR MM+ WALLETS

If you add this option, we will laser engrave your wallets with what you want, e.g.:

  • “Happy 50th birthday, Mom”
  • “This is Tom’s wallet ;)”
  • Your Phone Number, Initials, Name, etc.

MM2+ WALLETS STORE UP TO 12 CARDS, PLENTY BANKNOTES AND COINS ^^^

  • When designing MiniMAX+ we wanted it to have Mini-mum size and MAX-imum functionality. So the wallet is small yet does more than traditional wallets.
  • MM2+ is long enough to secure very long banknotes such as US Dollars $ and tall enough to protect banknotes as tall as British Pounds £. 

 

 

.
