story:
The first 100% Biodegradable ActiveWear Collection from Brazil to the WORLD!

(Texto em Português logo abaixo!)

My name is Ana Leo. I am a graphic designer, specialized in product design, and post-graduated in fashion history.

9 years ago , I created Santik Beachwear. What started as a home based project became a small business that produces bikinis and sports clothing. Besides its own collection, I also create and produce parts for various brands in Brazil and abroad.

Connected with nature, the environment and with an outdoor lifestyle, today Santik is ready to take the next step. A very important step for the planet and all of Brazilian society.

Santik Bio ActiveWear is a collection of t-shirts, pants, shorts, leggings, tank tops, and tops made with a 100% biodegradable fabric developed in Brazil, and produced in a manner respectful of the planet and humans, from the first to the last step of its manufacturing cycle; from production to consumption.


  • It is a pioneering enterprise in Brazil and abroad.

Charity is another of the project’s main objectives. We wish to help children, especially those coming from needy families, to encourage them to lead a better life and be concerned with the environment so that they can grow up to become exemplary adults/citizens. Santik Bio ActiveWear will be involved with NGO’s and charity projects where children in need are encouraged to practice sports.


What We Need & What You Get

  •  For every article of clothing that is produced for sale, we will make one destined for donation to the NGO’s.

  • T-shirts, pants, swimsuits, tank tops, biking shorts, among others, will became uniforms because we believe this will help the children feel like they belong to a group, that they are part of a team, reinforcing yet again the idea that...

Together we can build a better future!

Children are the future. Let us help them have the right attitudes and mindset needed to help our country win the war on deforestation, pollution, and the lack of respect for nature and fellow humans.


If you are still wondering, “Why should I contribute and help make this project a reality?”

Because this project does not belong only to me!

The initial idea was mine but the project’s aim is the well-being of the planet, of the people involved in the manufacturing process of the clothes, of the consumers who will wear them, and of the children in need who will benefit from the project’s donations.

It is a virtuous cycle where everyone is a winner. You can help out many people and in turn enjoy the benefits of helping our planet become a better place.

That is why I chose to do this via crowdfunding.

Now is the time!
The Olympics are coming!
Let us build a healthier world together so that we can all have a better quality of life. Brazil deserves it, and our planet will thank us!


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't donate your money, please donate your time!!! You can just like and share this campaign in social media, tell your friends about it, and help us spread the word!

    Questions

    • What will happen if you don't reach your goal?

    Everybody that contributed will receive their perks and the NGO's will receive the proportional donation. And you will only be charged at the end of campaign.

    • And if you reach more than you asked for?

    I will be able to help more and more children and NGO's. I just need a lot of people interested on my Perks!

    • When are you gonna produce and delivery the perks?

    I will start the production on January. Will delivery them on March. The delivery time can vary from Brazil to other countries. It takes approximate 15/20 business days to delivery, it depends on which part of the world do you live.

    • The price is almost the same of a non biodegradable piece, what's wrong?

    By the time that I'm launching this campaign, we are living an economic crisis in Brazil, that makes the pieces cheaper for people who lives under a better economy system.

    • Why all the pieces from your collection is Black?

    Who doesn't have a black piece on the wardrobe? Everybody loves a black, simple, basic and unique piece! Making that way I will buy a large amount of the same color and can get a better price on fabric. The idea is to have other colors, maybe some prints, on my future collections, that I pretend to sell online.

    • How do you get my address and sizes?

    At the end of campaign, we'll send you an email requesting all the information that we need.
    ____________________________________________________________________________

    A primeira coleção de roupas esportivas 100% Biodegráveis do Brasil para o MUNDO!


    Meu nome é Ana Leo. Sou designer gráfica, especializada em Design de Produto, e com pós-graduação em História da Moda.

    Há 9 anos, criei a Santik Beachwear, um projeto caseiro que se tornou uma pequena marca de biquínis e roupas esportivas. Além da coleção própria também crio e produzo peças para diversas marcas de biquínis brasileiras e estrangeiras.

    Conectada com a natureza, meio ambiente e com um estilo de vida outdoor, hoje a Santik está pronta para dar um próximo passo. Um passo muito importante para o planeta e para toda a sociedade brasileira.

      Santik Bio ActiveWear, será uma coleção de camisetas, calças, shorts, leggings, regatas e tops confeccionados com tecido 100% biodegradável, desenvolvido no Brasil, em processos produtivos que respeitam o planeta e ser humano, da produção ao consumo.

      Diferentemente dos outros tecidos, o da Santik Bio ActiveWear, foi criado e desenvolvido de forma sustentável,em todas as etapas da cadeia produtiva.

      Mas aí vem a pergunta: se o tecido é biodegradável, quer dizer que a peça vai começar a se desmanchar com o uso? Não! Isto não vai ocorrer; nada irá se desfazer no seu corpo. O processo de decomposição só se inicia após o descarte, com o contato da peça com o solo e mais especificamente nos aterros sanitários em que as roupas venham a ser depositadas.

      Uma iniciativa pioneira no país e até fora dele!

      Como outro importante objetivo, o projeto prevê também incentivar crianças, especialmente as provenientes de famílias carentes, a ter uma vida melhor, e uma consciência ambiental que as transforme em adultos admiráveis. A Santik Bio ActiveWear vai contemplar ONGS e projetos sociais em que crianças, especialmente aquelas mais carentes, são incentivadas a praticar esportes.

      Esse é o futuro! Queremos servir de exemplo para que mais e mais marcas de roupas pelo mundo adotem esta e outras políticas que foquem a melhoria não só da imagem da marca, mas da vida dos consumidores, dos trabalhadores da indústria da moda e também do meio ambiente que nos cerca.


      O que eu ganho apoiando o projeto?

      Buy one, Give one!

      Para cada peça confeccionada e vendida aqui, a Santik produzirá, em paralelo, uma peça infantil, que será doada como uniforme para ONGs que tenham por foco incentivar crianças menos privilegiadas socioeconomicamente a praticar esportes. Camisetas, calças, tops, bermudas ciclistas, entre outros, farão com que essas crianças finalmente tenham identidade de grupo, de time, reforçando cada vez mais a ideia de que todos juntos podemos criar um futuro melhor.


      Se você ainda se pergunta: “Por que eu devo contribuir para esse projeto “sair do papel” e se tornar realidade?”

      Porque este projeto não é só meu, e foi por isso que eu escolhi a plataforma de crowdfunding. A ideia inicial foi minha, mas o projeto visa ao bem estar do planeta, das pessoas envolvidas na produção, dos consumidores que usarão essas peças e das crianças carentes beneficiadas. É um ciclo virtuoso, no qual todos saem ganhando. Você ajuda muita gente e também se beneficia, como habitante do planeta.

      As crianças são o nosso futuro. Vamos ajudá-las a ter atitudes que ajudem o nosso país a vencer a guerra contra o desmatamento, a poluição e a falta de respeito para com o próximo e a natureza.

      A hora é agora!
      As Olimpíadas estão a caminho!
      Vamos, juntos, construir um mundo mais saudável com uma qualidade de vida melhor para cada um de nós.

      O Brasil merece! E o planeta agradece!

      Outras formas de contribuir para o projeto

      Se você não pode doar seu dinheiro, doe seu tempo! Curta, compartilhe, divulgue, convide seus amigos para também participarem dessa iniciativa! Vamos espalhar a notícia, que em meio a tantas notícias tristes pelo mundo, ainda há esperança de fazer um futuro melhor, e ele começa AGORA!!


      Perguntas

      • O que acontece se você não atingir a meta?

      Todo mundo que contribuiu vai receber sua recompensa, e as Ong's receberão a doação proporcional. Você só será cobrado ao final da campanha.

      • E se você atingir mais do que a meta?

      Eu vou poder ajudar mais e mais Ong's e instituições e crianças carentes. Eu só preciso de pessoa interessadas nas recompensas!

      • Quando você irá produzir e entregar as recompensas?

      Eu vou começar a produção em janeiro de 2016, devo começar a entregar em março. O prazo de entrega varia conforme a região que você mora no Brasil. Todas as recompensas para pessoas residentes no Brasil são com FRETE GRÁTIS!

      • Porque todas as peças são pretas?

      Quem não tem uma peça preta no guarda-roupa? Todo mundo ama uma peça simples, básica e única como a preta! Fazendo dessa forma, eu consigo comprar uma quantidade grande de tecido e ganhar no preço. A ideia é ter outras cores e talvez estampas, nas futuras coleções que pretendo lançar e vender online.

      • Como você vai ter acesso ao meu endereço e tamanho?

      Ao final da campanha, enviaremos um email com todas as instruções necessárias.


      Clothing Sizes / Tabela de Medidas



      PERKS

      Benefícios para quem contribuir com o projeto!

Leo. 
Sou designer gráfica,
especializada em Design de Produto, e com pós-graduação em História da Moda. 


Há 9 anos, criei a Santik Beachwear, um projeto caseiro que se tornou uma pequena marca de biquínis e
roupas esportivas. Além da coleção própria
também crio e produzo peças para diversas marcas de biquínis brasileiras e estrangeiras. 
Conectada com a natureza, meio ambiente e com um estilo de vida
outdoor, hoje a Santik está pronta para dar um próximo passo. Um passo muito
importante para o planeta e para toda a sociedade brasileira. 

Santik Bio ActiveWear, será uma coleção
de camisetas, calças, shorts, leggings, regatas e tops confeccionados
com tecido 100% biodegradável, desenvolvido no Brasil, em
processos produtivos que respeitam o planeta e ser humano, da produção ao
consumo. 

Diferentemente
dos outros tecidos, o da  Santik Bio ActiveWear, foi criado e desenvolvido de
forma sustentável,em todas as etapas da cadeia produtiva.

Mas aí vem a
pergunta: se o tecido é biodegradável, quer dizer que a peça vai começar a se
desmanchar com o uso? Não! Isto não vai ocorrer; nada irá se desfazer no seu
corpo. O processo de decomposição só se inicia após o descarte, com o contato
da peça com o solo e mais especificamente nos aterros sanitários em que as
roupas venham a ser depositadas.
Uma iniciativa pioneira no país e até fora dele!


Como outro
importante objetivo, o projeto prevê também incentivar crianças, especialmente
as provenientes de famílias carentes, a ter uma vida melhor, e uma consciência
ambiental que as transforme em adultos admiráveis. A Santik Bio ActiveWear vai
contemplar ONGS e projetos sociais em que crianças, especialmente aquelas mais
carentes, são incentivadas a praticar esportes.
Esse é o futuro! Queremos
servir de exemplo para que mais e mais marcas de roupas pelo mundo adotem esta
e outras políticas que foquem a melhoria não só da imagem da marca, mas da vida
dos consumidores, dos trabalhadores da indústria da moda e também do meio
ambiente que nos cerca.

O que eu ganho apoiando o projeto?



Buy one, Give one!


Para cada peça
confeccionada e vendida aqui, a Santik produzirá, em paralelo, uma peça infantil, que será
doada como uniforme para ONGs que tenham por foco incentivar crianças menos
privilegiadas 
socioeconomicamente

 a praticar esportes. Camisetas,
calças, tops, bermudas ciclistas, entre outros, farão com que
essas crianças finalmente tenham identidade de grupo, de time, reforçando cada
vez mais a ideia de que todos juntos podemos criar um futuro melhor.

Se você ainda se
pergunta: “Por que eu devo contribuir para esse projeto “sair do papel” e se
tornar realidade?” 
Porque este
projeto não é só meu, e foi por isso que eu escolhi a plataforma de crowdfunding. A ideia inicial foi minha,
mas o projeto visa ao bem estar do planeta, das pessoas envolvidas na produção,
dos consumidores que usarão essas peças e das crianças carentes beneficiadas. É
um ciclo virtuoso, no qual todos saem ganhando. Você ajuda muita gente e também
se beneficia, como habitante do planeta.
As crianças são o
nosso futuro. Vamos ajudá-las a ter atitudes que ajudem o nosso país a vencer
a guerra contra o desmatamento, a poluição e a falta de respeito para com o
próximo e a natureza.
A hora é agora!As Olimpíadas estão a caminho!Vamos, juntos, construir um mundo mais
saudável com uma qualidade de vida melhor para cada um de nós.
O Brasil merece! E o planeta agradece!
Outras formas de contribuir para o projeto
Se você não pode doar seu dinheiro, doe seu tempo! Curta, compartilhe, divulgue, convide seus amigos para também participarem dessa iniciativa! Vamos espalhar a notícia, que em meio a tantas notícias tristes pelo mundo, ainda há esperança de fazer um futuro melhor, e ele começa AGORA!!


Perguntas
O que acontece se você não atingir a meta?
Todo mundo que contribuiu vai receber sua recompensa, e as Ong's receberão a doação proporcional. Você só será cobrado ao final da campanha.
E se você atingir mais do que a meta?
Eu vou poder ajudar mais e mais Ong's e instituições e crianças carentes. Eu só preciso de pessoa interessadas nas recompensas!

Quando você irá produzir e entregar as recompensas?
Eu vou começar a produção em janeiro de 2016, devo começar a entregar em março. O prazo de entrega varia conforme a região que você mora no Brasil. Todas as recompensas para pessoas residentes no Brasil são com FRETE GRÁTIS!
Porque todas as peças são pretas?Quem não tem uma peça preta no guarda-roupa? Todo mundo ama uma peça simples, básica e única como a preta! Fazendo dessa forma, eu consigo comprar uma quantidade grande de tecido e ganhar no preço. A ideia é ter outras cores e talvez estampas, nas futuras coleções que pretendo lançar e vender online.
Como você vai ter acesso ao meu endereço e tamanho?Ao final da campanha, enviaremos um email com todas as instruções necessárias.

Clothing Sizes / Tabela de Medidas 






PERKS 

Benefícios para quem contribuir com o projeto!

story:
Pre-Order this Pin

Pins are already in production and should arrive before September. However, UGA is requiring the pin to be licensed, which was surprising since it is original artwork. 

  • Pin is Nickel & Enamel paint
  • I'm a UGA Alumni and bulldog fan!
  • Being officially licensed means proceeds from this pin go to support UGA!
  • Special Pre-Order discount!
  • You will receive your pin even if the goal is not reached!

Pre-order sales go towards licensing fees required by UGA. If you want this pin, simply pre-order it and you will receive it in September at a discount, hopefully before the first game day!

Where the Money Goes:

  • Application Fee ($250)
  • Pre-Paid Royalty Fees ($500)
  • Product Liability Insurance ($500)
Once licensed, 12% of sales goes to UGA – this is great because it provides ongoing support to the university! 

Show your Support

I plan to make pins of different styles, limited edition pins and commemorative pins for important games. This is the first step and you can be part of it! I hope that this becomes a memorable and commonly seen design. You can be the first person to sport this pin and make it a success!

Risks & Challenges

The pins are already paid for and on their way! However, it is up to the University to decide if they are going to approve it for licensing. In addition, I will need to find retail stores to sell the pin and ways to get the pins to the UGA fans that want them.

Other Ways You Can Do

If you don't want to pre-order a pin, here's what you can do:

  • Share this on Facebook, Instagram, Pintrest or your favorite forums
  • Use the share tool on this page, it's easy!

Concept Art

story:
If you have built or seen a motorized bicycle you are most likely familiar with the issue of the "Stock Gas Tank". To a lot of people building custom motorized bicycles they find these stock gas tanks to be an eye sore, undesirable and as one person so boldly put it "fugly".

As an industrial designer and a motorized bike builder enthusiast I started a little company named imperial cycles in 2009, and right off the bat we started to build custom motorized bikes which were set apart from the rest because of the style that we created and the gas tanks that we used.

Our first models introduced were built using old moped gas tanks; the Bullet and Midnight. Modeled and inspired by vintage motorcycles the Midnight was a bobber inspired bike while bullet was a cafe racer inspired bike. Vintage yet still contemporary our bikes seem to strike a chord with our customers. Being featured on sites like pipeburn (http://www.pipeburn.com/home/2010/03/06/imperia...) and silodrome (http://silodrome.com/bullet-imperial-cycles/) it furtherpushed the popularity for our look of bike. And as did the popularity of our look grew so did the demand for the gas tank. To feed this hunger we ordered the last 50 units a moped company in Italy had. Within 1 year we were sold out, and we kept a handful of them for customer builds. With those final gas tanks now gone we have looked into sourcing production made replicas of the cafe racer style tank.  Not exact replicas of the gas tanks. We have made some design upgrades including a lower petcock bung location so that all the gas from a tank can be used. Instead of press fit gas caps we are going to use locking metal gas caps. Also the tanks will accept your gas cap and petcock from the motorized bike kit. And a better tank mounting hardware system. These tanks will also accept the gas cap and petcock valve from the stock motorized bike kit gas tank. And is compatible with moped models: Derbi, Garelli, Hero Majestic, Honda, Kawasaki, Kinetic, Minarelli, Morini, Motobecane, Peugeot, Puch, Sachs, Suzuki, Tomos, Vespa, Batavus, Yamaha, and Universal.

So, In this campaign we are asking $9500 which will cover the mold tooling cost and production numbers for 200 units of gas tanks. Also, the money will pay for gas caps, petcocks, and mounting hardware as well. 

We hope that we can keep this model of bike going with the support of motorbike and moped enthusiasts like you.

story:
Introducing - Urban Shield Protective Hoodie

We want to protect everyone from Crimes that involve Electronic Control Devices or Stun Guns and health concerns related to Electrosmog (ESmog) and Electrostatic discharge (ESD) using our patented technology.

The Urban Shield protective Hoodie has the same look and great feel of a standard hoodie being provided in the market today.  

The big difference is that we provide protection which is developed into the fabric that is used to make the garment.  

You will not see or feel any difference!

The protection areas:

Electronic Control Devices (ECD) or Stun Guns - is a device designed to stun or immobilize an attacker by administering an electric shock. When an ECD  is activated (usually by pulling a trigger), electricity passes between two metal prongs at the end of the weapon. Touching these electrified prongs against an attacker causes sharp pain.

There are millions of ECD's produced each year. They are produced in a multitude of designs ranging from cell phone cases, batons, cell phones, hand held devices, shields, pens and more. The voltages range from 1000's to millions of volts.  Each year scores of people are subject to crimes using stun guns.

For example, in the UK - The number of ECD's seized at the UK border has risen 70% in 4 years.  ECD's are increasingly the weapon of choice for criminals and gangs who find it hard to get real guns in the UK. There was a crime in the UK where, Nathan Matthews took a kidnap kit, which included an ECD disguised as torches, when he went to the home of his teenage stepsister Becky Watts and murdered her last year. 

- (https://www.theguardian.com/world/2016/sep/15/n...)

Here are just a few more recent incidents:

- Man arrested in reported kidnapping and torture - Oct 2016 (http://www.greatfallstribune.com/story/news/loc...)

- ECD or Stun Gun used in quickmart robbery - (Sept 2016) -(http://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/crime/art...)

- Woman confronts Boyfriend with ECD or Stun Gun device - (Sept 2016) - (http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/jilted-...)

- Man uses ECD or Stun Gun in attempted Robbery of Elderly Woman - (Aug 2016) - (http://www.chicagotribune.com/news/local/breaki...)

- Woman fights off ECD or Stun Gun-wielding man in University City abduction attempt - (July 2016) - (http://www.10news.com/news/brazen-attacker-on-t...)

- Victoria Secret robbed by man with ECD or Stun Gun - (July 2016) -(http://www.cbs58.com/story/32250397/exclusive-p...)

- 2 arrested in alleged robbery of a Wal-Mart with ECD or Stun Gun - (June 2016) -   (http://www.ooyuz.com/geturl?aid=12031654)

Explore the issue for yourself and search for "Crimes using Stun Guns"!

The results will shock you!

Electrosmog (ESmog) - is the invisible electromagnetic radiation resulting from the use of both wireless technology and mains electricity. It’s in our homes, offices, schools.

It’s everywhere. There’s more and more of it.

Fact. It’s growing. Spreading like some invisible plague. Most people can’t feel these exposures. Whether you can feel them or not they’re there. Doing their damage. Most people prefer to ignore them.

But if you’ve got symptoms, if you can feel what the radiation is doing to you, you can’t ignore it. Urban Shield helps to reduce/attenuate your exposure to electrosmog.  

Possible health effects most studies conducted to date examined health effects other than cancer. They probed into physiological and thermoregulatory responses, behavioral changes and effects such as the induction of lens opacities (cataracts) and adverse reproductive outcome following acute exposure to relatively high levels of RF fields. There are also a number of studies that report non-thermal effects, where no appreciable rise in temperature can be measured. has been linked to several health concerns.  

Electromagnetic hypersensitivity (Google it)!

What we do know about the effects on the human body is that humans are not equipped with an organ to detect or combat the invisible energy fields surrounding us although these all have the potential to interfere with our bio-system, which is normally in a state of fine balance.

Due to the continuous and long term 24/7 radiation, the presence of a Wireless Routers - WIFI plugged WLAN router will dramatically increase the possibility of the occurence of following symptoms or diseases, defined by the WHO under the term Electrohypersensitivity: 

-  Insomnia; Restlessness; Depressive mood; Poor concentration and memory; Learning, concentration, and behavioral disorders; Tumors; Leukaemia; Heart problems; Brain-degenerative diseases and epilepsy;

- Headaches, migraines; Chronic exhaustion; Inner agitation; Sleeplessness, daytime sleepiness; Tinnitus; Susceptibility to infection; Damage sperm quality; Immune System Disorders, Genotoxic effect via non-thermal pathway (RFR and ELF DNA damage),

- Affects gene and protein expression, Childhood cancers (Leukemia), Impacts melatonin production; Alzheimer’s Disease; Breast Cancer. 

 Karolinska Institute in Sweden, which awards the Nobel Prize for Medicine, predicts that until 2017 as many as 50% of the population will suffer from electrosensibility due to the excessive amount of wireless signals. (Source: http://www.next-up.org/pdf/EHS2006_HallbergOber...)

Indeed, we must not underestimate the general presence of strong electro pollution in residential areas. That has moreover escalated in the last five years with the usage of faster WLAN wireless data transmissions and increase of the number of devices and their performances (stronger, faster, more aggressive signal for higher transfer).

Samuel Milham MD, MPH - Medical epidemiologist in occupational epidemiology.
First scientist to report increased leukemia and other cancers in electrical workers and to demonstrate that the childhood age peak in leukemia emerged in conjunction with the spread of residential electrification.

“Very recently, new research is suggesting that nearly all the human plagues which emerged in the twentieth century, like common acute lymphoblastic leukemia in children, female breast cancer, malignant melanoma and asthma, can be tied to some facet of our use of electricity.  There is an urgent need for governments and individuals to take steps to minimize community and personal EMF exposures.”

References:

 - http://www.texasintegrative.com/electrosmog-should-you-care/

- http://www.best-emf-health.com/dangers-of-electromagnetic-radiation.html

Esmog image

Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) - Is a tiny version of lightning it has been around since the beginning of time. However, this natural phenomenon has only become an issue with the widespread use of solid-state electronics. Urban Shield garments help stop ESD from happening.We will use the money raised to launch our apparel line and protect the public.

How do you get the Protective Hoodie:

 

There are 4 pledge options to get your Hoodie

 

1) Platinum - This is a $10.00 pledge and you receive a certificate showing your support

2) Copper - You will receive 1 Hoodie for $99.00 (Retail Value $139.00) - Save $40.00

3) Silver - You will receive 2 Hoodies for $190.00 (Retail Value $278.00) - Save $88.00

4) Gold - You will receive 3 Hoodies for $270.00 (Retail Value $417.00) - Save $147.00

All pledges are plus shipping!

You will receive an email survey after the campaign closes where you will provide your color choice, size, and mailing address. 

Your color and style choices:

Charcoal Grey: Front zipper style

                    Men's - Front view

 

          Men's - Side View

 

                                Men's - Back view

 

           Women's - Front view

 

Women's - Back View

 

Charcoal Black:  Front Zipper Style

                            Men's - Front View

 

                          Men's - Back View

 

How do I get my Size

Please review the sizing chart for your measurement:

 

 

FAQ's

 

Q. Will the Urban Shield Protective Hoodie work against all commercially available ECD's and Stun Guns on the market today?

A. Yes, it works against all commercially available low amperage Stun Guns, with and without probes. It only works with against the probes when it is zipped up.

 

Q. Will the Urban Shield protective hoodies prevent probe penetration?

A. No, Urban Shield will not prevent probe penetration, it only prevents the electricity.

 

Q. Will the Urban Shield Protective Hoodie work when it is wet or damp?

A. Yes, Urban Shield will work when it is wet or damp.

 

Q. Is Urban Shield Protective Apparel a patented product?

A.  Yes, the technology for Urban Shield Protective Apparel is Patented.

 

Q. Will the Urban Shield Protective Hooide protect you against Lightning or Electrical Power lines?

A. No, It will not protect you against lightning or Electrical Power Lines.

 

Q. Why was Urban Shield created?

A. It was created based upon the increasing number of crimes using ECD's and Stun Guns and the growing use of Technology and Electromagnetic waves to reduce the impact from Esmog.  We simply want to protect everyone from being harmed! 

 

Risks & Challenges

We do not see any major risk in producing and supplying this product.  It is a product that really fits our passion and experience.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways that a person can help a campaign.  

We believe that we can all do our part no matter how big or small to help one another.  Please help us get the word out about this new product and the major benefit that it provides.  

Please tell all of your friends to go to www.indeigogo.com and support this project.


Thank you in advance for your support!

4) Gold - You will receive 3 Hoodies for $270.00 (Retail Value $417.00) - Save $147.00
All pledges are plus shipping!
You will receive an email survey after the campaign closes where you will provide your color choice, size, and mailing address. 
Your color and style choices:
Charcoal Grey: Front zipper style

                    Men's - Front view
 

          Men's - Side View
 

                                Men's - Back view
 

           Women's - Front view
 

Women's - Back View
 
Charcoal Black:  Front Zipper Style

                            Men's - Front View
 

                          Men's - Back View
 
How do I get my Size
Please review the sizing chart for your measurement:

 

 
FAQ's
 
Q. Will the Urban Shield Protective Hoodie work against all commercially available ECD's and Stun Guns on the market today?
A. Yes, it works against all commercially available low amperage Stun Guns, with and without probes. It only works with against the probes when it is zipped up.
 
Q. Will the Urban Shield protective hoodies prevent probe penetration?
A. No, Urban Shield will not prevent probe penetration, it only prevents the electricity.
 
Q. Will the Urban Shield Protective Hoodie work when it is wet or damp?
A. Yes, Urban Shield will work when it is wet or damp.
 
Q. Is Urban Shield Protective Apparel a patented product?
A.  Yes, the technology for Urban Shield Protective Apparel is Patented.
 
Q. Will the Urban Shield Protective Hooide protect you against Lightning or Electrical Power lines?
A. No, It will not protect you against lightning or Electrical Power Lines.
 
Q. Why was Urban Shield created?
A. It was created based upon the increasing number of crimes using ECD's and Stun Guns and the growing use of Technology and Electromagnetic waves to reduce the impact from Esmog.  We simply want to protect everyone from being harmed! 
 

Risks & Challenges
We do not see any major risk in producing and supplying this product.  It is a product that really fits our passion and experience.
 
Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways that a person can help a campaign.  
We believe that we can all do our part no matter how big or small to help one another.  Please help us get the word out about this new product and the major benefit that it provides.  
Please tell all of your friends to go to www.indeigogo.com and support this project.
Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
Afro-Urban Footwear

We started as a simple African clothing store, we have now grown creating with passion unique footwear of people’s choice. Footwear that makes you culturally connected to world of tradition. Inspired by pattern, color and street fashion we are giving you the premium quality Afro-Urban footwear handcrafted with African print for men, women and children .

As part of our corporate social responsibility, we will set aside a portion of our profits from your donations and support for the creation of a digital library in Benin Republic and buy books and stationaries for less privileged children in West African local communities.



Beauty of the African wax

African wax has existed across the African continent much longer than we often imagine. We chose to use African wax prints that constitute identity, authenticity, African uniqueness and elegance for the African and non African women. The fabric are industrially produced, colorful cotton with pattern printing. 



Why our footwear is the best

• It’s colorful and unique

• It's comfortable and elegant 

• it's stylish and inspirational 

• it's a blend of wax print with leather and polyester with a quality finishing 

• Because you can customize your own Afro-Urban footwear the way you want it!

·  Available for men, women and children (family pack)



Our aspiration & vision

We aspire to make this tradition a culture, allowing people to appreciate the work and support these craftsmen and seamstresses.

Our vision is to make Afro-Urban Footwear the next innovative pair of kicks.

Our mission is to pioneer innovation in footwear, bring exciting designs to life and empower communities through sustainable, social oriented projects.

We need you to make it happen

We have been working hard at developing Afro-Urban Footwear. Now we need your help to bring Afro-Urban Footwear to life. Our indiegogo campaign will help us raise the funds necessary to complete further product development and begin manufacturing. There are other ways you can help us. Share our project with a friend and family on social media. 


Social Impacts 

1. Job creation 

Job creation in sectors like manufacturing is one of the most important priorities for the countries like Benin and Nigeria. The challenge is that it is almost always cheaper and easier to produce good sneakers in Asia. We plan on overcoming this obstacle by creating a brand that leverages the value of being made in West Africa. As a result we will be bring quality jobs to West Africa youths.

2. Community support 

Quality education is a basic necessity but it is not available for many people in various parts of West Africa. Thankfully many courageous individuals are working to address these challenges. We know how hard it is for them to fund their activities. We want to make sure we’re making our contribution too, so here’s how we’re going to do this:

  •  We’ll set aside a portion of our profits to buy text books, notebooks and stationaries for less privilege children’s in west Africa, working with local NGO and local communities. We can support them for 12 months or more .
  • Anyone who buys a pair of Afro-urban footwear will help us achieve our second project of helping create a digital library for communities. This product includes buying computers, printers, stationaries and internet for school libraries in West Africa. Anyone can also donate to this project. We are looking to engage with our backers (which is YOU!) to help us.

REWARDS

But we can’t do it without the help of the indiegogo community. We need your help to start the production, and in exchange we’re offering some exciting rewards - all of which help us achieve our goal of having a positive impact. 


TIMELINES

Once we meet our goal are met, it will take about three weeks for us to send out the survey to you and receive your order preference in terms of size, style and fabric pattern.




Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING: 
When dealing with physical products, one of the primary challenges is manufacture. Rest assured, with many thousands of shoes already sold over the last years, we developed a strong partnership with our suppliers and they know we accept only top quality products delivered on time as promised.

DELIVERY: 
Knowing the exact timeline of production from start to finish is never an easy thing to estimate. In case of any delays, all backers will be informed immediately and kept up to date.


Other ways you can help us

There are other ways you can help us. Share our project with a friend and family on social media. 


Our Team


Shoe Size guide

THANK YOU SOOOOOO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
First time to Indiegogo?
It's super easy!

  1. Decide which ShoeBloxx pair you would like then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".
  2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  3. Receive and fill out the survey for size and design choices via email. (Alternatively, you can email thefuture@doyoushoe.com if you wish to have different design option for your ShoeBloxx.)
  4. We receive your choices and get your shipment out.
  5. You receive your order and enjoy never having just one shoe design on one shoe again! :)

Would you like to own a pair of ‪trendy detachable shoe called #‎ShoeBloxx‬ or get your whole family on-board? You can be the first to own this trendy, fun and revolutionary footwear today. Finally there's a reason for you to  discover and express your unlimited creativity and make each shoe uniquely yours!




ShoeBloxx detachable shoe concept.


ShoeBloxx was initially created in 2013 to tackle the carbon footprint issue (pun intended) by creating shoes that can be replaced by individual parts, should it get worn out. This trendy modular detachable footwear has since paved the way to bigger ideas. Now, not only can you replace your shoes by parts, but you can even customise the design and choose the type of fabrics of the shoe to reflect your individual personality; effortlessly.

As a sports enthusiast, having to lug around different set of shoes for different sport activities quite a hassle. The brilliant thing is, Shoebloxx can solve this problem too. Designed from the ground-up, ShoeBloxx is a unique three piece detachable shoe that is easy to use and allows you to switch or combine different type of outsoles to suit different types of activities anytime, anywhere.



Trendy modular footwear - Fun & easy to use.


Value Proposition:

ShoeBloxx is made in such a way that the upper part of the shoe (uppers) and the rubber bottom (outsole) could be detach from each other. With the shoes ability to be detachable, it opens up to a variety of possibilities that a normal shoe can't do, for example :

  1. Reduce ‘Wear & Tear’

  2. Machine Washable

  3. Space-Saving

  4. Ability to buy in ‘parts’

  5. Recycle Friendly

  6. Create Your Own Design


More importantly, ShoeBloxx is a shoe and an art canvas combined. As the upper can be detach form the bottom sole, it could then be flatten, transforming it into a canvas where you can create your own design on them and have a completely customised shoe made by YOU! So as you buy the shoe, you also get to bring out your creative side as well.

You want your kids to use ShoeBloxx because not only will it benefit them in solving the most common problems related to footwear, but it will also allow them to express their unique individual creativity plus developing their spatial creativity in the process.


One shoe, infinite possibilities - Multi layered design system.



What We Need & What You Get

We will officially launch ShoeBloxx in July 2016 under the DOYOUSHOE.COM label. We have currently received our first multiple orders for ShoeBloxx and is expecting for the demand to increase in the weeks to come.

This is an incredible motivation for us to start rolling out this awesome shoe. But the thing is, to start production we are required to have a minimum order of 10,000 pairs. If you buy this right now; we’ll hit the green light to go into production.



50K Goal Funding Achievement:
To achieve this target, we are offering our first 3 batch of ShoeBloxx design for our first backers! We will start on the immediate production as soon as we reach our funding goal of USD50,000.



Design 1: #enterthedragon
2x uppers
2x outsole/midsole
1x ShoeBloxx Tshirt



Design 2: #polygon
2x uppers
2x outsole/midsole
1x ShoeBloxx Tshirt



Design 3: #camo
2x uppers
2x outsole/midsole
1x ShoeBloxx Tshirt

*50K Funding Goal Limitation:
Because of limitation on how many shoes we will be producing, we can only achieve to manufacture a limited range of shoe size which is:

Men's sizes (US) :      7 - 8 - 9 -10 

Women's Sizes (US) :    5 - 6 - 7 - 8




100K Stretch Goal Achievement:
Lets make ShoeBloxx available to all! 

By achieving this stretch goal, we can finally produce the complete size range and also open up all design option including the bonus #pokemongo design series PLUS making our online platform for designers accessible to all!  We will start on the immediate production as soon as we reach our funding goal of USD100,000

All size available for 100k stretch goal:



Risks & Challenges

Creating  modular shoes with design focused values that can withstand a users everyday movements will not be easy. We are a very small startup without enough people and money to accomplish this on our own. Thanks to our many supporters who have enthusiastically contributed to taking on this challenge, however, we have reached a point at which we are confident we will be able to manufacture ShoeBloxx on a medium scale provided we can raise enough funds.


ShoeBloxx 2.0 - Updated and Patent pending.

At present we have produced our fourth prototype shoe and completed our basic activity based application, and we have also fabricated custom soles to hold the uppers designed by a engaging an established 3D printing agency. As long as we don’t run into problems with durability or the production process the current prototype models are ready to be turned into shoes we can ship to backers.

The first hurdle we will have to overcome in manufacturing ShoeBloxx shoes is the fabrication of metal moulds for the custom soles needed to hold the separate components. This is expensive, and new moulds must be made for each size of shoe. As a result, even if we meet our minimum funding goal we won't necessarily be able to produce a satisfactory range of sizes. We will decide what sizes to produce based on the level of funding we receive and then send backers the one best suited to their measurements. We may run into difficulties that will delay shipment of our product. We will post regular updates to keep backers informed of our progress and respond to comments and questions as quickly as we can.

For full details of our warranty policy, you can go to our policy page here: 
http://doyoushoe.com/warranty-policies


Other Ways You Can Help

At this point, we need your help to spread the word, to share ShoeBloxx with retailers and wholesalers you may know, to put us in contact with journalists and bloggers and especially to talk to your friends and family that may want to buy these shoes for their kids.

Furthermore, we are constantly searching for manufacturers to help give us the best price and quality to produce the footwear. If you know any footwear manufacturers within Asia, Europe and US, please send us a note: thefuture@doyoushoe.com

Also check out our website at http://www.DoYouShoe.com




MAKE
SHOES
NOT
WAR.

Thank you for supporting this awesome project!

story:
Mission Statement: 

We strive to provide high-quality, handmade boots, without using intermediaries. We are Hackbeast, a shoe brand based in Spain. We want to bring the best footwear made from the finest materials to the world. And we want to do it the best way we can, without middlemen, directly through e-commerce.  

Our boots are rugged, featuring premium leather, high quality laces, and triple stitched durability. The double layered toe, leather heel, and rubber sole make our boots perfect for your daily adventures. Our leather is water, stain, and perspiration resistant. Because we use fewer finishing materials, the natural beauty of the leather shines through, and the boot has a more natural look and feel.

We need your help financing this project. In order to secure the resources necessary to continue providing our high quality products, we need a helping hand. Whatever you can give is extremely appreciated, and we are more than happy to offer rewards for your contribution. If we can reach our goal, your contribution will put you first in line for our product. 

Our collection

  • Pico Maldito: This rugged boot is perfect for outdoor adventures, and is named after a peak in the Pyrenees mountains of Spain.


  •  Mármol Café: This boot has a streak of personality in its sole. With a subtle yet eye-catching design, this boot is sure to impress.


  •  Veleta: This is our classic boot. With its light coloring, its a great choice for everyday style and wear.


  •  Zorro Ibérico: This is our classic boot. With its dark coloring, its a great choice for everyday style and wear.
